name: El Somni Ibiza Dream Hotel by Grupotel
address: Cala San Vicente, 7811, Cala San Vicente, 07811 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Look out over the golden sands and clear waters of San Vicente Beach from this hotel. It is surrounded by some of the natural scenery on the island of Ibiza. At El Somni Ibiza Dream Hotel by Grupotel you can enjoy a game of tennis on the hotel’s own courts before a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool. The hotel offers la carte restaurant with sea view and the evening’s entertainment of shows, live music and dancing. The hotel has a Spa & Wellness area with indoor pool with jets, sauna, ice fountain and massage cabin.

name: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only
address: Playa Es Canar, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only is a 4-star hotel featuring a wellness centre, a fitness area, swimming pool and Balinese beds located in Santa Eularia des Riu. Las Dalias Hippy Market is 3.5 km away. Each modern room here will provide you with air conditioning, a balcony and satellite channels. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A free safe is also available. There is an a la carte restaurant and a buffet-style restaurant, two bars and a show cooking. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff and a tour desk. The hotel is 3.3 km from Ibiza Conference Centre and 1.2 km from Nikki Beach Ibiza. Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport is 23 km away.

name: Hotel La Torre del Canonigo - Small Luxury Hotels
address: C/ Joan Roman 1, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Located on Ibiza Town’s Dalt Vila Hill, this property offers fantastic views of the sea, port and town. It offers late breakfast and air-conditioned rooms. The hotel consists of three different buildings connected by a terrace with a solarium. La Torre del Canónigo is built on the grounds of the city’s Roman acropolis within a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The hotel rooms feature terracotta floors and traditional Balearic décor. Each one has its own décor and includes a satellite TV, free minibar, safe and free WiFi. The hotel has a bar and a roof terrace where you can enjoy your drink. Staff at reception can help booking restaurants, car hire and tickets to other events. The hotel is within 5 minutes’ walk of the town centre with its shops, bars and restaurants. The hotel is within 15 minutes’ drive of the nearest beaches and Ibiza-San José Airport. The hotel provides an airport shuttle service on request.

name: Ocean Drive Talamanca
address: Carrer de Jesús, 28, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ocean Drive Talamanca is just 50 metres from Talamanca Beach and offers sea views. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, and rooms with balconies and free WiFi. Set in a fine location in Ibiza, the hotel offers a concept that aims to personalize the guest experience with a variety of services. The property offers simple, bright décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has satellite TV. Guests benefit from 2 free bottles of water upon arrival. The Ocean Drive Talamanca buffet restaurant serves breakfast buffet and overlooks Talamanca Bay. You can get lunch at the hotel's snack bar. There is a direct bus to nearby Ibiza Town, which stops 25 metres from the hotel. Nightclubs including Pacha and Space are a 15-minute drive away. Ferries to the other Balearic islands and mainland Spain leave from the city’s port, 2 km away. Seasonal hotel open from May until October.

name: Agroturisme Can Planells
address: Venda de Rubio, 2, 07815 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Trs Ibiza Hotel
address: Carretera Cala Gracio (Cami Del Portixol 1) Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: TRS Ibiza Hotel -All Inclusive Adults Only Hotel, a luxury hotel with direct access to the beach, is located in the San Antonio area next to Cala Gració and Cala Gracioneta, two beautiful coves with crystal clear waters surrounded by Mediterranean vegetation. This environment of great beauty is perfect for you to enjoy exclusive vacations as a couple or with friends that include premium services, an exquisite gastronomic offer of its 3 a la carte restaurants, 24-hour butler service and the Infinite Indulgence experience, the All Inclusive that goes further beyond excellence. The Signature Level rooms includes services, amenities, exclusive drinks, minibar. Access to the Gravity Sky Lounge with Infinity pool, access to exclusive sun lounger area by the Io pool. Access to the Zentropia Spa to enjoy water circuit. Selected events at Ushuaia, Hard Rock and Hi club. Dine out, that include exclusive menus in a selection of Ibiza´s restaurants. TRS Ibiza offers you rooms and suites with hydromassage bathtubs, treatments and massages from Zentropia Palladium Spa & Wellness, three restaurants and four bars, three swimming pools and a complete menu of activities like yoga, Pilates and live music.

name: Insotel Tarida Beach Sensatori Resort
address: C/ La Morena, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: The peaceful bay of Cala Tarida and the beautiful beach are situated just a short walk from this resort for families and adults. A range of beach clubs, restaurants, a shopping centre and links to the public transport network are located in the hotel's immediate vicinity. San José is around 6 km away and San Antonio is some 10 km from the establishment. Apart from the main buffet restaurant, there are five inviting à la carte restaurants with highchairs. The resort has two swimming pool areas, one of them only for adults with hot tubs, waterloungers and bali beds. Guests may choose to relax with a massage treatment at the on-site spa while children can have fun at the splash park. There is also a number of sport facilities and a gym and dance studio for the more active ones at The Retreat, which is situated 500m from reception, a 5 minute walk or by shuttle.FarePortal

name: FERGUS Style Bahamas
address: Playa d'En Bossa, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: FERGUS Style Bahamas is located on Playa D’en Bossa Beach, Ibiza. It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and sea, pool or garden views. Bright rooms have a seating area, a minibar, and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The FERGUS Style Bahamas offers 2 restaurants, one of them with pool views. The main restaurant has an open kitchen. There is a snack bar, lobby bar and a poolside bar with a terrace from which guests can watch night-time entertainment shows. Two of Ibiza's most famous nightclubs, Hi and Bora Bora, are located just a few metres away. Tickets for night clubs and excursions can be arranged at the 24-hour reception. Ibiza Town and Airport are a 5-minute drive away.

name: THB Los Molinos Adults Only
address: C/ Ramon Muntaner, 60, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: THB Los Molinos is located on the beachfront in Ibiza. It has a sauna, fitness centre and hot tub, and offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, satellite TV and minibar. THB Los Molinos is an adults-only hotel including an à la carte restaurant, bar, garden area and a terrace. A 24-hour reception is also available. There are Balinese beds and a bar next to the pool and a spa with free access. All of the rooms and public areas at THB Los Molinos are covered by free WiFi access. There is also a business centre with wired internet. The property also offers banquet facilities. THB Los Molinos is a 5-minute walk from Ibiza Old Town, known as Dalt Vila. Ibiza Cathedral is only 900 metres away, while the Pacha Nightclub is 1.9 km away.

name: 7Pines Resort Ibiza
address: Calle Puig Delfin, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Sant Josep de sa Talaia in the Ibiza Region, 18 km from Ibiza Town, 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt is surrounded by pine trees and boasts views of Es Vedrà Island, has three pools in total including one outdoor pool in our public area of the spa centre. Each Suite at this resort is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a seating area for your convenience. All suites feature a terrace or balcony, and some have a private pool. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. We are provided by three restaurants and three bars: - The View, awarded by 1 Sol by 2023 Repsol Guide and included in the 2023 MICHELIN Guide (Spain & Portugal) offers a fine dining experience with an elevated and sublime tasting menu with a Nordic twist. - Cone club offer dazzling evening during the most popular sunset in Ibiza where guests can drinks exquisite cocktails accompained by nice tapas and a comfort food menu - Pershing Yacht Terrace is the place where modern Asian cuisine meets signature drinks in a sophisticated atmosphere and exceptional setting with infinite views to the Mediterranean Sea. The resort has a 1.500 m2 area with two saunas, a steam bath, showers and waterbeds. The Laguna area is a place where families enjoy in a fantastic pool adapted to kids next to a food truck and our sustainable Kids Club concept, KIO. This resort offers water sports facilities for an extra charge, and bike hire is available. San Antonio is 7 km from 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt, while Playa d'en Bossa is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Destino Pacha Ibiza - Entrance to Pacha Club Included
address: Cap Martinet s/n, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set around an outdoor pool, and offering panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, Destino Pacha Ibiza is set on the hillside in Cap Martinet. Talamanca Beach is a 5-minute walk away. Air-conditioned rooms feature a stylish, white décor and large windows. Each one includes free Wi-Fi, a TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom. Destino Pacha Ibiza's restaurant offers fusion cuisine, with Japanese, Mediterranean and Central American influences. It uses fresh, local products. The pool is surrounded by palm trees and hammocks, and poolside massages are available. There is also a large hot tub and hot yoga classes. Pacha Ibiza Club is a 20-minute walk from the resort, while Ibiza city centre is around 3.5 km away. Ibiza Port can be reached in a 10-minute drive, and boats to Formentera, Mallorca and Valencia leave from here.

name: Hotel Garbi Ibiza & Spa
address: C./ de Murtra Nº 5 Ap.Co. 128, 07830 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 298 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and shopping on site. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hotel Garbi Ibiza & Spa in Sant Josep de sa Talaia, you'll be on the beach, a 1-minute drive from Bossa Beach and 6 minutes from Port of Ibiza. This 4-star hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Dalt Vila and 4.2 mi (6.8 km) from Talamanca Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite for dinner at the hotel's restaurant, Comedor, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Need to unwind? Take a break at the bar/lounge, the beach bar, or the poolside bar for a tasty beverage. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. name: Hotel Rural & Spa Can Curreu
address: Ctra Sant Carles Km 12, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located in the village of San Carlos, this luxurious 5-star hotel and spa resort includes an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a gym and equestrian centre. It includes free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at Can Curreu are spacious with soft lighting and pastel décor. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a balcony with pleasant views and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. The suites also have a kitchenette and large lounge area with sofa. Can Curreu’s modern restaurant serves breakfast, as well as traditional cuisine from Ibiza. The hotel has a bar, and room service is also available. The resort has a spa and wellness centre with hot tub, Turkish baths and massage treatments. It is located 200 metres from Dalias Market and there are 10 different beaches within a 10-minute drive. You can drive to Ibiza Airport in around 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Blau Parc
address: Velaquez, 9, Playa Calo Des Moro, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: M. Hotel
address: C/Reyes Catolicos Nº8, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: M. HOTEL has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Antonio. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. The property is allergy-free and is situated 450 metres from Calo des Moro Beach. At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a garden view. All rooms have a safety deposit box. Guests at M. HOTEL can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near M. HOTEL include San Antonio Beach, Es Pouet Beach and Café del Mar. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Nativo Hotel Ibiza
address: Calle De Los Claveles 24, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Santa Eularia des Riu, within 6 km of Las Dalias Hippy Market and 1.9 km of Ibiza Conference Centre, the Nativo Hotel Ibiza, offers accommodation with a restaurant and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service from 11:30 am to 11:30 pm. The property is set 1.3 km from Santa Eulalia Bus Stop. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room includes air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the restaurant of the Nativo Hotel Ibiza The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness center. Santa Eulalia Port is 1.5 km from the Nativo Hotel Ibiza. The Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Can Jaume Private Villas by Ocean Drive
address: Puig de'n Valls, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Ibiza Town, 1.9 km from Marina Botafoch, Can Jaume Private Villas by Ocean Drive offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Located around 7.3 km from Aguamar Water Park, the hotel with free WiFi is also 15 km away from San Antonio Bus Station. The property features a hot tub, restaurant and shared lounge, and Ibiza Port is 3.7 km away. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. The units feature a wardrobe. Guests at Can Jaume Private Villas by Ocean Drive can enjoy a continental breakfast. San Antonio Port is 15 km from the accommodation, while Ibiza Conference Centre is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza, 8 km from Can Jaume Private Villas by Ocean Drive, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Las Arenas
address: C/ Tit Livi, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set overlooking the sea, this hotel is only a short walk away from Ca’n Pastilla beach. It is only 100 metres from the bus stop that takes you to Palma city centre. Palma Airport is 5 minutes' drive away. Hotel Las Arenas features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace bar with sea views. There is also a buffet restaurant, and a lounge bar with music and shows. Las Arenas hotel is the ideal place to enjoy a holiday on the beach and in the Majorcan sunshine. From here you can also easily get to a variety of shops, and bars. Alternatively, the centre of Palma de Mallorca, the capital of the island is just a short bus ride away. There you can find numerous excellent bars, and a lively nightlife.

name: Hipotels Playa De Palma Palace
address: 7600 Avd. Fra Joan Llabres Playa De Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa features a garden, a terrace, an outdoor pool and a spa centre. There is free WiFi throughout. All rooms are spacious and have a balcony, a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some feature a seating area and views of the sea or the pool. The spa offers a range of beauty treatments, a hamman and a sauna for an extra cost. There is also a free hot tub and a fitness centre. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.6 km from Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa, while Playa de Palma Beach is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Private parking is available on site.

name: Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma
address: Avenida Fra Joan Llabrés, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea. This modern hotel is 2 km from Aqualand El Arenal. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for cycling lovers and the hotel has bicycles for rent. Car hire is available as well. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

name: THB Niagara
address: Padre Bartolome Salva, 5, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: THB Niagara features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Playa de Palma. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At THB Niagara every room comes with bed linen and towels. You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and car hire is available. Playa de Palma Beach is 200 metres from THB Niagara, while Calo de Sant Antoni Beach is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: BQ Belvedere Hotel
address: Mitja Lluna, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set just 850 metres from Cala Mayor, BQ Belvedere Hotel offers a free shuttle service to Palmanova Beach and free parking. It features a large lagoon pool and 2 hot tubs. All of the rooms at BQ Belvedere Hotel come with a private balcony. They all have air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. A regular entertainment programme is provided for children, including activities in the kids’ pool and live shows. A mini club is also available. All-inclusive accommodation is offered at a good price at the hotel. The Belvedere has a large garden area and sun terrace with snack-bar service, as well as a buffet restaurant. There is also a private bicycle parking. BQ Belvedere Hotel is 4 km from central Palma de Mallorca and less than 15 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. The shops of Cala Mayor are only 500 metres away.

name: Palau Sa Font
address: Carrer Apuntadors, 38, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The boutique hotel Palau Sa Font is a beautifully renovated 16th-century palace set in the historic centre of Palma, near the Cathedral and the beach. It features comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and distinctive art displayed on each of the room doors. Located a walking distance from the city's cultural sights, the port and the shopping district of Paseo Borne and Jaume III, the hotel is only 5 to 10 minutes' walk from the trendy area of Santa Catalina. All rooms at the Palau Sa Font are elegant and well-equipped. There is air conditioning, cable TV and a minibar. Bathrooms include a hairdryer. The hotel's lookout tower offers panoramic views of the cathedral and the old city. There is also a terrace with a small swimming pool. Guests can also use a shared computer with internet access. The property serves a delicious breakfast with a unique Mallorcan touch. There is also a bar open all day. This pet-friendly and smoke-free hotel combines practical facilities with attractive architecture. Bicycle and car rental are available on site.

name: Bo Hotel Palma
address: Carrer Jaume Ferrer 2, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering a sun terrace and hot tub, BO Hotel Palma is located in Palma de Mallorca in the Majorca Region. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Enjoy a cup of coffee while looking out at the sea or city. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Superior rooms have a spa bath. The hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel offers a continental breakfast. The area is popular for golfing and cycling. The hotel also offers bike hire. Palma Yacht Club is 500 metres from BO Hotel Palma, while Palma Port is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Universal Hotel Neptuno - Adults Only
address: Calle Llaut 34, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel enjoys a fantastic position right on the beachfront at Majorca’s Playa de Palma. Its 2 outdoor pools overlook the glistening Mediterranean Sea. At the Neptuno you can work up a sweat in the sauna or gym before cooling off in the outdoor hot tub or swimming pool. There is also an indoor heated pool open in April and October for the guests. You can also choose to simply relax on a sun lounger on the terrace. In the evening, try a delicious meal in the cafe-restaurant before enjoying a refreshing drink in the lounge bar. Majorca’s nearby capital of Palma is an ideal daytrip from this hotel. This historic city is known as one of the most picturesque in Spain. It 1 outdoor pool overlooks the glistening Mediterranean Sea. This seasonal hotel is open between February and November.

name: Hotel Playa Golf
address: Carretera Del Arenal 45, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Playa Golf is located on Playa de Palma Beach, 10 minutes’ drive outside Palma. It offers an outdoor pool, spa, fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. Rooms at the Playa Golf are bright and feature simple, comfortable décor. They are equipped with satellite TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The hotel has a buffet restaurant as well as two bar-restaurants. There are also 3 bars with a terrace, including one with a Balinese theme. Other services at the property include bicycle parking for an additional cost. Leisure facilities at the Playa Golf Hotel include tennis courts. There is also a car rental service and staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Mallorca. Puntiró and Marriot’s Son Antem Golf Courses are both around 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel. You can drive to Palma Airport in just 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Timor
address: Calle Montemar, 12, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Timor is a 4-star hotel located 150 metres from the beach in Playa de Palma. It offers a wide range of leisure facilities including outdoor and indoor swimming pools. Air-conditioned rooms at the Timor hotel feature a private terrace, some of them with spectacular views of Palma de Mallorca Bay. They come with a flat-screen satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer. There is also a mini fridge and free Wi-Fi. The area around the outdoor swimming pool has a snack bar, hammocks and loungers, while the indoor swimming pool features a sauna, a hot tub and a gym. Other facilities at Hotel Timor include a buffet restaurant, a paddle court and a games room. There is a discotheque and a daily entertainment programme. Guests practicing bicycle touring can store their bikes in the special garage. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Bq Aguamarina Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer de Sant Antoni de la Platja, 41, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: BQ Aguamarina Boutique Hotel is in Can Pastilla, overlooking Cala Estancia Beach. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a welcome gift and private balconies, most with sea views. Free WiFi is available. This charming boutique hotel is close to Palma de Mallorca Airport. It is 12 km to the centre of Palma and there are regular buses from near the hotel. BQ Aguamarina Boutique Hotel has a bar and a buffet restaurant. Guests are also welcome to enjoy a rooftop pool and bar, at BQ Lounge. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk. Bicycle rental and luggage storage are offered. For reservations of more than 5 rooms, special conditions will apply; The establishment may contact the client to request a prepayment. The establishment may cancel a group reservation if it is suspected of being fraudulent.

name: THB El Cid
address: Calle Vaixell 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This recently refurbished holiday resort has a fantastic seafront location in a beautiful Mediterranean setting, conveniently positioned just a short drive from the airport. It has free Wi-Fi. THB El Cid - Adults Only, with its peaceful, seaside location, offers well-appointed accommodation, sea views and great facilities and offers a great base while you enjoy all Majorca has to offer. You will never be short of things to do at this complex that features 3 swimming pools (one heated), gardens, a tennis court, a bicycle garage and table-tennis. Guests will also find a sauna, steam bath and a gym. Seasonal hotel: open from February to October.

name: Concepció by Nobis, Palma, a Member by Design Hotels
address: Carrer De La Concepció 34, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Palma de Mallorca. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 1.8 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels offers a sauna. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels.

name: Antigua Palma Casa Noble
address: Calle Del Sol 1, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Well located in the Old Town of Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Antigua Palma - Casa Noble provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, hammam and a 24-hour front desk. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. At Hotel Antigua Palma - Casa Noble each room has a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness centre, take a dip into the indoor pool, organise trips at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the surroundings. Popular points of interest near Hotel Antigua Palma - Casa Noble include Plaza Mayor, Palma Cathedral and Palma Convention Centre. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Mhouse Boutique Hotel Palma
address: Carrer De Can Maçanet, 1 A, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This central boutique hotel is 100 metres from Palma de Mallorca's Plaza de España and Sóller Train Station. Rooms come equipped with free internet, rainfall showers and Smart TV with satellite channels. MHOUSE Boutique Hotel Palma is set around a charming indoor courtyard, where meals and cocktails are served in summer. This hotel is open throughout the year. Elegant rooms at the MHOUSE Boutique Hotel Palma feature air conditioning, a minibar, Marshall Bluetooth speakers and a free laptop safe and coffee machine. Some overlook the courtyard, and others have city views. The hotel's restaurant offers creative Mediterranean dishes. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Private parking is available for an extra charge. Palma Cathedral and the city's old town are 900 metres away. Access to public transport is available nearby.

name: Melia South Beach
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, Nº 1, Calvià Beach Resort, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront at Calvia Beach, Meliá South Beach features 4 seasonal outdoor pools and stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel offers an a la càrte restaurant,The Cape Nao Beach Club. Each spacious room at Meliá South Beach has bright, contemporary décor. There is air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes free organic toiletries, plus bathrobe and slippers. Meliá South Beach's poolside bar offers Spanish tapas, fresh seafood and other light dishes. Restaurants, bars and cafés can also be found by the seafront. It is located next to Nikki Beach Club & Restaurant, The hotel Yhi Spa features unique beauty treatments and massage services and a fitness room. Free yoga and pilates classes are also included. One of the pools is adults-only, where you can find Balinese beds to relax on, another one is only for the level guests and the other pool is for children. Room service is available 24 hours. The centre of Palma is 15 km from the Meliá South Beach, while the city’s airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The hotel also offers a private jet service. You can drive to both Puerto Portals and Puerto Adriano within 15 minutes.

name: Summum Prime Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Concepcion 26, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Palma de Mallorca's Old Town, 0.5 km from Passeig del Born, Summum Prime Boutique Hotel features a sun terrace with a small pool and a spa centre. Palma Cathedral is 0.7 from the property, while Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 2,6 km away. Set within the 15th-century Ca'n Berga-Ladaria Palace, Summum Prime Boutique Hotel offers rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. Each room has a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy the on-site bar. The hotel also offers bike hire. Palma Yacht Club is 900 metres from Summum Prime Boutique Hotel, while Cala Major Beach is 4.1 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the property.

name: Be Live Experience Costa Palma
address: Calle Guillen Díaz Playa, 2, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on Cala Major Beach, Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma is a hotel with attractive rooms with balconies. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma's air-conditioned rooms have modern décor and flat-screen TV. A minibar is available at an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a range of Mediterranean cuisine in the buffet restaurant, which offers live show cooking. There is also a bar. Guests will also find eating options at the complex's Plaza area, including The Bakery, Sports Bar and Burger & Pizzeria. The Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma is within 200 metres of San Augustí Marina. The centre of Palma is 6 km away and you can drive to Palma Airport in 20 minutes.

name: Meliá Calviá Beach
address: Calle Violeta 1, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering impressive sea views from its setting, the stylish beachfront hotel Meliá Calviá Beach features 3 outdoor swimming pools, 1 heated indoor pool and direct access to the beach. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a balcony. Rooms are decorated in an elegant, contemporary style. All accommodation offers satellite TV and a minibar. Rooms overlook the sea, gardens or pool area. The hotel features spacious terraces with sea and pool view, as well as 2 restaurants - a la carte and buffet style - offering international cuisine. There is also a pool bar and a lounge bar with a wide range of snacks and drinks. Set in attractive gardens, Meliá Calviá Beach has a large sun terrace with loungers. The hotel offers a lagoon-style pool, one pool for kids, one exclusive pool for the Level Clients and one indoor pool. There is a daily entertainment programme for adults and children, and guests can also relax at the YHI Spa. Meliá Calviá Beach also offers guests special rates for Katmandu Park. The hotel also offers The Level personalized service in some of the hotel’s rooms. This service includes, among others, private reception space, express check-in and check-out, access to a private pool, free usage of superior amenities, pillow menu and a la carte breakfast service in the room. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the centre of Magalluf and there is a selection of golf courses within 5 km of the hotel. Palma and its airport can be reached in 25 minutes, by car.

name: Hotel Negresco - Adults Only
address: Neopatria, 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated on the seafront in Playa de Palma, Negresco has an outdoor pool. All of the air-conditioned rooms offer full or side sea views. The airport is just 5 km away. The rooms have satellite TV, private balconies and double-glazing. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Negresco has a bar and a restaurant serving buffet breakfast and dinner. There is a large terrace by the pool where you can enjoy a drink. The terrace also has free loungers. On-site parking and spa are available at an extra cost. The Negresco can also arrange car hire.

name: Hotel Mirador
address: Paseo Maritimo 10, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Hotel Mirador offers wonderful views across Palma Harbour, towards Palma Cathedral. It has a spa, and air-conditioned rooms with large windows, satellite TV and free WiFi. All of the spacious, soundproofed rooms have telephones, safes and a small fridge. They have white walls, and most have balconies. Rooms include free access to the spa including a heated whirlpool, sauna and Turkish baths. The Hotel Mirador offers car hire. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers a breakfast. The historic centre of Palma de Mallorca, including the Cathedral, is about 1.5 km away. There is a regular bus service to the airport leaving from outside the hotel.

name: Hotel Basilica
address: Carrer de Can Troncoso 3, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated conveniently in Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Basilica offers air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Private parking can be arranged and subject to reservation. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe. At Hotel Basilica all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Hotel Basilica offers a sun terrace. Es Molinar Beach is 1.9 km from the hotel, while Palma Yacht Club is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 9 km from Hotel Basilica, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel San Lorenzo - Adults Only
address: C/San Lorenzo 14, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This boutique hotel is set in a traditional Majorcan manor house with an outdoor swimming pool. It features spacious and uniquely decorated rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Hotel San Lorenzo has an elegant Art Deco bar where guests can enjoy a drink. Smoking is only permitted in the hotel’s garden. Situated in the centre of Palma in the old Sant Pere district, San Lorenzo is a 5-minute walk from the elegant Jaume III Avenue. The property is also just a few minutes’ walk from Sa Llonja with many bars and restaurants.

name: Hm Dunas Blancas
address: Calle Trasimeno 12, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Dunas Blancas Hotel is 50 metres from Mallorca’s Playa de Palma Beach. It offers 2 seasonal outdoor pools, and is 100 metres from bus stops for Palma Airport and centre. Air-conditioned rooms at the HM Dunas Blancas have a private balcony. They are also heated and come with satellite TV and a private bathroom. You can hire the safe. The hotel’s buffet restaurant features show cooking. There is also a poolside café-bar and packed lunches can be requested. You can play table tennis and darts in the games room, and there is a lounge with satellite TV. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Palma city centre is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Calatrava
address: Plaza Llorenc Villalonga 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located next to Palma’s Parque del Mar and the old city walls, Hotel Calatrava features a free spa and stylish rooms. Set in the old town, it serves breakfast on its terrace, offering views of the Mediterranean Sea. Each spacious room at Hotel Calatrava features chic, modern décor. All rooms have free Wi-Fi, a minibar, air conditioning, a Smart flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers, free toiletries, a hairdryer with diffuser and a hairstraightener. They offer lovely views of Palma's old town, the bay or Parque del Mar. The hotel's Calatrava Gastro-Gourmet offers a variety of seasonal and traditional Mallorcan products. You can enjoy drinks, homemade pastries and snacks in the interior lounge or in the terrace. The free spa, for private use, features a Finnish sauna, a hot tub, treatment cabins and sensation showers with aromatherapy. Pilates and yoga classes are also available under request. Palma Cathedral and Almudaina Palace are within 350 metres of the Calatrava. Palma’s marina and seafront promenade can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

name: Hotel Saratoga
address: Paseo De Mallorca, 6, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, the luxurious Saratoga hotel has a rooftop pool with beautiful city views. It has been renewed and it features free Wi-Fi throughout. The hotel is located 5 minutes’ walk from the Contemporary Art Museum, the port and Palma Cathedral. It is also just 60 metres from the exclusive Jaime III shopping avenue. The spacious and elegant rooms at the Saratoga have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning in summer and heating in winter. Most rooms have a private balcony. Enjoy the swimming pool located on the rooftop with an amazing view to the port of Palma and the Bellver Castle or have a quiet time on the two other pool areas, which are available on the ground floor even in Winter since there is a heated one. In the same area you can find the fitness room and the Spa, where you can relax while having a massage*. Spa threatments under availability and additional cost*. Bringing a car shouldn't be a problem since there is a private underground parking at the property, there is an additional cost for using it and It is subject to availability and request.

name: Nou Baleares
address: Plaza de las Columnas, 07006 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Nou Baleares has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Palma de Mallorca. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk. The rooms at the hotel have air conditioning. Guests at Nou Baleares can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a terrace. Palma Yacht Club is 3.2 km from Nou Baleares, while Palma Port is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hm Balanguera Beach- Adults Only
address: Calle Marbella, 35, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Balanguera Beach is situated metres from popular Palma Beach and within 5 km of Aeropuerto de Palma. The hotel is a convenient base from which to enjoy Majorca's great climate. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All the rooms are en suite and many have their own balcony. Although the beach is just steps away, the complex also has a swimming pool with a bar service. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served as a buffet, and the dining room is non-smoking. Palma Beach offers an enjoyable base for a holiday given the range of activities on offers from water sports to a walk along the seafront promenade. Palma city is approximately 20 minutes' drive away.

name: Hesperia Ciudad de Mallorca
address: Francisco Vidal Sureda, 24, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in attractive gardens in the residential area of La Bonanova, Hesperia Ciudad de Mallorca features an outdoor seasonal swimming pool with sun loungers. Most rooms include a balcony, satellite TV and free WiFi. Rooms at the hotel feature soft colours and simple, modern design. They include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities. A fitness centre is available. The hotel can organise bicycle and car rental for guests. It can also help to plan excursions in Palma de Mallorca. Hesperia Ciudad de Mallorca is just 10 minutes' drive from the centre of Palma de Mallorca. It is 800 metres from Bellver Castle and Bellver Forest, and Cala Mayor Beach is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Palma Airport, 15 km away from the hotel.

name: Myseahouse Flamingo
address: Misión San Diego, 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront of Playa de Palma, Hotel Flamingo - Adults Only 4* Sup boasts two outdoor swimming pool with sea views and has free WiFi throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each charming room at this hotel comes with a balcony or a terrace. All of them include satellite TV, a telephone and a free safety deposit box. Most rooms have lateral or frontal views of the Mediterranean sea. Hotel Flamingo offers a spa with a pool, hydromassage baths, thermal circuit, steam bath a sauna and "sensation" showers. It has a relaxation area with loungers and direct access to the garden. The accommodation offers a gym and a bicycle room for washing and storing the bicycles. Guests have easy access to different activities in the area nearby the hotel. Palma's Old Town is 10 minutes' drive from the property. Bars, restaurants and shops are within walking distance from the hotel. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 3 km away.

name: Castillo Hotel Son Vida, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Mallorca
address: Carrer Raixa 2, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: As of 2022, we invite you to discover our refurbished Rooms & Suites, inspired by Mallorca´s indigenous charms and treasures. An Adults Only 16+ hotel, with captivating panoramic views towards the bay of Palma, Castillo Hotel Son Vida embodies the alluring lifestyle of its affluent neighborhood. Combining an enriching heritage with thoughtful service, the sophisticated ambience extends throughout 164 guestrooms and suites. Surrounded by three excellent golf courses and featuring outdoor swimming pools for unequalled recreation, the 5-star luxury hotel also offers prime downtime at Castillo Hotel Son Vida Spa, including a 24-hour fitness center. A dining destination on its own, an inspired range of restaurants, make the most of the unsurpassed vistas, from fine dining El Castell to the chic Pool Bar. Our meeting rooms boasting natural day light, create the perfect setting for corporate and social events.Marriott

name: Grupotel Taurus Park
address: Avinguda America, 7, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated 500 metres from Playa de Palma Beach, Grupotel Taurus Park offers tennis courts, indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub and gym. A private balcony can be found in each air-conditioned room. A wide range of regional and international dishes are served in the buffet restaurant. There is also a lounge bar with a terrace. Guests can enjoy evening entertainment, shows and music. Each room at the Taurus Park includes bright, functional décor and satellite TV. A safe is available at an extra cost. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Grupotel Taurus Park is situated on Palma Bay, 1.5 km from S’Arenal Harbour. Mallorca Airport is just 4 km away.

name: Protur Naisa Palma Hotel
address: Carrer De Simó Ballester 6, 07011 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, 2.2 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, Protur Naisa Palma Hotel provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Protur Naisa Palma Hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the accommodation. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Popular points of interest near Protur Naisa Palma Hotel include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 9 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bg Hotel Pamplona
address: C/ Neopatria, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Pamplona offers modern 4-star accommodation, as well as a private beach, a sauna and an outdoor pool. It provides a spa, as well as free Wi-Fi, body treatments and a kids pool. Hotel Pamplona Palma treats guests to a range of leisure facilities, including billiards, bicycle rental and Swimming Pool. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Hotel Pamplona has 165 well-appointed rooms, each with an en suite bathroom. The traditional bar is an ideal place to relax with a beverage after a meal at the restaurant, which offers international cuisine for dinner. Breakfast is available 7 days a week and room service can be requested. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants in the vicinity. Hotel Pamplona Palma is surrounded by the area's popular tourist attractions, including Palma Aquarium, which is a short walk away. Visit Mallorca StadiumVisit Mallorca Stadium is within an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma - Adults Only
address: Avenida America 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering an outdoor pool and sun terrace, Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only is set in Playa de Palma. The hotel has a spa centre and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hair dryer. Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only features free WiFi throughout the property. The property has 3 on-site restaurants; an Asian-fusion restaurant, Bistro restaurant, and a Buffet restaurant. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Bike storage is available for a cost. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.8 km from Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only, while Playa de Palma Beach is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Please note that dress code allowed in buffet is shorts. (No swimsuit, no tank tops, no flip-flops) and A la carte restaurants: long pants.

name: Alua Leo
address: C/ Manuela de Los Herreros nº12, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located just 100 metres from Can Pastilla Beach, Alua Leo offers outdoor swimming pools. It is set in Majorca’s Palma Beach. The hotel offers comfortable, bright rooms with a private bathroom. All rooms have air conditioning and TV. Some offer sea views. Free WiFi is available in the common areas of the hotel. Alua Leo also has a large pool-side area, with sun loungers and a bar. There is also a buffet restaurant, serving international and local food. There are also many lively bars a short walk away in Palma Beach. Palma city centre is 9km from the hotel. The airport is just 4km away.

name: Sant Francesc Hotel Singular
address: Plaza Sant Francesc, 5, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 5-star Sant Francesc Hotel Singular is located in a 19th-century manor house in the beautiful Plaza de Sant Francesc. Located in the old town of Palma de Mallorca, it is only 300 metres from Palma Cathedral and 600 metres from Palma Port. The hotel has 42 elegant rooms and suites. All are tastefully designed to make you feel at home, many with wood-beamed ceilings and covered verandas, as well as others that feature original frescoes and moldings. All the rooms have free WiFi access, air conditioning, a Nespresso coffee maker, minibar, flat-screen TV and satellite television. The Sant Francesc Hotel Singular has an elegant restaurant, Restaurant Quadrat, a lobby bar and patio, and the Singular Rooftop Terrace, with a 30 m² pool, where you can enjoy the wonderful views over Plaza Sant Francesc. The hotel also has a gym and offers beauty treatments.

name: Hotel Can Quetglas
address: Carrer de Santa Rita 13, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, 2.7 km from Calo des Grells Beach, Hotel Can Quetglas provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Hotel Can Quetglas features certain rooms with pool views, and rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Can Quetglas. Palma Yacht Club is 2.5 km from the hotel, while Palma Port is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 10 km from Hotel Can Quetglas.

name: Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa
address: C/ Ramal Ca Na Gabriela, 4, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Situated just 5 minutes’ walk from the beach of Bahía de Palma, this attractive hotel features a large outdoor pool and luxurious spa. The suites feature a seating area and small kitchenette. The spa at Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa includes a hydromassage indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Massage and aromatherapy treatments are available. A buffet breakfast is served at Playa de Palma. In the evenings guests can enjoy international and Majorcan cuisine. There is also a poolside snack bar. The city of Palma is 15 km away. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are both within a 20-minute drive.

name: Bq Apolo Hotel
address: Carrer Miquel Massuti, 28, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: BQ Apolo Hotel is 150 metres from Ca’n Pastilla Beach in Mallorca, just 2 km from Palma Airport. It offers indoor and outdoor pools and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. The rooms at the BQ Apolo Hotel feature tiled floors and simple décor. Each one is equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves international food. There is also a terrace snack bar where you can get a drink or light meal throughout the day. BQ Apolo Hotel provides a pool for your leisure. You can also hire a car or bicycle from the 24-hour reception. Palma city centre is 15 minutes’ drive away. Regular bus services to the airport leave from a stop 300 metres from the hotel. Seasonal hotel: open from February to November.

name: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá
address: Avenida Joan Miro 21, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá has an ideal location in central Palma, offering views of its marina, just 100 metres away. This hotel features parking and indoor and outdoor swimming pools. Many of the rooms at Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá offer views of Palma Bay. They come with flat-screen TVs, satellite channels and a CD player. A bathrobe and slippers are also included. Air conditioning or heating is featured in the rooms according to the season. The Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá’s Marivent restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and La Terraza del Victoria Restaurant serves dinners. The cocktail bar has a terrace offering views of the marina and the Cathedral. The hotel also has a bicycle center with safety hooks for bicycles and professional tools. Bellver Castle and the entrance to the surrounding park are approximately 500 metres from the Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá. There are a number of bars and clubs within a short walk of the hotel.

name: HM Alma Beach - Adults Only
address: Carrer De Bellamar, 7, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Alma Beach is situated in Palma de Mallorca and features complimentary Wi-Fi. It also offers a rooftop terrace, a kids pool and a swimming pool. This 4-star hotel provides a 24-hour reception, bicycle rental and a sun deck. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The rooms at HM Alma Beach are air-conditioned and offer heating, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. They are also fitted with a shower, a hair dryer and cable/satellite channels. Those staying at the hotel can sample regional and Japanese cuisines at the on-site restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by for a meal. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés nearby. HM Alma Beach is a short car trip from Son Sant Joan Airport and Bay Of Palma. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Palma de Mallorca.Revato

name: Nixe Palace
address: Avenida Joan Miro 269, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The luxury Nixe Palace is situated next to Cala Major Beach and the Marivent Palace. It offers an outdoor pool, a free spa and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. Rooms at the Nixe Palace are modern. They include satellite TV and a large bathroom with toiletries, bathrobe and slippers. The Nixe’s specialised golf department offers trips to local courses and discounted green fees. Nearby golf courses include Son Vida and Son Muntaner. Hotel Nixe Palace has 3 restaurants, offering the best Mediterranean cuisine, fresh seafood and international dishes. There is also a poolside bar and a garden. The hotel's spa offers a thermal circuit, Turkish steam bath, ice fountain, heated loungers and fantastic sea views. There is also a gym, and massage treatments are available. Entry is subject to a surcharge.

name: Bq Amfora Beach - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Volanti, 9, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: BQ Amfora Beach - Adults Only Hotel is a 4-star Adults Only Hotel located in Majorca’s Can Pastilla, just 300 metres from the beach. This hotel offers free WiFi, an outdoor pool, buffet restaurant and a 24-hour reception. The Amfora Beach’s bright rooms have attractive parquet floors and soundproofing. All feature a private balcony, with some offering views over the swimming pool. The BQ Amfora Beach - Adults Only Hotel is just a 5-minute walk from a range of bars and restaurants. Can Pastilla Harbour is 400 metres away, while Palma Aquarium can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. Palma Airport is a 5-minute drive from the hotel, and Palma city centre is just 12 km away. Regular bus services connect the hotel to central Palma.

name: Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel
address: Carrer de la Vinagrella, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The first golf resort on the island, Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel, continues to be a favored destination for sports enthusiasts and families. Blending Palma’s easy living with sporting heritage and generational appeal, the 93 rooms and suites are designed to suit modern lives. A first-choice location for golfers, Golf Son Vida’s 18th hole is placed within putting distance from the hotel. Bordered by two additional 18-hole pro-standard options, Golf Son Muntaner and Golf Son Quint including a pitch and putt, Sheraton Mallorca is unhindered by boundaries, with fairways and hotel grounds seamlessly merging to create an evergreen environment. Championing a family-friendly dynamic, the hotel’s extensive choice of activities, ranges from playing tennis and volleyball to catering for those willing to explore the island by bike. The brand new Arabella Kids & Tweens Club awaits to welcome our young guests, with fun games and exciting activities. Stay fit while travelling at our new Sheraton Fitness.Marriott

name: Hotel Obelisco
address: Camí de Les Meravelles, 10, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering rooms with balconies, Hotel Obelisco is set just 200 metres from Playa de Palma Beach. It features indoor and outdoor swimming pools, a gym and a restaurant. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Obelisco has bright, modern décor. There is a flat-screen TV, a rental safe and a minibar for an extra cost. The buffet restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a bar and a café. The hotel also features a sauna, tennis courts and table tennis. Staff can arrange bicycle hire and the hotel offers storage for bikes. Located in Las Maravillas, Obelisco is less than 4 km from Palma Airport. The city centre is just 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Pabisa Bali Park & Tower
address: C/ Padre Bartolome Salva, 18, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is located in Playa de Palma, 350 meters from the beach and 12 km from Palma. The hotel has 264 rooms, double and single, and two suites located on the 13th floor. It has a restaurant, bar, swimming pool (open in winter) and outdoor pool with children's section, sun terrace with sun beds and umbrellas (free), snack bar (open in summer), fitness center and conference room as well Internet terminal (charges apply) and Wi-Fi in the Lobby. The hotel is certified for Travelife and included in its collection as accommodation that is working to protect the local environment and preserve the quality of the destination as well as the lives of local communities.FarePortal

name: Hotel Can Cera - Adults Only
address: San Francisco, 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Can Cera is a 17th-century palace in the historic centre of Palma de Mallorca with a free spa. The airy rooms have antique-style furniture, minibar and flat-screen satellite TV. All of the air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi, and some have a balcony or terrace. The stylish, modern bathrooms have a bathrobe, slippers, a hairdyer with diffuser and a hairstraightener. The Hotel Can Cera has an attractive terrace and traditional courtyard. The spa has a free sauna, contrast shower and hot tub for private use and the hotel can also arrange massage at an extra cost. The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine and there is a cafe and a stylish bar. Palma Cathedral is about 300 metres away, while the city’s harbour can be reached in about 5 minutes on foot.

name: HM Tropical
address: Carrer Marbella, 16, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated opposite Palma Beach, HM Tropical offers an outdoor swimming pool and a 24-hour reception. Each air-conditioned room has a private balcony. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available off site. All of the rooms at HM Tropical Hotel have practical tiled floors, satellite TV and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer. You can enjoy regional and international cuisine at the HM’s buffet restaurant. Snacks are available from the bar, which has an outdoor terrace area. The lively Playa de Palma area has numerous bars and discos. There are regular buses to Palma city centre, 9 km away. Palma Airport is less than 3 km away. Staff at the HM Tropical can arrange car rental, and free parking can be found nearby.

name: Kimpton Aysla Mallorca, An IHG Hotel
address: 37 Santa Ponsa Calvia, 07180 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: LUXURY SANCTUARY MEETS MODERN WELLNESS COMMUNITY Kimpton Aysla Mallorca is a modern sanctuary of calm and well-being in Santa Ponsa – Calvia just 14km from Palma. Nestled among lush native gardens imbued with Mallorcan light. A progressive take on wellness resort life, where active leisure meets utter relaxation, and touches of tradition blend with contemporary living. This is modern, relaxed luxury – Mallorca style. It’s an inspiring morning workout, a laid-back breakfast, and a replenishing smooth almond horchata with a twist. It’s a quick check of your socials, a plunge in the day's pool of choice, and a relaxed game of afternoon Tennis at Mallorca Country Club, maybe a round of golf at Golf Santa Ponsa, escape to the beach or take a quick hike. As the sun sets, it’s a balmy evening spent on the terrace with fine organic wine, great food, and sparkling conversation. This is the good life and it’s as good as it gets!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Can Alomar - Adults Only
address: Calle Sant Feliu, 1, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a plunge pool, Hotel Can Alomar is set in the tree-lined Paseo del Borne Boulevard in the centre of Palma. There is free WiFi throughout. The spacious rooms feature satellite TV, king-size beds, a seating area and safe. The bathrooms feature a bath or a shower, hairdryer with diffuser, hairstraightener, free toiletries, and complimentary bathrobe and slippers. Room service is available. The hotel has a relaxation area located in the sun terrace, featuring a plunge pool with hot tub. It offers massages and private yoga and pilates classes at an extra charge. Treatments are also available in the Viewing Tower, with spectacular views over the cathedral and the bay. The property's trendy restaurant, De Tokio a Lima, offers a fusion of Japanese, Peruvian and Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a bar with a terrace. Set 500 metres from the seafront promenade and 1 km from the beach, Hotel Can Alomar is located a 5-minute walk from Mallorca Cathedral and Almudaina Palace. There are several shops and restaurants in the boulevard where the hotel is located.

name: Hotel Cappuccino - Palma
address: Plaza de Cort, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the heart of Palma de Mallorca’s Old Town, HOTEL CAPPUCCINO, The Magic Hotel by Grupo Cappuccino is a luxury hotel offering a rooftop pool with city views, spa and a cinema. Palma Cathedral is 500 metres away. The hotel hosts a large art collection and there is an interior courtyard with palm trees. Each exclusive room has been designed by interior designer Jacques Grange and features air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and minibar. The private bathrooms include free toiletries, hairdryer and bathrobe and slippers. Palma’s Marina and Promenade are 10 minutes’ walk away. Palma Airport is 15 minutes’ drive from HOTEL CAPPUCCINO, The Magic Hotel by Grupo Cappuccino.

name: Eurostars Marivent
address: Calle Dina Moore, 6, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Marivent is 800 metres from Cala Mayor Beach, opposite Marivent Palace and 5 minutes’ walk from the Joan Miró Foundation. It has a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. The spacious, air-conditioned Marivent rooms have a private terrace. The pool area has a areas for children and adults. There is also a sun terrace with a poolside café-bar. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Marivent, and there is also a snack-bar and a cafeteria. Marivent is located a short walk from the Porto Pi Shopping Centre and the Club de Mar. Bellver Castle and Palma old town are 17 minutes' drive away.

name: Portofino Mallorca
address: Trafalgar 24 Ciudad Jardin, 07007 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Portofino Mallorca is just 2 km from Palma de Mallorca Airport and 100 metres from the beach. There is a large outdoor swimming pool, a bar and free Wi-Fi. All of the Portofino’s modern, soundproofed rooms have satellite TV, air conditioning and free safes. They have views of the sea, mountains or swimming pool. The hotel’s Portofino Bar has a terrace overlooking the pool. Located in Palma’s Ciudad Jardín area, the hotel is about 5 km from the city’ historic centre. The seafront promenade is also close by, and is great for taking a walk or cycling. There is also a large supermarket about 300 metres away.

name: Meliá Palma Marina
address: Avenida Gabriel Roca, 29, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This grand hotel features a spa centre, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace with views of the sea and the Bay of Palma. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Meliá Palma Marina come with a twin bed or double bed, subject to availability, flat-screen satellite TV and heating / air conditioner, depending on the season. Meliá Palma Marina’s 950m² Yhi spa includes contrast showers, a sauna, a dynamic pool with hot tub and a Turkish bath. All guests have free access to the well-equipped fitness centre. Other spa facilities incur an additional cost. The Palma Marina is located on the seafront promenade, just 500 metres from Palma de Mallorca’s 14th-century Bellver Castle. Palma Cathedral is only 1.5 km away. There are many restaurants and clubs in the local area. The hotel offers a daily buffet breakfast at the Arado Restaurant & Grocery. There is also a lobby bar and a pool bar in summer.

name: Hotel Palma Bellver Affiliated by Meliá
address: Paseo Maritimo 11, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Palma Bellver, managed by Meliá is situated on the seafront in Palma de Mallorca, with views over Palma Bay and the marina. It offers free access to its gym and outdoor pool. Rooms at the Palma Bellver Hotel are all soundproofed and include a private terrace. They have air conditioning and heating, as well as a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is also available. A buffet breakfast is served in the restaurant. An à la carte menu is available and guests can enjoy meals on the terrace overlooking the sea. There is also a bar. The centre of Palma is 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. There are several golf courses nearby including Son Vida and Son Campo.

name: Hotel Luxor
address: Avenida Son Rigo, 21, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Luxor is in the Las Maravillas quiet area of popular Playa de Palma, 200 metres from the beach. It features 1 outdoor swimming pool, 1 wading pool, and 1 children's pool. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Rooms at Hotel Luxor come with a balcony and air conditioning. They also offer a TV and radio. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and bath or shower. The outdoor swimming pools are surrounded by a sun terrace and a garden. Luxor offers a tennis court, bicycle rental, a buffet restaurant with show cooking, and a bar. Palma Airport is only 5 kilometres away.

name: INNSiDE Palma Center
address: Font I Monteros 23, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Innside Palma Center is a design hotel located in Palma. Guests enjoy free access to a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool. The property also offers paid facilities such as a gym, an indoor pool, hot tub and Turkish bath. Innside Palma Center is a 15-minute walk from Palma Cathedral and the seafront. Direct buses to Palma Airport stop at Palma Bus Station, 500 metres away. Plaça d’Espanya Train Station is situated 500 metres from the hotel, providing links to all parts of Mallorca. This property's rooms have modern, elegant décor and wooden floors. They come with a minibar, flat-screen satellite TV, a laptop safe and a selection of pillows. There is free WiFi throughout. Pintamonas restaurant has a lounge bar and the Rooftop Bar, on the 7th floor, offers city views.

name: Aya Seahotel
address: Carretera Arenal, 60, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Dinner service is a la carte. Drinks are not included in the price. Set on the beachfront of Playa de Palma, this family-friendly hotel is surrounded by palms, tended gardens and an outdoor swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi is available. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Aya feature a private balcony, satellite TV and private bathroom. Safe and minibar are available. The hotel has a café bar with a terrace overlooking the sea. The pool area has a snack bar and sun loungers are also available. There is a 24-hour front desk where staff can provide tourist information. Compulsory bicycle parking is provided for free as well as a repair shop with cleaning area. Palma de Mallorca is 15 minutes’ drive from Hotel Aya while Mallorca International Airport is 5 km away.

name: Hotel Gloria de Sant Jaume
address: Carrer De Sant Jaume 18, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Gloria de Sant Jaume is a 2-minute walk from Paseo del Borne. It features free access the spa with an indoor pool, sauna, hamman and a rooftop terrace with a pool and city view. Set in a restored 19th-century building, Hotel Gloria de Sant Jaume features traditional elements like exposed wooden beams, hydraulic tiles and marble bathrooms. Rooms at the hotel come with free WiFi, air conditioning, heating, smart TV with satellite channels, Nespresso coffee machine or tea making facilities, bathrobe and slippers. The bathroom includes a hairdryer, vanity mirror and luxury toiletries. Hotel Gloria de Sant Jaume's restaurant and bar serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. There is also a meeting and events room. The wellness area of the property includes an indoor pool. Massages and treatments are available at an extra cost. Palma Yacht Club is a 12-minute walk from the accommodation, while La Seu Cathedral is 500 metres away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km away.

name: Convent de la Missio - Adults Only
address: Carrer De La Missio, 7a, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Housed in the old monastery Convent de la Missió dating from the 17th century, this modern and chic hotel boasts an excellent location in the centre of historic Palma. Visit the beautiful, historical old town of Palma on foot from this hotel. You can stroll through the narrow streets surrounding the hotel and relax in the gardened patios. At the end of a busy days sightseeing in Palma, you can unwind in the sauna or by sitting in the cool of the interior patio. The hotel is located in the centre of Palma, allowing you to easily get to numerous bars, restaurants and the lively nightlife of the Majorcan capital.

name: Hotel Riu Concordia
address: Camino de Las Maravillas, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Boasting a restaurant and a bar, Hotel Riu Concordia is situated in Playa de Palma, 200 metres from Playa de Palma Beach and 2.7 km from Calo de Sant Antoni Beach. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Riu Concordia rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Riu Concordia. Sa Cova Baixa Beach is 3 km from the hotel, while Palma Yacht Club is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 6 km from Hotel Riu Concordia.

name: Hotel Hostal Cuba
address: Carrer Sant Magí, 1, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Hostal Cuba is located in central Palma de Mallorca, next to the marina and Feixina Park. This modern hotel has a cocktail bar on the roof terrace with amazing views over the sea and the city. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel's restaurant serves international food. There are also numerous restaurants and bars in the surrounding Santa Catalina district. Palma Airport is just 8 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Ars Magna Bleisure Hotel
address: Carrer Blanquerna 12, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, 1.9 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, Ars Magna Bleisure Hotel provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe. A vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near Ars Magna Bleisure Hotel include Palma Intermodal Station, Passeig del Born Avenue and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Catalonia Majorica Hotel
address: Garita 3, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Overlooking Mallorca’s Palma Bay, this hotel features 1 outdoor pool, a hot tub and small gym. Each air-conditioned room includes satellite TV, free WiFi and a private balcony, some with sea views. The Catalonia Majorica offers bright, functional rooms with a minibar and safe. The modern bathrooms come with toiletries and a hairdryer. Hotel Catalonia Majorica has a large sun terrace with a poolside bar. The restaurant offers views of Palma Harbour and serves international cuisine. The hotel can be accessed by funicular. Car rental can be arranged at the Catalonia Majorica’s 24-hour reception. Palma’s historic centre and shops are within 2 km.

name: Hotel Joan Miró Museum
address: Carrer de Bartomeu Fons, 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Opposite the Marivent Palace and set on Palma’s seafront, Hotel Joan Miró Museum has an outdoor pool and is just 200 metres from the Fundación Pilar i Joan Miró. Each air-conditioned room includes free WiFi and a balcony. This charming hotel will feature original pieces of work from Joan Miró. All rooms come with air-conditioning, satellite TV and a safe. The Hotel Joan Miró Museum's restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. There is a modern lounge bar. Hotel Joan Miró Museum has 2 large event areas where guests can hold a variety of events. The accommodation also offers a garage for bicycles. The nearest golf course is 10 minutes’ drive away and guests can receive discounts on courses around the island. Porto Pí Shopping Centre is just 3 minutes’ drive away. The centre of Palma de Mallorca is 7 minutes away by car.

name: Hm Balanguera
address: Carrer Balanguera, 37, 07011 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, HM Balanguera provides stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Lluis Sitjar Stadium. It offers free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a rooftop terrace. This modern hotel provides family facilities, such as highchairs. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. After a day of exploring the local area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They provide a mini bar, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Those staying at HM Balanguera can enjoy the on-site bar, conveniently located for a drink. Room service is also offered during limited hours. HM Balanguera is close to shops, dining and Palma de Mallorca's nightlife. Palma Aquarium is within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Hispania
address: Aguamarina, s/n, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Playa de Palma beach in Mallorca, Hotel Hispania offers an outdoor pool, surrounded by gardens, and a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All spacious rooms come with air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and a balcony. Safe is available for an extra charge. For a supplement, guests have access to the spa. Hispania features a buffet restaurant with an outdoor terrace with sea views. The hotel also features a cafeteria with views of the beach, a lounge bar with swimming pool and the Sky Bar, located on the 5th floor, with views of the sea and the Bay of Palma. On Playa de Palma guests can enjoy many water sports, including wind surfing and water skiing. Activities such as cycling and horse-riding are also available in the area. Hispania Hotel is 5 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca Airport. Palma is approximately 10 km away with many shops, bars and restaurants.

name: Hotel Cort
address: Plaça De Cort, 11, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering a roof top with a swimming pool and bar, Hotel Cort is located in Palma de Mallorca, 10 minutes’ walk from Palma Port. The air-conditioned hotel has a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Each stylish room features a seating area with a flat-screen TV and minibar. The private bathroom includes a bathrobe and free toiletries. There is free Wi-Fi available. Hotel Cort is 5 minutes’ walk from a wide variety of shops, lively bars and restaurants and 200 metres from Palma's Cathedral and Plaza Mayor. Intermodal Train Station is a 15-minute walk away and Palma de Mallorca Airport is 15 minutes’ drive from the property. The property can arrange transport to and from the airport under request and at an extra cost.

name: Be Live Adults Only Marivent
address: Carrer Gavina, 9, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Be Live Adults Only Marivent features outdoor swimming pools and a gym. The relaxation area, available for a surcharge, includes steam baths and a Finnish sauna. It is set on the beachfront of Cala Major. Air-conditioned rooms have modern décor and include a flat-screen TV, and a bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. WiFi, a safe, and a laundry service are available for an extra charge. Items in the minibar carry a supplement. Set on the beachfront, the hotel has an exclusive beach club, Pelicano Beach. Guests will also find 3 different eating options on site at The Bakery, Sports Bar and Burger & Pizzeria. Central Palma is just 10 minutes’ drive away and tourist information is available at the hotel. Palma Airport is 20 km from Cala Major.

name: Riu Bravo
address: Carrer de la Missio de San Diego, 4, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Nautic Hotel & Spa
address: C/ Virgilio, 24, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
