description: Set on the beachfront opposite the Nautic Club Can Pastilla, this modern and minimalist hotel features a spa and an outdoor swimming pool. Nautic Hotel & Spa is near the shops, restaurants and bars of the area. The onsite restaurant serves Mediterranean and international-style cuisine. The hotel is also well-equipped to hold business events and meetings. Nautic Hotel & Spa is located next to the beach in a small town just outside the capital of Majorca, Palma, and is only 2 km from the airport.

name: Bg Caballero
address: Carrer de Neopatria, 3, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated just a short walk from the long, expansive, sandy beach, the Hotel Caballero is well equipped for a fun-filled family holiday in the sunshine and on the beach. This modern hotel boasts an on-site restaurant. Caballero is the ideal place to start your day with a buffet-style breakfast. Then, head down to the nearby beach later on in the morning, lie back on the fine sands and soak up the sun. Stay on site during the day and relax by the swimming pool, take a dip to do some exercise and then grab a drink from the poolside bar. Hotel Caballero welcomes athletes. It offers special menus as well as treatments and massages. There is a bicycle garage. Dine on site in Cabelleros restaurant, where you can sample buffet-style, Mediterranean cuisine with all the family. Free WiFi is available at the lobby and Internet connection via modem is available at an extra cost. A safe can be hired.

name: Be Live Adults Only La Cala Boutique
address: Gavina, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Be Live Adults Only La Cala is set on the beachfront of Cala Major, just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma. This adults-only hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. Rooms at La Cala Boutique Hotel come with an iPod speaker, a Nespresso coffee machine and a safety deposit box. The bright and modern rooms have free WiFi, a minibar with welcome items and a pool towel. The bathroom has a scale, bathrobe and slippers. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and dinner is available at the buffet restaurants. There is also an outdoor bar. Seasonal Masai Restaurant offers lovely views of the sea and boasts its signature cuisine (additional charge). Other services offered include car rental, a tour desk and a laundry service. Guests may use the relaxation area and gym at the hotel next door, for an extra cost. The property also includes the Pelicano Beach Club, open from May to October. A bus stop is located just a few steps from the hotel and buses will take you to the city centre. Palma Airport is 20 km away. When booking half board, please note that drinks are not included. When booking 9 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply. For payments over €1000 it is mandatory to make it by credit card

name: Hotel Pabisa Chico
address: C/ Camino de las Maravillas s/n, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, Hotel Pabisa Chico provides rooms with air conditioning. Every room comes with a balcony. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. At Hotel Pabisa Chico every room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ballermann 6, Playa de Palma Beach and Palma Aquarium. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 3 km from Hotel Pabisa Chico.

name: Hotel whala!fun
address: Terral, 23, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Located within 2.3 km of Playa Cala Blava and 2.6 km of Sa Pesquera Plana, whala!fun provides rooms in El Arenal. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean and international dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. At the hotel, every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV. At whala!fun each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Whala!fun offers an outdoor pool. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English and Spanish, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Calo de Sant Antoni Beach, Playa de Palma Beach and Sa Cova Baixa Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from whala!fun.

name: Iberostar Bahia de Palma - Adults Only
address: Carrer Marbella, 32, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located only 20 metres from a long sandy beach, Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only features a rooftop terrace with an infinity pool and sun terrace. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only is a hotel for adults only and is equipped to help you relax. Enjoy the excellent facilities offered by the hotel, including the Sensations Spa, the swimming pool and wellness area. This is also an ideal place to participate in sporting activities, such as cycling. "The Origin Beach Soul" À la carte restaurant is not included in any accommodation meal plan. The hotel is 11 km from Palma, the capital of the island of Majorca. The airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Son Net
address: B-07133937, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This magnificent old country house has been lovingly restored to create a stunning 5-star hotel with luxurious modern accommodation, contrasting beautifully with the historic building with its original features. Parts of the Grand Hotel Grand Hotel Son Net date back to 1672, and great care has been taken to preserve the building’s historic charm while at the same time adding stylish modern accommodation and facilities. The 30-metre outdoor swimming pool is surrounded by individual cabins for private relaxation and the gourmet MAR&DUIX Restaurant adds an extra touch of luxury. The hotel also enjoys a superb setting, surrounded by citrus orchards and lush gardens, overlooking the village of Puigpunyent and the mountains. This luxurious hotel is ideal for a romantic or relaxing break, with a beauty centre offering a selection of relaxing and therapeutic treatments and pampering.

name: Grupotel Acapulco Playa - Adults Only
address: Carrer Costa Brava, 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Mallorca's Playa de Palma Beach, Grupotel Acapulco Playa - Adults Only is 6 km from Palma Airport. It offers a heated indoor pool, and an outdoor pool with a hot tub, sun loungers and great views. Property is located infront of the beach, first row. Air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and a private balcony, most with sea views. There is a minbar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The Acapulco Playa - Adults Only offers a breakfast buffet. Drinks and light snacks are available on the outdoor terrace, which offers good views over the seafront promenade. There is live music in the evenings.

name: Ocho Suites & Kitchen
address: Carrer De La Mar 24, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palma de Mallorca, 1.2 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni and 400 metres from the centre, Ocho Suites & Kitchen features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with bathrobes. A dishwasher, an oven and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The restaurant at the apartment specialises in French cuisine. Ocho Suites & Kitchen offers a picnic area. Guests can make use of the business centre, arrange day trips at the tour desk or take advantage of the housekeeping service. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Ocho Suites & Kitchen include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 9 km from the apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grupotel Orient
address: Carrer de la Duna, 3, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Grupotel Orient is set in a quiet area, just 500 metres from Majorca´s Playa de Palma Beach. It offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools with sun loungers, a gym and a sauna. The hotel has good access to Palma city centre, and the airport is just 5km away. There are also many shops and bars in the Palma Beach resort. Grupotel Orient has adapted access with ramps. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with en-suite bathrooms. They all have a balcony, a music channel and satellite TV. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves local and international dishes. There is also a lounge bar with terrace. Live entertainment takes place in the evenings. The hotel has internet corner and mini golf. A courtesy room with shower is also available after check-out. Additional facilities are shared with Grupotel Taurus Park hotel, located 25 metres away. Guests have free access to the tennis courts, gym and a spa. The hotel rents bicycles and tennis rackets.

name: Hm Gran Fiesta
address: Carrer Marbella, 28, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located next to Mallorca’s Las Maravillas Beach, Hotel HM Gran Fiesta offers indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub and sauna. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and parking is available on site with an extra cost. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony with sea or pool views. Rooms at the HM Gran Fiesta are bright and functional, with cable TV and a fridge. A hairdryer and amenities are included in the private bathrooms. A safe is available for an extra cost. The Gran Fiesta’s restaurant serves regional and international dishes. There are also numerous bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk, in the popular Playa de Palma area. Parking is available on site with an extra cost. Palma Airport is just 4 km away and Palma city centre is 9 km away.

name: Palacio Ca Sa Galesa
address: Carrer de Miramar 8, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is set in a 16th-century building in Palma’s Gothic Quarter, 100 metres from Palma Cathedral. It has a roof terrace with great cathedral views. Free bicycle use is offered. Palacio Ca Sa Galesa is 200 metres from Parc del Mar and the sea. The shops and restaurants of Palma’s Old Town are a short walk away. Featuring artwork by Miro, Calder or Bennasar, individually decorated rooms at Ca Sa Galesa offer Old World charm mixed with modern facilities. Each is air-conditioned and features satellite TV, a laptop safe and a hydro-massage bath. There is bathrobes and slippers are also provided. The hotel’s à la carte service offers gourmet dishes 24 hours. A la carte style breakfast is available;

name: Paradiso Garden Hotel
address: Calle Perla 28 - Platja de Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Paradiso Garden is located in a quiet area of Playa de Palma, 200 metres from the beach. The hotel offers free access to the spa offering offering indoor pool, sauna, Turkish bath and cabins for massages at an additional cost. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All modern rooms at Paradiso feature air conditioning, heating, and have a private balcony or terrace or garden. They feature satellite TV, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, shower, and hairdryer. The restaurant offers buffet breakfast, brunch and à la carte dinner. There is an outdoor pool with bar. Bike rental is available for a surcharge. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are 20-minutes’ drive from the hotel. Palma centre is 9 km from Paradiso Garden. Palma Airport is only 5 km away. There is a bus stop located just 50 metres from the hotel that can take you to Palma centre every 10 minutes and to Palma Airport every 30 minutes.

name: Hotel Bordoy Cosmopolitan
address: Carrer de la Mar d'Aral, 4, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Bordoy Cosmopolitan is situated 500 metres from Palma Beach. Surrounded by palm trees, it offers an outdoor pool a hot tub, free WiFi throughout and a mini-golf course. Balconies can be found in all of the air-conditioned rooms in the Cosmopolitan. Bright and functional, all rooms have a TV and a safe. The gym is well-equipped, and there is special storage for bicycles. Tennis and paddle courts are available for an extra cost. Buffet breakfast and dinner are served in the dining room. It offers a range of Mallorcan and international dishes. The Cosmopolitan is located in a quiet area. A bus stop, offering regular services to Palma de Mallorca can be found less than 5 minutes’ walk away. The airport is about 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Pure Salt Garonda - Adults Only
address: Carrer de la Mar Negra 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 4-star, adults-only Pure Salt Garonda lies on the seafront at Playa de Palma, 6.5 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. It has an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Offering sea or garden views, all rooms are large, heated and air-conditioned. They come with a satellite TV, balcony and a minibar. Private bathrooms feature a hairdryer. There is a spa with an indoor swimming pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Pure Salt Garonda-Adults Only is equipped to welcome athletes, it offers a fitness area as well as storage facilities for golf accessories and bicycles. Pure Salt Garonda has 2 restaurants. One is open for breakfast and dinner. The other is located in front of the beach and serves lunch and dinner. The hotel offers a concierge service and computers with internet access are available at reception, subject to an additional charge. The hotel also offers car rental, excursions and currency exchange. A laundry and towel service is available. There is a bus stop only 20 metres from Pure Salt Garonda. Buses to Palma de Mallorca, 9 km away, leave every 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Riu Festival
address: Camino de Las Maravillas, n°7, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located 300 m from the Playa de Palma, the Hotel Riu Festival was renovated recently to offer you the best amenities during your stay with us. This hotel in Playa de Palma, Mallorca, has spacious facilities where you'll enjoy free WiFi, excellent cuisine, the best entertainment and the exclusive services of RIU Hotels & Resorts. The Hotel Riu Festival has more than 200 rooms equipped with everything you need for maximum comfort. All rooms have air conditioning and heating, a minibar, satellite TV and a balcony, among other amenities. In the facilities of this hotel in Playa de Palma, you'll also find a large outdoor swimming pool where you can relax in lounge chairs in the solarium zone. Plus, you'll be able to enjoy the best refreshments and snacks in the bar in the pool zone. At the Hotel Riu Festival, you'll find the best entertainment thanks to the shows and live music. If you're keen on fitness, around the hotel, you'll be able to practice sports like tennis, horseback riding, golf and various aquatic sports in summertime. The gastronomic offer of the Hotel Riu Festival stands out for its variety. In its main restaurant, you'll enjoy the best buffet breakfasts; the show-cooking stations will delight you, and you'll be able to savour the best vegetarian dishes.FarePortal

name: Hotel Java
address: Carrer de Goleta, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a sauna, Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca is located in Palma de Mallorca and offers relaxed accommodation. It is steps from Palma Aquarium, restaurants and nightlife options. The hotel treats guests to a range of leisure facilities, including bicycle rental, billiards and Swimming Pool. Amenities include free wireless internet, massage services and meeting rooms. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all offer a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of an evening with dinner and a drink. The hotel also provides breakfast each day. Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca is a 10-minute drive from Son Sant Joan Airport, and sightseers can easily reach Visit Mallorca StadiumVisit Mallorca Stadium by car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Palma de Mallorca.Revato

name: Hm Ayron Park
address: C/ Trasimeno, 7, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Conveniently situated overlooking Palma Beach and just a short drive from the airport, this hotel is surrounded by a wide range of tourist facilities in Majorca’s Playa de Palma resort. Spend your day on the golden sands of the nearby beach, just 50 metres away, before cooling off with a dip in the Ayron Park’s 5 swimming pools. In the garden surrounding the pool you can relax in the Mediterranean sunshine. Inside the Ayron Park there is a comfortable lounge and bar. You can also choose to dine at the on-site restaurant, serving a wide selection of buffet dishes. This seasonal hotel is open from February until November.

name: Hotel Riu San Francisco - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Llaut, 24, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 165 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Riu San Francisco - Adults Only in Palma de Mallorca, you'll be on the beach, just steps from Playa de Palma and a 4-minute drive from El Arenal Beach. This 4-star hotel is 10.4 mi (16.7 km) from Port of Palma de Mallorca and 8.5 mi (13.8 km) from Cathedral of Santa Maria of Palma. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at Main restaurant serving guests of Hotel Riu San Francisco - Adults Only. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM. name: Hotel Principe
address: Avenida Son Rigo, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set 2 minutes’ walk from Palma Beach, Hotel Principe is located in Palma de Mallorca. Offering an outdoor swimming pool, the air-conditioned hotel has a restaurant serving breakfasts and Mediterranean cuisine. Each room offers a TV and private bathroom. Free WiFi is available in common areas. There is a furnished terrace and a bar available. Guests can access the hotel spa for a supplement. Hotel Principe is a 5-minute walk from a wide variety of restaurants and lively bars. El Arenal and San Antonio de la Playa Ports are within 3 km away. Mallorca Airport is 10 minutes’ drive away and the centre of Palma de Mallorca is 15 minutes by car. Tramuntana National Park is 30 minutes’ drive from the property.

name: Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carrer De Sant Bartolomeu, 24, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only is just 400 metres from the marina and beach, in Majorca's El Arenal. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and a spa. The hotel is just a few metres from the nearest bus stop and Palma Airport is just 6km away. Free public parking is available nearby. The hotel's spa features a Turkish bath, hot tub and foot baths. There is also a range of massages available. Rooms at the Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only are spacious and bright. They all have a balcony, air conditioning and free WiFi. The hotel also has elegant lounge areas, as well as a buffet restaurant and a bar. An evening entertainment programme is also offered. Pets are allowed as long as they weigh less than 8 kg. Pet access to the common areas of the bar, pool, dining room and spa is restricted for reasons of hygiene and well-being of our clients. For more information, ask at reception.

name: Gpro Valparaiso Palace & Spa
address: c/ Francisco Vidal Sureda, 23, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This luxury hotel is set in the exclusive Bonanova district, a secluded location in Palma de Mallorca. It boasts Majorca’s largest spa, beautiful gardens and stunning views. All modern rooms at Valparaiso Palace & Spa have a private balcony with spectacular city, bay or mountain views. They are spacious and air-conditioned, and include satellite TV, a minibar and bathrobes. The Valparaiso Spa includes a huge heated pool, sauna and hot tub. There is also a steam bath, gym, ice cave and vitamin bar. All spa facilities carry an extra cost. Babies from 0 to 1 can't enter the spa. Surrounded by gardens, Valparaiso Palace & Spa is high above Palma Bay and the city. Facilities include tennis and padel courts and two large swimming pools, as well as a poolside bar open all day in summer. The Valparaiso’s gourmet Paraiso Restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast. Specializing in show cooking, its chefs prepare Mediterranean market cuisine in front of guests. With a poolside terrace the Bistro Bar serves lunches, dinners, lighter snacks and drinks. The hotel is located 12 km from the Palma de Mallorca Airport.

name: Can Bordoy Grand House & Garden
address: Carrer Del Forn De La Glòria 14, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Can Bordoy Grand House & Garden is in the Old Town of Palma de Mallorca and boasts pools at their large garden and rooftop, within a 4-minute walk of Palma Port. The luxurious suites at Can Bordoy Grand House & Garden feature a seating area and a private bathroom. All have individually-controlled air conditioning. The property has spacious living areas with a fireplace and a library and there is also a restaurant. A la carte restaurant is open every day. The swimming pool is climatized during all year. The property is close to Palma Yacht Club, Passeig del Born Avenue and Palma Cathedral. Plaza Mayor is 600 metres away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the property.

name: Indico Rock Hotel Mallorca - Adults Only
address: Antas de Ulla,14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set 450 metres from El Arenal sandy beach, Indico Rock Hotel Mallorca is an adults-only hotel offering free entrance to live DJ performances and rock concerts hosted by the hotel. A music inspired décor is blended with the latest audiovisual technology to offer guests a rich sensorial experience. Daily musical events take place at the hotel including live-music shows, DJ sessions and video projections. A professional recording studio, meeting rooms and an event centre are available at an extra cost. Indico Rock boasts two swimming pools and two terraces with sun loungers and balinese beds. Guests can have drinks at the pool bar or the Sky bar. Other facilities include a rooftop terrace, a disco. Breakfast and dinner, both, are served buffet style, featuring show cooking. There is a vegan and vegetarian corner. For lunch, guests can order a lá carte Mediterranean dishes. Modern rooms come with air conditioning, a TV with international, radio channels and video on demand, a furnished balcony and a bathroom with a hairdryer. A minibar and a safety deposit box are available upon request and carry a surcharge. The hotel offers free WiFi throughout.

name: Sol Barbados
address: Av. Notario Alemany 7, Calvia Beach, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Magaluf, Sol Barbados offers concierge services, rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and an outdoor pool. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Sol Barbados all rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a vegetarian breakfast. Sol Barbados offers a children's playground, children swimming pools, Katmandu Adventures mini club, and a water park called Waterland. You can play table tennis at the hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Other services include fitness activities for adults, a bike repair shop, a bike cleaning station, and bike storage. Golf courses can be found nearby. Popular points of interest near Sol Barbados include Aqua land, Nikki Beach Mallorca and The Stage. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Hospes Maricel & Spa
address: Carretera de Palma-Andraxt, 11, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa is an impressive hotel located just 10 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca. Featuring both modern, 16th and 17th-century architecture, it has an amazing seafront infinity pool and a well-equipped spa. The hotel is made up of the original mansion and a modern annexe building with contemporary décor and exposed stone walls, located on second sea line. You can access the property's private stone caves, some of which have been converted into seafront massage rooms. The Bodyna Spa at Hospes Maricel y Spa includes indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub, sauna and Turkish bath. There is also a terrace, garden, a gym, and massage services are available. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and some have a private pool. The hotel’s Maricel Restaurant offers traditional Mallorcan food and a range of quality local wines. At the bar you can enjoy a cocktail accompanied by live jazz. Breakfast can be also served on the Mediterranean-style terrace which overlooks the sea. Hospes Maricel y Spa has a private jetty where guests arriving by sea can moor a boat, and Calanova Sailing Club is 30 metres away. There is a golf course 500 metres away, and you can drive to Palma Airport in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Ciutat Jardi
address: Illa De Malta 14, 07007 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Housed in a stunning, early 19th-century mansion, this beachfront hotel is surrounded by lovely, tropical gardens. The centre of Palma de Mallorca is less than 15 minutes' drive away. Spend the day relaxing by the outdoor swimming pool in this attractive, colonial-style hotel. Grab a sun lounger and take advantage of the sunshine on the terrace. In the summer months, you can take breakfast on the terrace of Ciutat Jardi, and kick start your day in the warm, morning sunshine. Palma de Mallorca can easily be reached by car, public transport or bicyle.

name: Es Princep - The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Carrer Bala Roja, 1, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palma de Mallorca, 1 km from Palma Port, Es Princep features a rooftop terrace, an outdoor pool and spa centre. There is free WiFi. Certain rooms have a seating area for your convenience. A TV is provided. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Palma Yacht Club is 1.4 km from Es Princep, while Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 550 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 7 km from Es Princep.

name: Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma
address: Marbella, 36, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront, Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma is located near nightlife and just 5 minutes' drive from Palma Airport. It features a swimming pool and sun loungers. Free premium high-speed WiFi is available. Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma offers fully equipped rooms, each one with a satellite TV, minibar and private balcony. The hotel offers 2 restaurants, one buffet-style and one á la carte. There is also an on-site bar, Bar Mar Blau, and a poolside bar. Guests will also be able to enjoy the Sensations Spa. There is also a fitness area and 8 golf courses near by. On the rooftop terrace, guest over 16 years of age staying in the Star Prestige rooms have access to an exclusive solarium with an infinity pool and sun loungers. The hotel is set 15 minutes' drive from the centre of Palma.

name: Hotel Artmadams
address: Marques De La Senia, 34, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Hotel Armadams boasts a superb range of facilities, as well a fantastic location right on Palma de Mallorca's coast, 20 minutes' walk from the city's main attractions. Enjoy the best in comfort at the Armadams, boasting an exciting modern art collection of both paintings and sculptures. The soundproofed rooms are modern, with free WiFi. All guests have free access to the spa, which includes a pool, hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath, and showers. The hotel offers breakfast on site. Explore Palma's old quarter, with the Gothic Cathedral, Bellver Castle, Almudaina Palace and Arab Baths all located within short walking distance. Spend the day sunbathing on the beaches located 2 km from the hotel, or go for a swim in the Armadams's outdoor and indoor pools. Pamper yourself at the well-equipped hotel spa, where you can enjoy the sauna or Turkish bath and keep in shape on holiday at the fitness centre. For non-refundable reservations, payment must be made through a link that you will receive in your reservation.

name: Mll Mediterranean Bay Hotel - Adults Only
address: C/ Sant Bartomeu, 18, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Mediterranean Bay is 350 metres from S’Arenal Beach and has an outdoor pool, an outdoor hot tub and sauna. Each air-conditioned room offers free WiFi, and a flat-screen TV. Hotel Mediterranean Bay has a buffet restaurant and a lounge bar. Breakfast in your room is available on request. The hotel’s rooms have elegant, modern design. They all include a private bathroom. The Mediterranean Bay has a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Free public parking is available nearby. The Mediterranean Bay Hotel is set in Majorca’s Palma Bay, 11 km from Palma city centre. The area has many shops and bars.

name: Belle Marivent Mediterranean Petit Hotel
address: Avinguda de Joan Miró 250, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Occidental Playa de Palma
address: Avinguda Del Fra Joan Llabres 16, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Playa de Palma before called Barcelo Pueblo Park is situated right in the centre of the Playa de Palma de Mallorca an ideal spot for enjoying a peaceful holiday on the Playa El Arenal which is situated only 200m from the hotel. In the surrounding area of the hotel you will be able to go cycling diving hiking and play golf. There is a choice of 5 golf courses close by within a 20 km radius of the hotel. Barcelo Pueblo Park Hotel also has one of the best equipped cycling centres on the island which offers the expertise and experience of Max Huerzeler Bicycle Holidays. It is the perfect hotel for sports lovers. It also offers its customers a Health and Wellness Centre with sauna Turkish bath indoor heated swimming pool and massage service. In addition the hotel has modern rooms for conventions or company meetings and offers Wi-Fi connection in the commong areas. The Occidental Playa de Palma hotel has been awarded the Tourist Quality Q distinction.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only
address: Paseo De Illetas, 7, 07184 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Situated on the sea front in Illetas, Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only is set within beautiful gardens and features a small exclusive beach. This stylish Hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a sun terrace and an extensive spa with pool. Each of the bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá has stylish, modern décor, a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and a special pillow menu. Rooms also feature balconies with sea views. Red Level guests enjoy additional, exclusive services such as special discount in the parking, VIP check-in, free Nespresso coffee, free access to the Spa's thermal circuit and access to the Red Level lounge with free drinks. For an additional charge, guests have access to the SPA BY CLARINS, where health and beauty treatments are available. The spa includes a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, hot water indoor pool and a hot tub. The fitness center is available 24 hours and it is free of charge. Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only has 4 restaurants, including the the Amaro Lounge, which offers light food, drinks and cocktails, a poolside restaurant Bardot, specializing in fresh fish, rice dishes and seafood meals. Arrels by Marga Coll is a fine dining restaurant offering tasting menus, with a beautiful terrace and sea views, serving traditional Mallorcan cuisine with a modern twist, and is only open for dinner. Perseo offers a delicious breakfast buffet with show cooking. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Portals Nous Marina and central Palma is just 7 km away. Bendinat Golf Club is a 10-minute walk from the Meliá.

name: Nakar Hotel
address: Avenida Jaime III, 21, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Palma de Mallorca, 300 metres from Palma Port, Nakar Hotel features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has an outdoor pool and views of the city, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. This modern and stylish hotel is set in the shopping area of Jaime III Avenue. The airport is just 10 km away. Public parking is available nearby for an extra cost. Each room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A balcony or patio are featured in certain rooms. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. Deluxe rooms have a spa bath or a hot tub. Nakar Hotel has a charming terrace with city and sea views. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire. Palma Yacht Club is 600 metres from Nakar Hotel, while Cala Major Beach is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Portixol Hotel & Restaurant
address: Sirena, 27, 07006 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This stylish hotel is located in Palma’s Portixol Harbour, just 300 metres from Portixol Beach. It offers an outdoor pool and elegant, air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and sea views. The rooms at Portixol Hotel & Restaurant feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, a DVD player and an iPod docking station. There is also a coffee maker, minibar and private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The hotels’ charming gourmet restaurant overlooks the port from its colonnade. There is also a cocktail bar. Available for an extra cost, the Portixol’s spa features a wide range of relaxation and beauty treatments. There is also an on-site gym. You can also rent bicycles for free from reception, where staff can provide information about what Mallorca has to offer. Central Palma is just 5 minutes’ drive from Portixol Hotel & Restaurant. You can drive to Palma Airport in 10 minutes.

name: Aluasoul Palma Hotel Adults Only
address: Maestro Ekitai Ahn, 40, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The adults-only Alua Soul Palma in Can Pastilla is situated on Cala Estancia Beach in Mallorca’s Palma Bay. Each air-conditioned room includes a balcony, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Alua Soul Palma features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. There are wonderful views of Palma Bay and the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel’s restaurant opens for breakfast and dinner, serving a buffet of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar and a café-bar. Alua Soul Palma Can Pastilla is located less than 2 km from Palma de Mallorca Airport and around 8 km from Palma city centre. Free parking can be found near the hotel, and public buses stop nearby. Reservations of more than 5 rooms are subject to supplements and special conditions. The establishment also offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: • Selection of the best rooms. • Personalised check-in and check-out. • Exclusive My Favorite Club Lounge serving and drinks during the day. • Access to “Vértigo Sky Bar” our Rooftop with amazing sea views, exclusively for My Favorite Club guests

name: THB Maria Isabel
address: Carrer Villagarcia Arosa, 19, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a wellness centre with an indoor pool and sauna, THB Maria Isabel is located 400 metres from Palma Beach. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. All rooms at THB Maria Isabel are air-conditioned, bright and spacious. Each comes with a balcony, some of them offering pool or sea views. All rooms have a shower. The hotel offers a bicycle garage which is free for guests. There is also a large sun terrace with sunbeds around the swimming pool. A restaurant, as well as bycicle rent and garage. Palma City Centre is 15 minutes by car and offers a cathedral, port and a selection of restaurants. Palma Airport is 4 km away.

name: INNSiDE by Meliá Palma Bosque
address: Camilo Jose Cela 5, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: INNSIDE by Meliá Palma Bosque is an urban design hotel located 5 minutes’ walk from Palma’s seafront promenade and 20 minutes walk from Palma Cathedral. It features an outdoor, an indoor, and a children’s pool, and an on-site restaurant with a terrace. Guests will also find a fitness center with virtual classes, a sauna, and a Turkish bath. Each room comes with sustainable and anti-pollution toiletries and a safe. The hotel’s restaurant, SYNDEO, offers Nikkei-inspired cuisine and a range of cocktails. Palma’s Santa Catalina district, can be reached in a 10-minute walk. Bellver Castle is also around 10 minutes walk away.

name: Hotel Sant Jordi
address: Grua, 5, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set just 100 metres from Majorca’s Playa de Palma Beach, Hotel Sant Jordi has an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub. Rooms include a balcony, satellite TV, air conditioning and bathroom. The Sant Jordi Hotel has its own buffet restaurant and bar. There are also various cafés and restaurants in the nearby. Free Wi-Fi access is offered in hotel lounge. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about the area and arrange car rental. Hotel Sant Jordi has a garage for bicycles. The hotel provides access to a gym set next to the property. Guests will also find saunas within metres away. The Sant Jordi is just 500 metres from Palma Aquarium and 3 km from Majorca Airport. Palma city centre is around 8 km away, and regular bus services stop nearby.

name: Iberostar Cristina
address: Calle Bartomeu Xamena, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 4-star Iberostar Cristina offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Majorca. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, wheelchair accessible, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, free welcome drink, sofa, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary). The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include dart board, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. For reliable service and professional staff, Iberostar Cristina caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Hotel Riu Playa Park
address: Carrer Pare San Bartomeu Salva, 15, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Playa de Palma, 2.5 km from Es Calonet des Fornàs Beach, Hotel Riu Playa Park - 0'0 All Inclusive provides accommodation with a bar, private parking and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe. At Hotel Riu Playa Park - 0'0 All Inclusive all rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Meals, snacks and non-alcoholic drinks are also included. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Riu Playa Park - 0'0 All Inclusive. Mega Park Nightclub is 500 metres from the hotel, while Ballermann 6 is 400 metres from the property.

name: Sant Jaume Design Hotel
address: Calle Sant Jaume, 22, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the heart of Palma de Mallorca, 200 metres from Palma Port, Sant Jaume Design Hotel features a free spa centre with an indoor pool and sauna. There is an outdoor plunge pool on the rooftop terrace. The hotel's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and tapas. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers, free toiletries, a hairdryer with diffuser and a hairstraightener. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel has a fitness centre. Cala Major Beach is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Boutique Hotel Posada Terra Santa
address: Calle Posada Terra Santa 5, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering an outdoor and indoor pool, Boutique Hotel Posada Terra Santa is located in Palma de Mallorca's Old Town. Set in a 16th-century manor, this hotel offers a spa and wellness centre. All air-conditioned rooms will provide you with a satellite TV and dining table. Each also has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. Some of them feature a terrace and offer views of the historic centre of Palma. You can enjoy an on-site restaurant and bar, 24-hour front desk, concierge service, and a shared terrace and library, surrounded by modern décor. Boutique Hotel Posada Terra Santa is located a 5-minute drive from Cala Major Beach, and 5 km from Son Vida Golf Resort. Son Sant Joan Airport is 7 km away.

name: Hotel Eden Soller
address: Es Traves, 26, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This seafront hotel with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms. The Sóller tramway to Sóller and Palma stops just outside the hotel. Hotel Eden’s rooms feature tiled flooring, air conditioning and heating. All have satellite TV and a private bathroom with bath, toiletries and a hairdryer. WiFi is free throughout the hotel. All rooms include an empty fridge free of charge. Hotel Eden’s restaurant serves a buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. There is also a lounge-bar and a garden-terrace with views of the bay. Staff are happy to provide information about nearby activities, including water sports, hiking or boat excursions. Car and bicycle rental are also available. Palma de Mallorca is about 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Zel Mallorca
address: Carrer Duc Estremera, 16, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Majorca's south coast, in the Palmanova beach area, Zel Mallorca exudes Mediterranean charm and essence. The unique entrance is a distinctive feature: its courtyard welcomes you in a cozy atmosphere. The rooms are designed in a locally inspired style and offer stunning sea views. Its swimming pools offer sea views, one of them has direct access to the beach. The hotel encourages a healthy, active and relaxed lifestyle and features a fully equipped gym. To maximize your wellbeing there is a spa and a full activities programme, which includes yoga retreats and fitness. A wide range of sports activities are also available, such as tennis, golf, scuba diving, etc. Reconnect with your inner self at Zel Mallorca, your Mediterranean home

name: Aubamar Suites & Spa
address: Calle Misión de San Diego 17, 07600 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Aubamar Suites & Spa features a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Playa de Palma. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel each room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and certain rooms include sea views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at Aubamar Suites & Spa can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a sauna, and a hot tub, or in the garden. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa de Palma Beach, and Calo de Sant Antoni Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Aubamar Suites & Spa.

name: Js Palma Stay Adults Only
address: C/ Pins, 26, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Js Palma Stay Adults Only is just 80 metres from Mallorca’s C’an Pastilla Beach. The complex features 1 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, a sun terrace, gym, and a spa with a sauna. All air-conditioned rooms at the Js Palma Stay feature a private balcony or terrace. There is a private bathroom with shower. Towels and bed linen are included. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers a variety of Spanish and European dishes. There is a bar and entertainment is provided, with evening shows several times a week. A laundry service is available.There is a 24-hour front desk. There are many shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets. Palma de Mallorca is 8 km away.

name: Bq Augusta Hotel
address: C/ Corb Marí, 22, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The BQ Augusta Hotel complex in La Bonanova is just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma de Mallorca and offers rooms, studios and apartments. It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace. All the spacious rooms at the BQ Augusta Hotel come with satellite TV. Some of the rooms feature views over the city of Palma from the balcony and the studios and apartments come with kitchenettes. Free WiFi is available. The BQ Augusta Hotel serves an extensive buffet breakfast. There is also a cafeteria for light meals and a bar where guests can relax. Friendly staff are happy to suggest nearby restaurants. Palma Port is just 300 metres away, while Bellver Park is about 500 metres away. The historic part of Palma is about 5 minutes’ drive away. There is on-site parking, subject to availability.

name: Melia Palma Bay
address: Calle Felicia Fuster 4, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a roof-top terrace with sea views and an outdoor pool, Melia Palma Bay offers accommodation next to Palma Convention Centre. Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 350 metres away. Rooms are bright and feature Scandinavian-style dècor. All have satellite TV and a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. There is also a fitness centre at the property. Parking is available on site for an extra charge. Palma Yacht Club is 2.1 km from Melia Palma Bay, while Cala Major Beach is 5 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Isla Mallorca & Spa
address: Pilar Juncosa, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Isla Mallorca & Spa is located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, spa and chic rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel’s wellness spa has a sauna, Hammam and steam bath, and massages and other treatments are available. Use of the spa comes at an additional cost. The hotel also has a gym. The hotel's restaurant, Tragaluz, offers a range of Mallorcan, Spanish and international dishes. It has a terrace and large windows with views of the garden. The hotel is set in the residential area of Son Armadams, between the Pueblo Español and Bellver Castle. The seaside promenade is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Free parking is available in the streets near the hotel. The hotel reception offers car and bicycle rental service.

name: Hotel Seasun Aniram
address: Carrer De L'Albatros 11, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, bar and views of sea, Hotel Seasun Aniram is set in Playa de Palma. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from Palma Aquarium. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Seasun Aniram every room includes air conditioning and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Seasun Aniram offers a sun terrace. Playa de Palma Beach is 1.5 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4.2 km from Hotel Seasun Aniram.

name: Hotel Costa Azul
address: Avenida Gabriel Roca, 7, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Stunning views of Palma Harbour can be enjoyed from the small pool on the third floor of Hotel Costa Azul. Free Wi-Fi, LED satellite TV and fridge are included in the bright, air-conditioned rooms. The hotel boasts a fully equipped gym with views of Palma Bay. The swimming pool is covered in winter, and you can also relax in the hotel’s sauna. The hotel’s modern café and terrace offer panoramic sea views. The restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner. Rooms at Costa Azul are modern and tastefully decorated. They come with a private bathroom, a desk and safe. Rooms with sea views can be booked. Set in front of Palma’s marina, Hotel Costa Azul is 9 km from Palma Airport. Direct buses to the airport and city centre stop right outside the hotel. Please note that the hotel does not offer airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel El Llorenç Parc de la Mar - Adults Only
address: Plaça de Llorenç Villalonga 4, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: El Llorenc Parc de la Mar - Adults Only (+16) is located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, an 11-minute walk of Palma Port. Guests have free access to the fitness centre and to the spa, which includes a swimming pool, hot tub, hammam, showers, and sauna. The hotel also features a rooftop terrace with a 40 m² swimming pool that offers views of Palma bay. At the hotel, every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, and some rooms at El Llorenc have a balcony. An à la carte breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy food cooked by Santi Taura at DINS restaurant. There is also a bar. Speaking Catalan, German and English, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Palma Yacht Club is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 7 km away. This is a non- smoking hotel

name: Eix Alcudia Hotel +18
address: Teodoro Canet, 43, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: This traditional Mallorcan-style building consists of 4 floors set around an outdoor swimming pool and patio, surrounded by palm trees. The heated, air-conditioned rooms come with work desk and satellite TV. Hotel Eix Alcudia - Adults Only lies within 150 metres from the beach in Puerto de Alcúdia, in northern Mallorca. The Medieval town of Alcudia is less than 1 km away. Double rooms at the hotel offer a private terrace, some with pool views. All rooms are en suite, with amenities. Guests can enjoy meals at the hotel's restaurant. Other facilities at Hotel Eix Alcudia include showers on the ground floor for late departures. Secure bicycle storage and free outdoor parking are also available.

name: Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites
address: Calle Coral, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Just 1 km from Alcudia’s historic centre, Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites boutique hotel has Wi-Fi access, a swimming pool and free spa access. Rooms and suites features Nordic-style dècor and come with air conditioning, wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and pool towels. Some feature a seating area and a hot tub. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites has a terrace with loungers for sunbathing. The spa includes a sauna, hamman and hot tub. The à la carte restaurant offers international and vegetarian dishes and has outdoor seating. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites is set a short distance from the harbour. Just 2 km away you will find a shopping centre and an ancient Roman amphitheatre.

name: Puig de Ros d'Alt
address: Camino Sa Torre, s/n, 07620 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Hoposa Costa D'or - Adults Only
address: Lluch-Alcari, 07179 Deia, Mallorca
description: Set in pine forest and overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, this adults-only hotel is located near the small town of Deia. Costa D'or hotel is designed to blend in with the surrounding landscape. Stroll through the tranquil forest surrounding the property or down to the beautiful, secluded cove that is only a short walk away. You can also relax by the pool and take a dip to cool down on a hot summer's day. The beautiful mountain town of Valldemossa is a short drive from the hotel and is a must see in this region of Majorca. The hotel is also well-situated so you can easily get to the capital of the island Palma de Mallorca, and its airport.

name: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx, Km 20, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo is a tourist destination that prioritizes the well-being of its guests from arrival to departure. A restorative retreat where you can enjoy the Mediterranean climate and lifestyle during your stay on the island, whether it is a leisure or business trip. In the heart of nature, 20 minutes from Palma de Mallorca and 10 minutes from the marinas of Andratx and Puerto Portals, its 54,000 square meters of gardens promise guests relaxation and direct contact with the sea thanks to memorable views and the nearby beach of Paguera.Hilton

name: Hotel Seramar Comodoro Playa
address: Carrer Cala Blanca, 9, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Seramar Hotel Comodoro Playa is located on Son Matias Beach in Palma Nova, 15 minutes’ drive from Palma. It offers an outdoor pool, and rooms with private balconies and sea views. The air-conditioned rooms at the Seramar Hotel Comodoro Playa feature parquet floors and modern décor, a private bathroom and satellite TV. Seramar Hotel Comodoro Playa features a table tennis table and a 24-hour reception. Wi-Fi is available and free throughout the hotel. The hotel’s large restaurant serves international food. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The lively resort of Magaluf is 1' minutes’ walk away. You can drive to Palma Airport in around 20 minutes.

name: Hotel Son Caliu Spa Oasis
address: Avenida De Son Caliu 8, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis is conveniently located in the popular Calvia area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, postal service, 24-hour front desk are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, private pool, internet access wireless (complimentary). To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as yoga room, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site). No matter what your reasons are for visiting Majorca, Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Zoetry Mallorca Wellness & Spa
address: Camí De Sa Torre 8,7, 07609 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Located in the countryside in southeast Mallorca, this impressive 14th-century country house has 3 restaurants, 3 bars, 2 swimming pools, and a spa centre. It offers large rooms with a flat-screen TV and Wi-Fi access. One out of the three restaurants, is runned by michelin star chef Andreu Genestra. The property has two accommodation areas, Tramuntana and Ponent, featuring luxurious rooms and suites, as well as historic buildings such as the windmill, dating back to the fifteenth century, and the neo-Gothic chapel "La Gran Cristiana". The air-conditioned rooms at Zoetry Mallorca Wellnes & Spa Mallorca feature smart, modern décor. They are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Zoetry Mallorca also offers yoga retreats, tennis courts, a football pitch and a running track. Zoetry Mallorca Wellnes & Spa is just 10 minute’ drive from the beautiful beaches of south Mallorca. Palma Airport is 22 km away. Endless-Privileges®Inclusions: such as early check in and late check out (subject to availability), mini bar daily replenished, personalised concierge services, gourmet à la carte dining options with an assortment of organic food and beverage selections, room service offered 24-hours with a selection of dishes, wines and beverages

name: Santa Ponsa Pins
address: Avinguda Del Rei Jaume I 115, Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: This Mediterranean-style hotel is set just 300 metres from the beach. It offers an outdoor swimming pool with sun terrace and comfortable rooms with a private terrace. The air-conditioned rooms at Santa Ponsa Pins feature functional décor. Each includes a rental safe, plasma satellite TV, a telephone and private bathroom with hairdryer. Breakfast is served in the hotel’s buffet restaurant and there is a cafeteria. Guests can relax in the TV and reading lounge, play pool and get tourist information from the 24-hour reception. Santa Ponsa Pins features, a meetings room and a bicycle garage. Santa Ponsa Pins is 5 minutes’ drive from Santa Ponsa Marina. There are numerous bars, restaurants and shops nearby and 3 golf courses within 10 minutes’ drive. The hotel is 6 km from lively Magaluf and Palma Nova and 18 km from Palma and its airport.

name: SENTIDO Diamant Hotel
address: Los Romeros, 10, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Set next to Majorca’s picturesque Cala Agulla beach and surrounded by lush gardens, this family hotel provides facilities for a relaxing yet active holiday under the sun. Hotel Diamant has outdoor pools with sundecks, as well as an indoor pool. There is a gym and a sauna. Massage services are available for an extra charge. The air-conditioned rooms at the Diamant feature Mallorcan-style décor. Each one comes with a TV, a private bathroom and a balcony. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the rooms. The hotel’s snack bar serves buffet meals of national and international dishes. There is also a bar where you can enjoy a drink in the sun. The hotel is in a large complex, sharing its facilities with the Aparthotel Diamant.

name: Monsuau Cala D'Or Hotel 4 Sup - Adults Only
address: Avenida Cala D'Or, 2, 07669 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Sunprime Monsuau Hotel is located around 200 metres from the beach in Cala d’Or, on Mallorca’s south-eastern coast. The hotel has 2 swimming pools, a restaurant and sun terrace. There is a rooftop bar (open from June to September) and wellness center and spa. Standard rooms at the Sunprime Monsuau Hotel feature air conditioning, flat-screen cable TV, high-speed WiFi, safety deposit box, mini-fridge, kettle, iron & ironing board (on request), bathroom with shower and hairdryer, and balcony or terrace. Sunprime Monsuau Hotel offers a buffet breakfast and has an on-site bar. Other facilities include a 24-hour reception and a tour desk, a sky lounge and pool bar, fitness centre, aerobics, laundry service and a mini-market. There is occasional evening entertainment. Activities on offer in Cala d’Or include water-sports, tennis and golf. Guests can easily access the beaches of Cala Llonga and Cala Gran. Sunprime Monsuau is around an hour's drive from Palma and its airport. At 8 Km are Cala Mondrago Natural Park.

name: Son Julia Country House Hotel
address: Crta. De S'Arenal a Llucmajor, 07620 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: A historic 15th-century mansion, beautifully restored into a splendid luxury rural establishment, situated close to Palma de Mallorca and the Mediterranean Sea, and with state-of-the-art facilities and an indoor heated pool. In a truly remarkable location overlooking the surrounding countryside we offer spacious rooms and impressive suites, where original features have been kept wherever possible. Air-conditioned room include a flat-screen TV, and minibar. Their private bathrooms come with free toiletries, slippers and bathrobes. Find peace and tranquility in the lovely garden where children can play and you can relax in the Majorcan sunshine. Son Julia Country House & Spa Mallorca features gym, tennis court and spa, as well as 2 swimming pools. There are several golf courses nearby and the property arranges cycle tours of the island. The Sa Magrana Restaurant & Terrace offers creative Mediterranean dishes made using fresh produce and the wine list includes includes its own wine, son Julia. The restaurant features a sandstone arched roof and a terrace overlooking the estate´s vineyards. In the summer, there is live music on Thursdays.

name: Lago Garden Apart-Suites & Spa Hotel
address: Buen Paseo s/n, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Our stylishly decorated hotel is a quiet and welcoming haven, where you will find a perfect balance between sophistication and comfort. Lago Garden is a real oasis in Cala Ratjada, as it is surrounded by pleasant gardens which make a perfect setting for the tasteful reception area and terraces. Our hospitable staff are there to ensure all guests are pampered and well looked after.

name: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only
address: Carrer Castell 3, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only is set directly in front of Cala Millor Beach, in eastern Majorca. The complex has outdoor and indoor swimming pools and a lovely garden. This modern complex offers comfortable rooms. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for beach and nature lovers as it is located next to the Natural Area Punta de n'Amer.

name: Hipotels Flamenco
address: Av. Sa Coma, 13, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Situated right on the beach front, this modern, family-friendly hotel has superb facilities including a great outdoor pool and well-equipped fitness centre. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Located in the popular Cala Millor, enjoy wonderful sea views. Make the most of the Flamenco’s location by visiting the popular beach where you can swim in the mild waters and practise a number of water-sports. Enjoy hearty meals in the Flamenco restaurant. You can help yourself to a great variety of hot and cold dishes which include both international and regional cuisine. Then sit back and let yourself be entertained by the Flamenco team which put on varied live-music shows. There is plenty to keep you active while staying at the Flamenco. Other than a refreshing swim in the outdoor pool, you can enjoy a challenging workout in the gym or join the fun activities organised by the entertainment team. After all this, head to the sauna and hot tub for a genuine relax.

name: Hipotels Hipocampo Playa
address: Avd. Sa Coma, 45, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront in Cala Millor, this hotel is perfect for a break in the sunshine. Unwind with a drink on a sun lounger before diving into the swimming pool. The 4-star Hipocampo Playa has a wide range of facilities, making it the ideal setting for a family beach holiday on beautiful Majorca. Children are entertained by the hotel’s activity team or play in the swimming pool or playground. Meanwhile, you can head to the sauna or hot tub for some much-needed relaxation. Choose between the golden sands and clear Mediterranean waters of the beach, or the comfort of the hotel sun terrace and attractive gardens. Here you can lie back whilst enjoying refreshing drinks and snacks from the poolside bar. If you feel active during your stay you can make use of the on-site gym. You will also find a variety of water sports along the local coastline, as well as a number of golf courses in the stunning Majorcan countryside.

name: Hotel Astoria Playa - Adults Only
address: Carrer Astoria, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: The modern, adults-only Hotel Astoria Playa is located in heart of the popular resort of Alcúdia, just 150 metres from the beach. It has 2 outdoor swimming pools, including one with a chill-out zone, and free Wi-Fi. Set in 4000 m² of gardens, the hotel has spacious sun terraces featuring 3 outdoor hot tubs and a poolside snack bar. The restaurant offers show cooking. The Astoria Playa Hotel also provides a seasonal programme entertainment with Live Dj during the day and live music in the evening several times each week. Hotel Astoria Playa Adults Only is equipped to welcome athletes. It offers special menus as well as treatments and massages. There is a bicycle repair shop. There is an array of things to do in the surroundings of the Hotel Astoria Alcudia, such as a range of water sports, cycletourism, aerial sports and a golf course. The promenade is lined with bar, restaurants and shops. Pool towels can be requested with no extra cost.

name: Kyrat Amarac Suites
address: Vinya del Mar 1, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Kyrat Amarac Suites features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Cala Millor. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Natural Park S'Albufera de Mallorca is 40 km from the hotel and Alcudia Old Town is 46 km away. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Cala Millor Beach is 500 metres from Kyrat Amarac Suites, while Cala Bona Beach is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 69 km from the accommodation.

name: Paguera Treff Boutique Hotel
address: Bulevar de Paguera, n 31, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: This pleasant hotel is located on Paguera’s seafront Boulevard in the centre of the resort. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, most with sea views and some has terrace, 20 metres from Palmyra Beach. The Paguera Treff’s spacious rooms feature Mediterranean-style decor and all come with satellite TV, a safe and a full private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast and has a restaurant offering regional cuisine. Starters and desserts are served buffet-style, while main dishes are à la carte. There is also a bar area and terrace. You can hire a car or bicycle, or going snorkelling and diving at the beach. The Andratx Golf Resort is 10 minutes’ drive away and you can reach lively Magaluf by car in 12 minutes. Paguera Treff is located 20 minutes’ drive from Palma and its airport.

name: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments
address: Passeig De Colon, 265, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments is located on the beachfront of Puerto Pollensa. The hotel boasts an outdoor pool with sea views. The fully equipped apartments feature a balcony, while the rooms include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a safe. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and free in-room breakfast while at dinner guests can have a fine meal from the a là carte menu. We suggest correct and adequate dress in the dining room and trust that gentlemen will understand the request not to wear shorts or T-shirts at dinner. In the summer months it is possible to have breakfast on the terrace. The Sunset Bar serves snacks and cocktails. Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments has a spa where guests can enjoy facial and body treatments, massages, pedicures and manicures. The spa has an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, a Turkish bath and much more.

name: Hotel Boutique Minister
address: Paseo La Playa 12, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Set on Playa D'en Repic Beach in Port de Soller, Hotel Boutique Minister, a four-star superior hotel, offers a year-round outdoor heated pool, sun terrace and views of the sea. Guests have free spa access. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. Rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. Hotel Minister features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk and gift shop at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. You can engage in various activities, such as snorkeling and windsurfing. You will find the Sierra de Tramuntana Mountains, a UNESCO world heritage site beside the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 27 km from the property; and free private parking is provided.

name: Mar Hotels Alcanada
address: Plaça Pompeu Fabra 7, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Mar Hotels Alcanada has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Port d'Alcudia. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service, a tour desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 90 metres from Cala Poncet Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mar Hotels Alcanada all rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Platja d'Alcanada is 200 metres from Mar Hotels Alcanada, while Platja des Secs is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 65 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Condesa
address: C/ Roselles, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Hotel Condesa is a 4-star hotel situated right on the beach of Playa de Alcúdia. Large spaces and facilities, comfortable rooms and qualified staff will make your stay a perfect experience! The hotel is located in Alcúdia, the north of Mallorca, ideal place for active vacations thanks to the wide range of sports and leisure activities on offer. Some of the best golf courses are only 8 km from the hotel. Hotel Condesa has 466 rooms with modern, sophisticated design that fits perfectly for couples and families. All rooms are equipped with a complete bathroom, balcony, air conditioning and heating, TV, desk, minibar and safe. You can enjoy the most delicious cuisine with the wide range of dishes available in our various bars and restaurants. Don't miss to visit our Sky Bar (New opening 2021) to enjoy the magnificent views of the Mediterranean, the comfort and chill-out atmosphere. There are three outdoor swimming pools as well as a large solarium with panoramic views to the entire Playa of Alcudia and direct access to the beach. Would you like to have some relax? Our Finnish sauna is ideal for you! The hotel is also equipped with a gym for those who like to keep fit during their holidays.FarePortal

name: Agroturismo Son Siurana
address: Carretera de Palma a Alcúdia, Km.42,8, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Set in over 100 hectares of beautiful countryside, this charming farmhouse provides the perfect place to enjoy a peaceful break in rural Majorca. The Agroturismo Son Siurana is surrounded by its own picturesque estate of almond and fig trees. This idyllic setting is completed by the carefully preserved hotel building, originally dating from 1784. Inside the hotel you can relax amongst the luxury, antique-style furniture and charming period decor. More modern amenities include a huge outdoor swimming pool, from where you can enjoy amazing views across the open fields and hills.

name: Hotel Bella Playa & Spa
address: Av. Cala Agulla, 121, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Just 250 metres off the fine, sandy Cala Agulla beach, this classic Majorcan hotel allows you to enjoy a range of relaxing and energetic outdoor activities under the Mediterranean sun. You can choose to spend the day sunbathing beside the hotel’s outdoor swimming pool or on the stunning beach nearby. For a more active day you can go on one of the guided walks organised by the hotel or play tennis on the hotel’s court. Seasonal Hotel opened from February to October

name: JS Sol de Alcudia
address: Avinguda Venecia, 3, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Located 450 metres from the beach in the picturesque Mallorcan resort of Port d’Alcudia, the JS Sol de Alcudia Hotel offers fantastic views over Lago Menor Lake and the mountains. Surrounded by shops and nightlife, the hotel has a large outdoor pool and children’s pool. Free sun loungers and parasols are available. The wooden terrace has a hot tub, sauna and pressure shower. JS Sol de Alcudia’s buffet restaurant offers regional and international cuisine. It features show cooking and a weekly themed dinner. There is also a poolside terrace bar with live music each night. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Guests will be able to store bicycles at the lock-up garage, subject to availability, and use the repair shop with cleaning area for free. Free parking is available nearby and Aucanada Golf Club is 3 km away. Seasonal hotel: open from April to October.

name: Portals Hills Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Seguí 4, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Surrounded by gardens with an outdoor pool, Portals Hills Boutique Hotel is located a 15-minute walk from Portals Marina. This stylish hotel has an on-site restaurant, pool bar and night club. Offering impressive sea views and a private balcony, all spacious modern accommodation features chic décor, air conditioning and free WiFi. There is a seating area, iPod dock, flat-screen TV and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Some suites have Fendi furniture, a roof terrace and private lift. At Portals Hills Boutique Hotel you will find a modern fitness centre, a wellness lounge, and a concierge service. Real Bendinat Golf Course is 3 km from the property and Palma de Mallorca Airport is 23 km away.

name: Plaza Santa Ponsa Boutique - Adults Only.
address: Plaza Santa Ponsa, 2, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: Set on Plaza Santa Ponsa, Plaza Santa Ponsa Boutique Hotel is just 200 metres from the beach. It features a restaurant, and an outdoor swimming pool with a terrace and sun loungers. Rooms are decorated in a modern-style and open onto a balcony or terrace. All rooms have air conditioning, free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom. The restaurant offers a set lunch menu and show cooking. There is an spacious terrace where guests can enjoy a drink or a meal. Cubanito Cocktail Bar has a variety of drinks and features unique décor. Breakfast is served daily. There is a 24-hour reception and free WiFi in the lobby area. The staff can arrange a variety of excursion to those who are interested. A tennis club and 2 golf courses can be found within 6 km of the property. The centre of Santa Ponsa is a 5-minute walk away, while Palma and its airport are within 30 km of the property. Rental car is available at the hotel.

name: Hotel Club Cala Marsal
address: Playa Cala Marsal, s/n, 07670 Portocolom, Mallorca
description: Set just 200 metres from Mallorca's sunny white beaches, this hotel offers a variety of facilities for all the family, including an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi, and excellent buffet dining. Admire the sea view from your private balcony at the Hotel Club Cala Marsal. Rooms are spacious and air-conditioned, with fully-equipped en suite bathrooms. Take a dip in the Club Cala Marsal's outdoor pool - there is also a pool for children - or head down to the sandy beaches to sunbathe. Explore the fine Mallorcan scenery on a rental bike, work out at the gym, or enjoy a game of tennis, table tennis or snooker back at the hotel. You can sip sangria at the pool bar, or sample Spanish beer at one of the 2 indoor bars. Make the most of a full entertainment programme from Monday to Saturday to keep your kids entertained. There is also a games room and playground.

name: Dreams Calvia Mallorca
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, 26-34, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca, Balears, Spain, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Situated in Magaluf, 100 metres from Magaluf Beach, Dreams Calvia Mallorca offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca you will find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near Dreams Calvia Mallorca include Cala Vinyes Beach, Son Maties Beach and Western Water Park. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Ona Hotels Soller Bay - Adults Only
address: Carretera d'Es Faro, 5, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Set on the seafront next to Platja d'en Repic Beach, Pure Salt Port de Sóller offers a seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has a TV and mountain or sea views. Pure Salt Port de Sóller is situated in a quiet area, 2 km from central Puerto de Soller. Trams to Soller stop within 300 metres, and restaurants and bars can be found near the hotel. The restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine, including a salad buffet. The bar has a spacious open-air terrace with wonderful views of the bay. The hotel is for people over 14 years old.

name: Hoposa Hotel Daina
address: Carrer D'Atilio Boveri, 2, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Set next to Albercutx Beach in Port de Pollença, Hoposa Daina- Adults Only has a large saltwater swimming pool with a terrace. Most rooms have a balcony with some offering sea views. The Daina’s bright, air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. They all have a safe and a private bathroom.
