The typical whitewashed Hoposa Uyal lies by the sea, in the shadow of the Tramuntana Mountains. It is 1 km outside the centre of the resort of Port de Pollença. Guests can swim in Uyal Hotel’s outdoor swimming pool, or relax on the terrace’s sun loungers. Guests can explore the natural surroundings using a bicycle hired from the hotel. There is an on-site bicycle garage with space for 70 bikes, and there is also a bicycle-washing area where you can find tools. Mechanical services are available on request. The local golf course is 10 km away. Hotel staff can help you arrange green fees.

name: Hsm Solivera
address: Eucaliptus, 16, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Situated 300 metres from Palmira Beach in Paguera, HSM S’Olivera offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace with gardens. In winter, there is a free indoor pool, hot tub and sauna. Each air-conditioned room at HSM S’Olivera has a balcony and satellite TV. Decorated in light colours, rooms have tiled floors and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s spacious buffet restaurant offers a wide selection of cold and hot dishes, including homemade desserts. There is a poolside bar service in summer. HSM Hotel S’Olivera is just 250 metres from Paguera’s seafront promenade, which is full of shops, bars and restaurants. You can walk along the seafront to Santa Ponsa, Palmanova or Magaluf. Palma de Mallorca is 22 km away, and buses to the city stop just 250 metres away.

name: Sol Palmanova
address: Pinzones, Calvià, Mallorca
description: Located just 120 metres from the beach of Palma Nova, this Katmandu-themed hotel is ideal for a family break in the Majorcan sunshine. All rooms are air conditioned and come with a balcony and a desk. The bathrooms include a hairdryer. At Sol Palmanova All Inclusive children between 8 months and 17 years old are entertained all day at the 4 different kid’s clubs, divided between age groups. Sol Palmanova All Inclusive also offers guests special rates for Katmandu Park. You will find gardens, 2 outdoor swimming pools and a terrace. Sports activities for adults include aquagym, waterpolo, table tennis tournaments, spinning classes, pilates and varied evening entertainment. Sol Palmanova Mallorca is14 km from Majorca's capital of Palma. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 25 minutes' drive away.

name: HSM Atlantic Park Hotel
address: C/Calderon De La Barca 2, Magaluf, Mallorca
description: The hotel stands out mostly for its situation, very close to the beach and leisure centre of Magalluf, but at the same time in a quiet place, without the noise and hustle of the resort´s famous nightlife. It is set at 25 km away from the airport and 15 km from the centre of Palma. The hotel offers spacious rooms that present elegant and modern decoration and colours. Each room comes with air-conditioning, cable TV and a bathroom with bath amenities. The hotel also offers high standard facilities and service with spacious and modern restaurant offers buffet style. The hotel is specialised and certified in golf: it offers the general information about golf courses in Majorca, as well as discounts in “green fees” in the most important golf courses, etc. Possibility to practice sports in the area.FarePortal

name: Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort
address: Cala Antena, Cales de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Calas de Mallorca. This 4-star hotel offers a kids' club, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has an indoor pool, evening entertainment and an ATM. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort provides certain units with sea views, and every room is fitted with a balcony. All units include a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. You can play table tennis at Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cala Antena Beach, Cala Domingos Gran Beach and Cala Domingos Petit Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 63 km from Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort.

name: Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only
address: Circuit Del Llac 105, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Ideal for a romantic break, Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has swimming pools surrounded by lovely gardens. This adults-only property offers free WiFi throughout. The Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has an outdoor hot tub, as well as a sauna. There is also a fitness centre, tennis and a multi-sports area. Bicycle rental, massages and treatments are offered at an extra cost. Each room at Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has a balcony or terrace with views over the pool or gardens. The property is only 750 metres from the beaches of Alcudia Bay. The S’Albufera Natural Park is just metres from the hotel. The local area is ideal for hiking, horse-riding and water sports. Free parking is possible on site and a free shuttle to the beach is offered.

name: Occidental Cala Viñas
address: Carrer Del Coral, 2-4, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Cala Vinas hotel is situated in one of the most beautiful spots on the Mallorcan coast on the edge of a white sand beach with crystalline waters. This brand new modern hotel offers magnificent rooms with sea views that you will enjoy from the moment you wake up. After getting up you will be able to have a dip in the incredible Majorcan waters before enjoying the exquisite cuisine of the hotel. This 4-star hotel has communal areas and facilities that are carefully designed to offer guests the utmost wellbeing. Enjoy bathing in the swimming pools of the hotel while your children have fun in the new swimming pool that features a water park. And to crown your holidays you can relax and pamper yourself with a session in the Thalassotherapy Spa while your children have fun in the Barcy Club featuring a ball pool.Barcelo.com

name: Bakour Garbi Cala Millor by Checkin
address: Urb. Son Moro, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Perfect for families, this lovely hotel is located in Cala Millor. Nestled within 600 metre(s) from the town centre, the hotel allows easy access to all this destination has to offer. The property is close to the city's main public transport connections. The hotel is within 600 metre(s) from the nearest beach. The hotel is within 1000 metres from the harbour. The establishment consists of 170 units. This hotel was established in 1999. Wi-Fi internet connection is available for further comfort and convenience. The front desk offers 24-hour reception. Bakour Garbi Cala Millor does not offer cots on demand. There is a car park at Bakour Garbi Cala Millor. Guests may avail for airport transfer service. Visitors can enjoy the delicious dining options offered in the pleasant surroundings. An array of world-class entertainment options is available at Bakour Garbi Cala Millor for guests' convenience. Thanks to the wide range of health amenities, those staying at this hotel will be able to indulge themselves during their stay. There is a full programme of organised activities ideal for sports enthusiasts and for those wishing to enjoy an active stay. Some services may be payable.FarePortal

name: Hotel Triton Beach
address: Magallanes, 11, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Set in a prime location of Majorca, Chillout Hotel Triton Beach puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Chillout Hotel Triton Beach. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Chillout Hotel Triton Beach.Agoda

name: Iberostar Playa de Muro
address: Avenida Albufera, 07408 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Iberostar Playa de Muro has an ideal setting overlooking Muro Beach, 100 metres from Albufera Nature Reserve. This resort has a main pool, two children's pools and an indoor pool in the Spa area, a spa and rooms with balconies. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. The Playa de Muro features elegant décor throughout. Its rooms have TVs with satellite channels and a minibar. The hotel has 3 restaurants,1 snack bar with sea views and a food truck by the pool. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub, heated loungers, a rain-effect shower and 2 saunas. There is also a gym. A kid's club is available from May to October. Iberostar Playa de Muro offers unique services for cyclists and sports travelers. There is a repair shop, garage and a fully equipped gym. Bicycles are available for hire, there are special menus, sports shop and a dedicated team. S’Estany Gran Lake is just 15 minutes’ walk from the resort.

name: Marsenses Ferrera Blanca Hotel
address: Carrer Sa Partió, 1, 07669 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Offering direct access to Cala Ferrera beach, and close to the most beautiful beaches in Majorca, this fantastic resort is perfect for an enjoyable holiday in the sun. Located in a quiet and peaceful area, this complex is the perfect place to relax. The apartments are fully equipped, and perfect accommodation for families. Take a dip in the hotel’s outdoor swimming pools, complete with sun bathing areas. You can also admire the views from the large terrace, stroll around the garden.

name: FERGUS Bermudas
address: Calle Pinzones, 20, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Footsteps from Palmanova beach, FERGUS Bermudas has a large garden with outdoor pool. Relax with the entertainment program and dine in the restaurant before heading to the bar. Enjoying an exotic position on the stunning island of Majorca, this hotel has a sunny, tropical feel with a privileged position near the beach and a design which makes the most of its surroundings. All bedrooms have private balconies where you can breathe the fresh sea air and soak up the Majorcan sunshine. Browse the nearby shops, bars and restaurants of Palmanovas centre and take the short stroll down to the beach for a swim in the Mediterranean and admire gorgeous sea views. Have fun taking part in the day and night entertainment programme. Kids will have fun and make new friends in the childrens miniclub. This hotel features 10.000 square metres of lush gardens. There is free private parking on site.

name: Sol Guadalupe
address: Crta. La Porrasa, 4 - Calvia Beach, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Sol Guadalupe is 200 metres from Mallorca’s Magalluf Beach, and offers a 24-hour self-service kitchen for families with babies. It features a large lagoon-style pool with hot tub, indoor pool and 2 children's pools. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a small fridge. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms come with a spacious terrace overlooking the pool, mountains or sea. Sol Guadalupe restaurant offers buffet meals and show cooking in the dining room, which is air-conditioned in summer. There is also an Italian corner and a poolside snack bar. A daytime and evening entertainment programme is provided, including fitness sessions, Tai-chi and yoga. Children have their own playground and mini club. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge. Aquapark is 2 km away and Poniente Golf Club is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Reservations include a free Sol Katmandu Fun Pass with discounts at the Katmandu Theme Park and the Wave House.

name: Sol Katmandu Park & Resort
address: Calle Galeón, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Sol Katmandu Park & Resort is located just 5 minutes' walk from Magalluf Beach and it is within the Katmandu Theme Park. It offers 2 swimming pools, one of which is only for children, and free WiFi throughout. The property organises a varied entertainment programme for children with Boro & Friends Musical Buffet & Show. Guests have free access to Katmandu Theme Park's wide range of rides including a splash park, a soft play adventure area and a 4D cinema. Sol Katmandu Park & Resort offers rooms with a furnished terrace or balcony, offering views of the mountains or the pool and garden. There is a satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar, and telephone. A safe is available for an extra charge. The bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The hotel’s themed buffet restaurant offers international food. There is also a lounge bar and a poolside bar. There are many golf courses nearby, and the Western Water Park is just 2 km away. Within 5 minutes you can walk to Magalluf's main shopping and leisure areas. Palma de Mallorca is 15 km away.

name: Hotel Exagon Park
address: Ronda de Pleta, 46, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Hotel Exagon Park is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Majorca. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room, restaurant, tours are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, heating, wake-up service. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool, spa. Convenience and comfort makes Hotel Exagon Park the perfect choice for your stay in Majorca.priceline.com

name: Aluasoul Alcudia Bay
address: Carrer De La Gavina, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Set on Alcudia Bay, this tranquil hotel is ideal for a break on the long, sandy beaches of northern Majorca, or for simply lying back beside the pool. AluaSoul Alcudia Bay is surrounded by pine trees and lies just 300 metres from several kilometres of fine white sand and clear, Mediterranean waters. Take a dip in the sea or dive into the outdoor swimming pool at the hotel, which comes surrounded by comfortable sun loungers. You can choose to get involved in the organised aerobics, volleyball, tennis or football. After a delicious buffet meal, settle down to enjoy the live entertainment offered each evening.

name: Alua Boccaccio
address: Avda. Pedro Mas y Reus, 3, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Alua Boccaccio offers an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony,and has a multi-sports court. Free WiFi is available in public areas. S’Albufera Nature Reserve is just 5 minutes’ drive away from the Boccaccio. Palma de Mallorca Airport can be reached in 45 minutes, by car. Alua Boccaccio is located in Puerto de Alcudia, standing just 150 metres from the sea, it is next to the iconic Lago Esperanza. Alua Boccaccio offers: buffet restaurant, pool bar,cocktail bar, beach bar for snacks and drinks, outdoor swimming pools, multi-sports court, miniclub, free wifi and gym. Reservations of more than 5 rooms are subject to supplements and special conditions

name: Mar Hotels Playa Mar & Spa
address: Carretera Formentor s/n, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Playa Mar & Spa offers bright studios, 50 metres from the beach in Puerto Pollença, Mallorca. There is a tennis court, outdoor pool, and spa with heated indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Each apartment has a balcony, twin bedroom and living room with a sofa bed and TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The complex has an air-conditioned restaurant, bar and snack bar. There are several lounges and a TV and video room. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Playa Mar & Spa has 24-hour reception and you can hire a car or bicycle. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Na Forana
address: Arquitecto Alomar, 5, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel Na Forana is set on Son Moll Beach, between Cala Rajada and Capdepera. It features a gym, hot tub, an indoor pool and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool overlooking the beach. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Hotel Na Forana has elegant décor, a TV, a safe and a minibar. Many rooms offer balconies with sea views. You can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes in the Na Forana’s buffet restaurant, which offers show cooking twice a day. There are also spacious lounge areas with free Wi-Fi. Free kayak tours are organised from the Hotel Na Forana reception desk. The centre of Cala Rajada is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while Capdepera is a 20-minute walk away. There are 2 golf courses within 5 km of the Na Forana.

name: Catalonia Atenas
address: Av. Meridiana, 151, 08026 Barcelona
description: Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath. The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV. The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor. The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

name: Grupotel Gran Via 678
address: Gran Via de Les Corts Catalanes, 678, 08010 Barcelona
description: The stylish Gran Via 678 is situated 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya in central Barcelona and features an outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Modern rooms at this design hotel include satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is complete with a hairdryer. Grupotel Gran Via 678 offers a restaurant which serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. Guests can enjoy meals on the terrace. Urquinaona Metro Station is 400 metres away while the Arc de Triomf monument is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
address: Roger De Llúria 60, 08009 Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status. All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available. Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away. The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

name: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
address: Cl. Mallorca, 216, Barcelona
description: Balmes is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a swimming pool, a gym/fitness center and modern rooms with satellite TV. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Balmes feature parquet floors and smart, simple décor. They all come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel’s restaurant serves typical Catalan food using fresh market produce. B Bar, like the rest of the hotel, is decorated with works of African art. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is a computer in the lobby which guests can use for free. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both under 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can walk to Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s charming Gothic Quarter in around 15 minutes.

name: Ilunion Les Corts Spa
address: Cardenal Reig 11, 08028 Barcelona
description: Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels. A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira
address: Carrer Dels Alts Forns, 40, Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel. At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace. Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

name: Hotel Granados 83, a Member of Design Hotels
address: Enrique Granados 83, 08008 Barcelona
description: Located 250 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station, Granados 83 offers a small gym and roof terrace with a small pool and cocktail bar. Rooms feature Zen-style design and LCD TV. This design hotel has an impressive glass and stone façade and it combines neoclassical details with industrial and natural components which has become representative of the entire city and which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It also features beautiful Art Deco interiors. Decorated with wood, leather and glass, the Granados 83’s stylish air-conditioned rooms include a minibar, bathrobe and slippers. The elegant restaurant serves creative Mediterranean cuisine and room service is available. There are many popular tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, on Rambla de Catalunya. Passeig de Gràcia is 400 metres away, and is home to Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and on-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

name: NH Barcelona Stadium
address: Travessera de Les Corts, 150-152, 08028 Barcelona
description: Formerly known as NH Rallye, the NH Barcelona Stadium hotel is in a convenient location in the Les Corts area of Barcelona. Several local points of interest are easily accessible within walking distance such as the FC Barcelona stadium and museum, El Corte Inglés, and the L'illa Diagonal shopping mall. The metro station Les Corts with links to the city center is only a few minutes away. Contemporary comforts such as air-conditioning, Wi-Fi and satellite TV come as standard in each of our 106 modern guest rooms. Other rooms offer a spacious sitting area and a coffee or tea maker. A delightful breakfast buffet is freshly prepared for our guests every morning. Made-to-order hot meals and an early bird breakfast are also available upon request. The Ristorante Don Giovanni by renowned chef Andrea Tumbarello with its typical Italian flavors and top-quality seasonal products or enjoy an aperitif with some snacks at the Gastrobar right next to the restaurant. Our friendly staff is on hand to offer recommendations for excellent local restaurants for additional lunch or dinner selections. We are pleased to host events both large and small. The NH Barcelona Stadium has seven meeting rooms which hold up to a maximum of 250 guests. With advance notice, our special events services team can assist with menu planning, equipment and services.NH Hoteles

name: Well and Come Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer Girona 158, 08037 Barcelona
description: Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia. This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms. Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror. Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views. Hotel Well and Come features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area. The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

name: El Avenida Palace
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes, 605, 08003 Barcelona
description: El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns. Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965. The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe. The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

name: Ocean Drive Barcelona
address: Calle Aragon 300, 08009 Barcelona
description: Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace. Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Novotel Barcelona City
address: Avinguda Diagonal 201, 08018 Barcelona
description: Upon arrival you will be greeted by our team in a close, friendly way. Enjoy our buffet breakfast and the magic of show-cooking, plus the Mediterranean cuisine served in our restaurant with fresh and seasonal products. Visit the 19th floor and enjoy the spectacular panoramic view of Barcelona, with a cocktail or some tapas. Immerse yourself in our pool under the sun's rays.accorhotels.com

name: Catalonia Born
address: Rec Comtal 16-18, 08003 Barcelona
description: Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away. The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season. A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby. Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

name: H10 Metropolitan
address: Rambla Catalunya 7-9, 08007 Barcelona
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Barcelona. There is also a gym with a terrace and a swimming pool. There are a variety of amenities on offer to guests of H10 Metropolitan, such as a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and meeting facilities. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer assistance. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature soundproofed windows, an alarm clock, an in-room closet and a flat-screen TV. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the area with use of Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, which is a brief walk from the hotel. H10 Metropolitan features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day with dinner and a drink. The hotel also provides breakfast each morning. H10 Metropolitan is close to Passeig de Gracia Train Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Barcelona and its surrounding areas. Barcelona Cathedral, the Liceu and La Rambla are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Ofelias Hotel
address: Carrer De Llanca, 24, 08015 Barcelona
description: Set just off Gran Vía and a 2-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Fira Exhibition Centre, Ofelias Hotel offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Ofelias Hotel has a flat-screen TV. Each one comes with a private bathroom. A free bottle of water is provided upon arrival. The hotel has an on-site bar where you can get a drink. There is a range of cafes and bars around Plaza Espanya. Restaurants can be found on Las Ramblas and in the Gothic Quarter, just 4 Metro stops away. Staff at the reception can give you information about different Slow Travel activities.These include free bicycles on request, allowing you to discover hidden places and enjoy local cultures. The Magic Fountains and Montjuïc Park are less than 1 km from the Ofelias, and Las Arenas Shopping centre is just opposite the hotel. The airport bus stops just 200 metres from the hotel. Bicycle rental is available on request from reception.

name: H10 Art Gallery
address: Enric Granados 62-64, 08008 Barcelona
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 4.5-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Barcelona. It also offers a rooftop terrace, free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool. Guests staying at H10 Art Gallery Hotel can enjoy taking a dip in the plunge pool, working out in the fitness centre or relaxing with a drink at the on site bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private bathroom, heating and a mini bar. They all have ironing facilities and a telephone. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Barcelona's attractions, such as Avinguda Diagonal, La Pedrera Casa Mila and Passeig de Gracia, are within easy walking distance of H10 Art Gallery Hotel. Guests can also visit University of Barcelona, the Casa Batllo and Casa Lleo Morera.Revato

name: Occidental Diagonal 414
address: Avenida Diagonal, 414, Barcelona
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility.Barcelo.com

name: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky
address: C/ Lope De Vega, 141-147, Barcelona
description: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky is located in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. This stylish hotel offers a range of luxury services, including 1 on-site restaurant and free spa access. The Serena SPA Wellness includes a sauna, Turkish baths, bithermal shower and a heated pool with whirlpool. Guests also have access to a discount on massages. The modern, air-conditioned rooms at The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky feature free WiFi, a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a coffee maker and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower, bathrobe and slippers. There is a restaurant serving Mediterranean dishes, and guests have the option of a buffet breakfast with views over Barcelona. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky has a poolside bar. On the 24th floor of the hotel The Level at Meliá Barcelona Sky you can enjoy a cocktail or premium drinks at the Skyline 24 which offers views over the city. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky offers a personalised reception with flexible check-out times, as well as helping to arrange tickets for trips, shows and car hire. Poblenou Metro Station is 450 metres from the hotel, and you can walk to the seafront in around 15 minutes. Torre Agbar Tower is 1 km away.

name: Catalonia Gracia
address: C/ Corcega 368, 08037 Barcelona
description: This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available. Situated along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera. A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available. Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

name: H10 Port Vell
address: Pas de Sota Muralla, 9, 08003 Barcelona
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Barcelona. It also features a plunge pool and a rooftop terrace. This trendy hotel provides a concierge, a 24-hour reception and a coffee bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. H10 Port Vell offers air conditioned rooms with slippers, a mini bar and a rain shower. Each includes a private bathroom with a hair dryer and bathrobes. H10 Port Vell is close to Estacio de Franca Railway Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Barcelona and its surrounding areas. Palau de la Musica Catalana, Barcelona Cathedral and La Rambla are a brief walk away.Revato

name: Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Mallorca 251, 08008 Barcelona
description: Welcome to the Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton. This designer boutique hotel is where fascinating history, modernist details, and avant-garde meet. Moments from Passeig de Gràcia – the fashion, culture, and commercial heart of Barcelona – our hotel is a quick walk to Rambla de Catalunya, Casa Batlló, La Pedrera, and other top attractions. Our fully renovated 19th-century building reflects the charm, elegance, and spirit of our Barcelona surroundings. You'll love the local photography that lines our walls, designer furniture from the ‘50s and ‘60s, original mosaic flooring, framed ceilings, and natural oak throughout the hotel. Every guest room features parquet flooring or modernist tiles, plush bedding, and complimentary WiFi. Upgrade to one of our spacious suites for a king size bed and a minimum 40-inch HDTV. Some of our suites feature a living room area with sofa, an indoor/outdoor bathtub plus bathrobe and slippers, and terrace. Alexandra Barcelona offers excellent dining experiences including a Catalan gastronomic breakfast buffet with local quality products, a brasserie featuring ingredients grown in our own vegetable garden, a Charcuterie bar with Catalan specialties, and a stunning patio terrace by the pool. We are also pleased to send delicious meals to your door, 24-hours a day. Pamper your mind and body in our outdoor pool with chill out sundeck, dry Finnish sauna, massage cabins, or fitness center. We offer an extraordinary central location with stylish indoor/outdoor function spaces for up to 150 guests – perfect for business meetings, social events, and weddings.Hilton

name: Yurbban Passage Hotel & Spa
address: Carrer de Trafalgar 26, 08003 Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 400 metres from Portal de l'Angel, Yurbban Passage Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and spa centre. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. All rooms include a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room includes a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. Yurbban Passage Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy an authentic Catalan breakfast each morning. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire. Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from Yurbban Passage Hotel, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Hotel SB Glow
address: Carrer De Badajoz 148-154, 08018 Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel SB Glow Sup features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna and the hammam, or enjoy city views. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Hotel SB Glow Sup rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Grill Bbq cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel SB Glow Sup. Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Nova Icaria Beach is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Hotel SB Glow Sup.

name: Hotel Primero Primera
address: Carrer Doctor Carulla, 25-29, 08017 Barcelona
description: Offering stylish rooms with free, high-speed Wi-Fi and iPod docking stations, Primero Primera is located in the Sarrià district. 5 minutes’ walk from Les Tres Torres FGC Station, this boutique hotel is set in gardens. Each air-conditioned room at the Primero Primera has contemporary décor. All rooms have tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and minibar. A buffet breakfast is served in the Primero’s restaurant "Planta Baja" or on the charming terrace. The Sarrià district features a range of cafés, bars and restaurants. Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes by train. FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is 2.5 km away.

name: Hotel Sofia Barcelona, In The Unbound Collection By Hyatt
address: Plaza de Pio XII, 4, 08028 Barcelona
description: Hotel Sofia Barcelona is set on Barcelona's Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. It features free WiFi throughout, on-site restaurants and stunning city views. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment. Designer rooms at Sofia offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, and air conditioning. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers. The hotel offers several gastronomic spaces, including SOFIA Be So restaurant serving traditional dishes, and Impar Restaurant, which serves fresh Mediterranean dishes prepared with international culinary techniques. It also features a spacious outdoor terrace. Guests will also find a sophisticated book cafe, Philosofia, which serves confectionery and fresh pastries, to eat in or take away. Sofia Oasis Wellness & Spa houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists. Sofia Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes away on foot We accept dogs up to 18 kg in weight, with a maximum of one per room. For pets. Dogs classified as dangerous breeds are not allowed. Pets must comply with current health regulations. They must be supervised by an adult at all times and steady on a leash when going through public areas. €100 will be charged for deep cleaning of the room at the time of departure. (Service dogs are exempt from said fee) €25 per pet per day will be charged in addition to the room rate.

name: Room Mate Anna
address: Carrer De Aragó 271, 8007 Barcelona
description: Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday. Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box. Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms. On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas. The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time. The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Seventy Barcelona
address: Carrer de Còrsega 344, Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, Seventy Barcelona is within walking distance of Passeig de Gracia and offers a swimming pool and a sauna. It is steps from Avinguda Diagonal, restaurants and nightlife options. Guests can enjoy the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Amenities include free wireless internet and a coffee bar. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as a coffee maker and a flat-screen TV. They provide a private bathroom, an in-room safe and heating. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. Barcelona's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Seventy Barcelona, with La Pedrera Casa Mila only a few minutes away. Casa Lleo Morera, the Casa Batllo and Carrer Gran de Gracia are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Intercontinental Barcelona, An IHG Hotel
address: Avenida Ruis I Taulet 1-3, 08004 Barcelona
description: InterContinental Barcelona is the perfect base for enjoying all the culture the city offers. Elegant interiors and sophisticated design details matched with unparalleled hospitality. Nestled in the heart of Montjuic, we are the closest hotel to the stadium. Easily connected to the airport and walking distance to city center Enjoy a drink in our signature bar Gebre, dine at our exclusive Quirat restaurant or take in the magnificent views from our 173 Rooftop Terrace.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Hoxton Poblenou
address: Avinguda Diagonal 205, 08018 Barcelona
description: Set in our favourite corner of Barcelona, The Hoxton, Poblenou gives you a real flavour of local life. We've got 240 rooms, a rooftop pool and taqueria, a bright and airy lobby, a sunny pizza terrace and slice shop, and a multi-functional basement space.Our 240 rooms suit all kinds of stays settle into a Cosy, Roomy, Biggy or Homey. Terracotta floors and faded florals make you feel right at home in the Med, whilst statement headboards, Roberts radios, and handcrafted artworks add that homely Hoxton touch. Nobody leaves here hungry. Enjoy poolside tacos and margaritas up on the roof at Tope, or tuck into Detroit-style pizza at Four Corners, a terrace, all-day restaurant and slice shop. Whatever the occasion, we've got the space. Our bright and airy Apartment is meeting and events space like no other, with three differently sized rooms, a pantry kitchen-come-bar, and its own dedicated street-level entrance.iHotelier/iStay

name: Eurostars Grand Marina
address: Moll de Barcelona Edifici Sud Of. 323, 08039 Barcelona
description: Set within the World Trade Center building, this 5-star design hotel overlooks Barcelona’s port and is a 5-minute walk from La Rambla. It features a seasonal rooftop pool, a gym and a spacious terrace. The Eurostars Grand Marina Hotel GL offers modern rooms with wooden flooring and warm-coloured fabrics. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a spacious work desk are featured in each room. A pillow menu is also available. The chic Grand Marina restaurant serves Mediterranean meals prepared with seasonal ingredients, while the lobby bar features exotic cocktails and live music. In the mornings, a rich breakfast is served on the terrace, weather permitting. The Marina GL's gym offers cardiovascular equipment and free weights. Massage services are available. Drassanes Metro Station, providing links to the rest of the city, is just 500 metres from the hotel while Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

name: The Barcelona EDITION
address: Avinguda de Francesc Cambo 14, Barcelona
description: The Barcelona EDITION is located in the Gothic Quarter, on the edge of El Born District. Our boutique hotel is an oasis in the heart of the city, situated beside the Picasso Museum and the Barcelona Gothic Cathedral, adjacent to the Santa Caterina Market and steps away from Plaça de Catalunya, Passeig de Gràcia and Barceloneta beach. With a modern design merging the timeless aesthetic of Ian Schrager and the bold buzz of Barcelona, The Barcelona EDITION is a luxury hotel featuring 100 sophisticated guest rooms, suites and 2 penthouses with unparalleled views of the city, a Mediterranean market cuisine restaurant, a state-of-the-art micro-club and lounge to revel in, a specialty cocktail bar serving punches, an Asian street-food rooftop bar with outdoor pool and sunbeds serving signature cocktails, complimentary 24-hour Gym and Room Service.Marriott

name: Hotel 1898
address: La Rambla, 109, 08002 Barcelona
description: Hotel 1898, located in the midst of Barcelonas famous Ramblas, and housed in what was once the headquarters of the General Philippines Tobacco Company, offers luxury accommodations for visitors who like to travel in style, and who appreciate attention to detail. The hotel offers three suites and 5 room types, all featuring soundproof walls, fine dcor, and state-of-the-art technology.The restaurant at H1898 is also one of the best ways to become familiar with the fabulous cuisine of Barcelona. On the hotel terrace, La Isabela, you can admire views of the city skyline while enjoying our exquisite house-made tapas or one of our original cocktails. Meanwhile, the Colonial touches of Bar H1898 make it an ideal gathering spot; centrally located, relaxed, and sophisticated, its the perfect place to meet up with friends or colleagues.iHotelier/iStay

name: Mercer Hotel Barcelona
address: Carrer Dels Lledó, 7, 08002 Barcelona
description: Featuring a rooftop swimming pool, Mercer Hotel Barcelona is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, within 10 minutes’ walk of Las Ramblas. This boutique hotel is set in one of the city’s ancient buildings, next to the Roman walls. The stylish rooms at Mercer Hotel Barcelona have chic décor with original beamed ceilings and exposed brick walls. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom has a rain-effect shower. The hotel features an interior courtyard with orange trees. There is also a poolside bar and a terrace with loungers. Several cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the charming, winding streets and pretty squares surrounding the hotel. Jaume I Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Mercer. The trendy Born district is approximately 300 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

name: Monument Hotel
address: Passeig de Gràcia 75, 08008 Barcelona
description: Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa. Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views. The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy. Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 metres away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided. The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

name: H10 Casa Mimosa
address: C. Pau Claris 179, 8037 Barcelona
description: Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace. All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces. The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink. The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area. From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people. Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

name: Almanac Barcelona
address: Gran Via de Les Corts Catalanes 619-621, 08007 Barcelona
description: Almanac Barcelona is the first in a collection of luxury hotels and opened its doors in the fall of 2017. Located on Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 619-621, the boutique hotel features 91 luxurious accommodations. In a prime location, the hotel is steps from Passeig de Gracia, where guests can find stylish shopping, restaurants, bars and museums.A new luxury hospitality tastemaker, Almanac Hotels is developing iconic hotels in landmark locations. Our mission is to enhance the guest experience through the elements of travel that make up an entire journey: Scent, Taste, Light and Touch. When all those things come together in an exciting way, your heart may skip a Beat or it may beat faster in either case you will know they got it right.iHotelier/iStay

name: Catalonia Catedral
address: Calle dels Arcs 10, 08002 Barcelona
description: The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden. The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a minibar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge. The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free. The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one kilometre away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

name: Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel
address: Placa d'Europa, 50-52, 08902 Barcelona
description: Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel is conveniently located in Barcelona’s Plaza Europa Square, next to the Fira Convention Centre Comprised two 110 meter towers joined by a spectacular panoramic restaurant and a terrace-vantage point with views over the city of W.Architecturally the Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel, highlights a vertical garden oasis of palm trees and lush vegetation. All 357 bedrooms are designed with a two-toned chromatic effect in mind. The hotel has 11 module-based meeting rooms. our Palmer restaurant, Oasis and El Cel are perfect for Business travellers, and couples taking a weekend break in beautiful Barcelona. Marriott Bonvoy guests who book direct receive complimentary WIFI for the duration of stay.Marriott

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto
address: Mercabarna Franca, 08040 Barcelona
description: Family run Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto of Barcelona, would like to welcome you to our hotel, where the relaxed atmosphere stems from the courtesy and friendliness of the staff guarantees a convenient and comfortable stay whether your visit is on business or leisure. Convenient hotel’s location to the public metro & bus stations is only minutes away from the Airport of Barcelona-El Prat-Josep Tarradellas, Cruise Pier, International Exhibitions and Trade Fair, and the city center. Enjoy a quality night’s sleep in one of our 100 bedrooms from a large suite, comfortable double and triple rooms or cozy up in a cute single room. All of them come with superb bathrooms, rainforest showers, free Wi-Fi, tea and coffee facilities, satellite TV. Discover exceptional dining in our Gran Mercat Restaurant with a selection of delicious dishes of a traditional Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine from our executive Chef or enjoy a pre-dinner drink, cocktail or glass of cava and feel like at home in our lounge and cafeteria Mercabar with their comfortable Chester sofas. Before going to the Airport do not forget to choose one of our breakfast options available every morning; hearty and healthy buffet breakfast or an early bird express breakfast, all of them at a very affordable price. Additional on-site amenities include a newly refurbished multi-functional meeting rooms suitable for business functions or family events; free access to our Alfa Gym, which offers a variety of top-quality training equipment. Moreover, it offers an indoor pool and sauna room. All you need to increase your feeling of well-being! Our complimentary shuttle service running between both airport terminals and the hotel between 5 a.m. and 10:30am and from 18:15 to 12:30 a.m. The hotel boasts secure on-site parking for guests. Our hotel sincere aim is to offer an impressive and highly pleasing experience after of before a transatlantic flight and pre/post-cruising.bestwestern.com

name: Room Mate Gerard
address: Calle Ausias March 34, Barcelona
description: Room Mate Gerard in Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. It boasts a sun terrace and location, set in the Eixample district, near attractions such as Tivoli Theatre and within 700 metres of Portal de l'Angel. At the hotel all rooms offer a simple yet elegant décor. They come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Air-conditioning is featured, and certain rooms include a balcony. All units include a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Speaking English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Other facilities include portable WiFi. Plaça Catalunya is a 9-minute walk from the accommodation. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: H10 Madison
address: C/ Dr. Joaquim Pou, 2-4-6, 08002 Barcelona
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Barcelona. It provides free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a rooftop terrace. H10 Madison has a fitness centre with a swimming pool, a rooftop terrace and a sun deck. Facilities include an all-hours reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. H10 Madison offers air conditioned rooms with a rain shower, luxury toiletries and a mini bar. Each includes its very own bathroom with bathrobes, a hair dryer and slippers. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. Room service is also offered during limited hours. Situated a short walk from Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, the hotel offers a tour desk with information on what to see and do in Barcelona. Guests can also easily visit Placa de Catalunya, La Rambla and the Liceu.Revato

name: Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
address: Carrer Del Peru 102, 08018 Barcelona
description: With the arrival of Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio hotel, the brand's first venture into the city, an opulent destination is now available for locals and professionals seeking luxurious accommodations. Positioned in the midst of the high technology business area and upcoming 22@ district in Poblenou neighborhood, guests can immerse themselves in the lively atmosphere of the area. This ultra-modern establishment represents a remarkable symbiosis of technology, creativity, and sustainability, boasting a human-focused design supported by cutting-edge technology that ensures both comfort and user-friendliness. Our meticulously designed guest rooms and suites offer stunning views of the city's iconic Sagrada Familia or the mesmerizing sea, providing an ideal setting for both relaxation and work. The dining offerings encompass the all-day Alcachofa, a seafood-minded restaurant, along with Za'atar Pool & Bar, an establishment that serves Middle'terranean cuisine.Marriott

name: Duquesa de Cardona 4 Sup
address: Passeig De Colom, 12, 08002 Barcelona
description: The 19th-century Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup, opposite Barcelona’s marina in the Gothic Quarter, is 600 metres from the Ramblas and has free Wi-Fi. Its rooftop terrace offers panoramic city views and includes 2 plunge pools and a bar. Property also features a Gym. Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers. The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails. The famous Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km away, and Barceloneta Metro Station is only 300 metres away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre and Barcelona Aquarium are 500 metres from Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup.

name: Hotel España Ramblas
address: Carrer de Sant Pau 9-11, 08001 Barcelona
description: Hotel España is situated in a 19th-century building in central Barcelona, within 100 metres of the Ramblas and Liceu Theatre and 200 metres from Boqueria Market. Its Mediterranean restaurant is run by famous chef Martín Berasategui. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout. The stylish and elegant rooms include a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. They also come with a modern bathroom. Hotel España offers a variety of drinks and cocktails at AlAire rooftop terrace bar. There is also a small swimming pool. Liceu Metro Station is 100 metres away and the Gothic Quarter is less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Neri Relais & Chateaux
address: Carrer de Sant Sever, 5, 08002 Barcelona
description: This chic, exclusive hotel is set in an 18th-century aristocratic house overlooking a secluded square in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Its contemporary style contrasts with the impressive historic surroundings. Set right beside the city’s Cathedral, the Hotel Neri lies just a short distance from the bustling Las Ramblas. The building’s original period charm has been preserved and enhanced by the hotel’s sophisticated interior design. This design blends with relaxing music and sensual aromas to create a unique setting in this ancient, atmospheric area of central Barcelona. Dine on delicious specialities in the hotel restaurant or enjoy a drink at the terrace bar. You can also spend a relaxing moment in the tranquil library or on the pretty rooftop garden terrace. Hotel Neri Relais & Châteaux preserves its impressive façade to Sant Felip Neri square as well as a 17th-century stone wall, which separates the lounge bar area of the restaurant. It has the status of Specialty Monument. Hotel Neri also offers apartments housed in a restored classic building located few metres away. Please see the individual apartment description for more details.

name: Alma Barcelona Gl
address: Mallorca, 269-271, 08008 Barcelona
description: Alma Barcelona is set in an attractive building just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia. It offers a spa, a stylish restaurant with a terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Alma Barcelona rooms feature smart, modern décor and leather armchairs. They are equipped with a flat-screen Loewe TV, Punkt phone, and the private bathrooms come with a bathrobe and slippers. The Alma’s spa features an indoor pool, a Hammam and a sauna. There is a gym, and massage is also available. Staff at the Alma’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions. On request, the hotel offers an airport shuttle service to Barcelona El Prat Airport, a 25-minute drive away. The hotel is just one block from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and a 5-minute walk from Casa Batlló. You can walk to Diagonal Metro Station in 5 minutes, while Plaza de Catalunya is just over 1 km away.

name: TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel - Adults only
address: Calabria 90-92, 08015 Barcelona
description: Offering a rooftop pool with a large sun terrace, TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel is located in the heart of the gay district of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach. The hetero-friendly hotel offers on-site private parking. There is also a 24-hour reception and guests can get information on the gay scene and the city at the on-site tour desk. On the rooftop guests will also find the Sky bar, gym, steam bath and a massage room. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A safety deposit box and a universal phone charger are also provided. Guests can sample a drink at the rooftop bar, whilst taking in stunning city views or enjoy the delicious cocktails served in the Lounge Bar. A buffet breakfast is available and free high-speed WiFi access is provided throughout. Staff can give information about the surrounding area, which is known as "Gayxample" because of its lively gay nightlife. The hotel is 2 minutes' walk from Rocafort Metro Station and Plaça d'Espanya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is a 10-minute walk away. Paral·lel, with bars, restaurants, clubs and theatres is 1.3 km from TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel.

name: H10 Montcada Boutique Hotel
address: Via Laietana 24, 08003 Barcelona
description: Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada has fantastic views of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the sea from its roof terrace and hot tub. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada feature parquet floors and natural light. Each one comes with a minibar, a free safe, and a flat-screen TV with international satellite channels. The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast. There are also 2 bars, including the Sunset Bar located on the roof terrace. Room service is also available. The attentive staff at the 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. Bicycle and car rental services can also be arranged. Barcelona's main tourist attractions such as the Cathedral, the Ramblas and the Picasso Museum are within walking distance of the hotel. Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Palau de la Música Catalana, a spectacular Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: H10 Marina Barcelona
address: Avenida Bogatell, 64-68, 08005 Barcelona
description: H10 Marina Hotel Barcelona is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Olympic Port. It offers a gym, spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooftop pool and sun terrace offer fantastic city and sea views. The bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel H10 Marina Barcelona feature parquet floors and satellite TV. They have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s Dionissos restaurant serves à la carte and tapas meals, and room service is available. Bar La Llum offers an extensive wine list. Access to the H10 Marina’s spa is available for an extra cost. It features a sauna, steam baths and an indoor pool. Massage and beauty services are also available. Bogatell Beach, where you can find many beach bars and restaurants, is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. It is 200 metres to Bogatell Metro, which connects you with central Barcelona in 10 minutes. There is a tour desk and you can hire a car or bicycle. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services are offered.

name: Ilunion Barcelona
address: Calle Ramon Turó 196-198, 08005 Barcelona
description: Located 10 minutes away from Bogatell Beach in the 22 district, the modern Ilunion Barcelona features a rooftop swimming pool, sun terrace, and a gym. The CCIB Conference Centre is 2 km away. Free WiFi is available. Rooms at Ilunion Barcelona feature air conditioning, a desk and a TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe and minibar are provided. Superior rooms also feature a furnished terrace with sea or city views. This hotel is officially adapted for disabled guests. It has rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility or hearing/visual impairment, available upon request. Ilunion Barcelona's restaurant serves breakfast and also offers an à la carte menu. The hotel has a bar and provides room service. A menu for guests with specific dietary requirements is also available. Just a few minutes walk from the hotel is Rambla de Poblenou and Bogatell Beach, which are home to a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. The shopping centre is a 4-minute drive away and the Diagonal Mar shopping centre is an 8-minute drive away. Ilunion Barcelona has pleasant, renovated common areas and free internet access. Private underground parking is available for an extra cost. Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Station is located less than 300 metres from the hotel. The bus stop of the line number 6 is located 50 metres from the hotel. Gran Via is 15 minutes away by bus. There is a tourist bus stop near the hotel. Barcelona-El Prat airport is located 20 km away, with quick access to the Ronda Litoral.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Pódium
address: Bailen 4-6, 08010 Barcelona
description: Stay in one of Barcelona’s loveliest neighborhoods at the NH Collection Barcelona Pódium. Only steps away from the Arc de Triomf, the hotel enjoys a central location and is a short 15-minute walk to the luxury stores along Passeig de Gràcia and the bustling Las Ramblas. Stroll through the Parc de la Ciutadella or go there for an invigorating run. The Arc de Triomf metro and train station is right by the hotel, providing direct links to everything in the city. The harbor and zoo are also nearby. NH Collection Barcelona Pódium has 140 stylish rooms, some of which come with balconies. Each has its own Nespresso machine, a pillow menu and premium mattress for perfect sleep. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. For relaxation throughout the day, head to the rooftop pool or to the gym and sauna. A lavish breakfast with fresh delicacies including Catalan specialties is served daily. In the afternoons and evenings, choose between a contemporary Mediterranean restaurant or head to the rooftop tapas bar. In the winter, unwind with a drink at the ground-floor bar. For your special events or even for a wedding, reserve our spectacular terrace or one of the 8 meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Bagues, a Small Luxury Hotels of the World
address: La Rambla, 105, 08002 Barcelona
description: A rooftop pool and bar with fantastic city views are offered at this 5-star boutique hotel, situated on Las Ramblas. Each stylish room displays a unique item of jewellery from the Masriera Museum. Hotel Bagués is set in the restored El Regulador Palace, once a jewellery workshop, and it is built in a romantic, classical style, which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It still houses the Masriera Jewellery Museum. Rooms are decorated in deep colours, with ebony furniture and details in gold leaf. An iPod dock, flat-screen satellite TV and free soft drinks minibar are included. Many rooms also have views of La Rambla. Situated in the Gothic Quarter, Hotel Bagués is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Just 300 metres away, Plaza Catalunya Square offers excellent bus and Metro links. Modern fusion cuisine is served in El Regulador Bistro. This includes creative versions of typical Catalan dishes. Room service is available 24 hours a day.

name: Alexandre Hotel Fira Congress
address: C/ de Jose Agustín Goytisolo, 9-11, 08908 L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Catalonia
description: This modern hotel in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as a free shuttle service and an executive floor. It features 4-star rooms with views of the city. This contemporary hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and a coffee bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. Hotel Fira Congress Barcelona offers 160 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Also available are a mini bar, an in-room safe and slippers. Hotel Fira Congress Barcelona is within a 20-minute car trip of Barcelona El Prat Airport and La Rambla. Camp Nou, Placa de Catalunya and Palau de la Musica Catalana are only an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Barcelona Princess
address: Avinguda Diagonal 1, Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, Hotel Barcelona Princess offers trendy 4-star accommodation, as well as a swimming pool and a sauna. It also provides free wireless internet. Guests can enjoy the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can book tours and tickets. Hotel Barcelona Princess provides 363 air conditioned rooms. The private bathroom includes complimentary toiletries in addition to slippers and a hair dryer. Guests of Hotel Barcelona Princess are welcome to sample local cuisine at Restaurant N1, or try Mediterranean dishes at Restaurant Estrella. There is also a range of breakfast options available each day. Barcelona El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Selva de Mar Metro Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Expo Hotel Barcelona
address: Carrer De Mallorca,1-23, 08014 Barcelona
description: Hotel Expo Barcelona is located next to Barcelona Sants Station. Its rooftop pool and terrace offer fantastic city views and the modern rooms feature a private balcony and satellite TV. The hotel’s stylish Stop’n’Bite restaurant serves international à la carte food. There is also a terrace bar in the rooftop chillout area, which provides views over Barcelona. The Expo Hotel has 24-hour reception, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Bicycle hire is available to enjoy the city. Montjuïc Hill, where you can find the Joan Miró Museum and Barcelona’s Fira Congress Centre, is 10 minutes’ walk away. Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium is just one metro stop away.

name: Catalonia Port
address: C/ Ample, 1, 08002 Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast, available until 12:00 at the weekends, is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar. The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom. Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Miramar Barcelona
address: Placa Carles Ibanez 3, 08038 Barcelona
description: Miramar Barcelona has a picturesque setting within gardens on Montjuïc Mountain, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It offers 2 swimming pools, free Wi-Fi and rooms with spectacular views of Barcelona. Housed in a former palace with a Neucentisme style, the hotel maintains many of the building’s original features and it is one of the symbols of the city. The interiors have chic, contemporary design. Guests can make use of the on-site fitness centre, or relax by the seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The hotel's L´Occitane Spa features an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, steam room, pressure showers and treatment cabins. The hotel has 24-hour room service and a bar with a terrace. Studio Miramar restaurant serves a selection of Catalan and Mediterranean dishes. Each of the Miramar’s air-conditioned rooms has floor to ceiling windows, a 47-inch TV with international channels and a minibar with a courtesy bottle of water. Their private bathrooms come with L'Occitane toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and either a shower or a designer bath tub. The Joan Miró Foundation, the Old Port and the National Art Museum of Catalonia are within 20 minutes’ walk of the Miramar. And just 10 minutes walk from the Olympic Stadium and Palau Sant Jordi.

name: Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia
address: Plaza Cataluña, 10, 08002 Barcelona
description: Located right on Plaça Catalunya Square in Barcelona, Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia offers a terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. Private parking is available on site. Awarded as Hotel Monument by the Gremi d'Hotels of Barcelona Rooms are spacious and come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms offer city views. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and there is a restaurant and a bar on site. Barcelona's La Rambla is 300 metres from Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia, while Paseo de Gracia, with its trendy shops and restaurants, is just 50 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Claris Hotel & Spa Gl
address: Pau Claris, 150, 08009 Barcelona
description: Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection. Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door. The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork. The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce. The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Catalonia Diagonal Centro
address: Balmes 142-146, 08008 Barcelona
description: Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area. Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom.
