Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection. A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

name: Catalonia Gran Via Bcn
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes 550, 08011 Barcelona
description: Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi. Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station. You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner. You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

name: Hotel Paxton Barcelona
address: Carrer De Llull 160, 08005 Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona, 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel Paxton Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Hotel Paxton Barcelona include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Fairmont Barcelona Rey Juan Carlos I
address: Avd Diagonal 661-671, Barcelona
description: Set in 25,000 square meters of breathtaking 19th century gardens and revealing an unparalleled view of the stunning Barcelona skyline, this luxurious urban hotel provides guest with a tranquil retreat in the heart of Barcelona, Spain`s celebrated second city. With a central location on the prestigious Avenida Diagonal, Fairmont Rey Juan Carlos I is surrounded by major attractions such as the famous Camp Nou stadium, the Barcelona Polo Club and the financial district, in addition to vibrant restaurants, bars and shopping streets that have made Barcelona a world-class destination. With its 432 elegantly appointed guest rooms and suites, engaging service and glamorous ambience, Fairmont Rey Juan Carlos I will ensure the most memorable stay.Fairmont

name: H10 Urquinaona Plaza
address: Plaza Urquinaona, 2, 08010 Barcelona
description: Providing a rooftop terrace and a rooftop pool, H10 Urquinaona Plaza Hotel is a luxurious place to stay in Barcelona. It is conveniently located in the city centre. There are a range of amenities on offer to guests of the hotel, such as meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. For families H10 Urquinaona Plaza Hotel offers babysitting/child services. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. For guests' comfort, all rooms at H10 Urquinaona Plaza Hotel are both soundproofed and air conditioned. All offer a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. Guests staying at the hotel can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Located within walking distance of Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, H10 Urquinaona Plaza Hotel has friendly staff to provide useful tips on what to see in Barcelona. La Rambla and Placa de Catalunya are within walking a distance.Revato

name: Catalonia Plaza Catalunya
address: Bergara 11, 08002 Barcelona
description: Hotel Catalonia Plaza Cataluña offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. It is housed in a building 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. All hotel rooms have smart TVs equipped with Chromecast app. The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast with show cooking and it includes a wide variety of regional products and home-made cakes. Catalonia Plaza Cataluña Hotel has a sun terrace with loungers, a gym and a pool. Guests can also enjoy the on-site spa and cabin for spa treatments and massages. Hotel Catalonia Plaza is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Palau de la Música Catalana. A regular bus service to the airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, just 100 metres away.

name: Gallery Hotel
address: Rossello 249, 08008 Barcelona
description: Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival. This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe. The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café. Gallery Hotel is situated next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information centre. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 600 metres away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

name: Catalonia Magdalenes
address: Magdalenes, 13-15, 8002 Barcelona
description: Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel is set in Barcelona, 200 metres from the Cathedral of Barcelona and offers a terrace with an outdoor pool with views of the Cathedral and a spa. Portal de l'Angel is 200 metres away. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned, soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, There is also a spa with a hot tub and a gym. The hotel offers show-cooking during breakfast. Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel, while Picasso Museum is 600 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Me Barcelona
address: Casp 1-13, 08010 Barcelona
description: Set in Barcelona and with Somorrostro Beach reachable within 2.7 km, ME Barcelona offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation provides nightclub and room service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. ME Barcelona features some units with city views, and each room comes with a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available every morning at the property. At ME Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from ME Barcelona, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ohla Eixample
address: Carrer Còrsega, 289, 08008 Barcelona
description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool with city views, Ohla Eixample is a stylish boutique hotel located 10 minutes’ walk from two of Gaudi’s major works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout and a Clef d’Or Concierge service. Each well-designed room comes with a large bed and a private bathroom with bath or a rainfall shower. There is a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar with local delicatessen and a free safe for laptops. A turndown service is also available. The on-site Michelin-starred Xerta Restaurant serves traditional recipes from the Ebro Region; and a complete breakfast is also served every morning including a huge selection of local products. The hotel also has the Lobby Bar, a meeting point for both locals and hotel guests; and the Sky Bar, a creative cocktail bar. Guests can enjoy a selection of high-tech fitness equipment at the on-site gym; and beauty treatments and fashion services such as personal shopper are available on prior request. Ohla Eixample is conveniently located in the Eixample District, in the modernist area locally known as Quadrat d’Or - Golden Square; within 5 minutes’ walk of the emblematic Diagonal Avenue, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia shopping boulevards. This urban building has an eye-catching ceramic façade, made from over 1000 carved pieces that represent Vivaldi’s Four Seasons.

name: Hotel SB Icaria
address: Avenida Icaria 195, 08005 Barcelona
description: Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace. Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya
address: Gran Via de Las Corts Catalanes, 629, 08010 Barcelona
description: At the Hotel Indigo® Barcelona Plaza Catalunya, a Four-Star Superior hotel, design and decor takes inspiration from the neighborhood’s architectural masterpieces. Take, for instance, our Gaudí-inspired lobby and guest room murals, and the patterned fabrics and artwork that showcase our community’s history. Outside our doors, it’s a short walk to the Gaudí original Casa Batlló as well as the cafes and street performers of La Rambla, the Temple de la Sagrada Familia, and countless shops and boutiques. At Indigo Barcelona Cocktail & Snack Bar, you may enjoy a drink or a snack after a day of exploring, also, our poolside terrace is perfect places to soak up the atmosphere over a glass of local cava.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Grand Hotel Central
address: Via Laietana 30, 08003 Barcelona
description: Grand Central Hotel Barcelona is a design hotel offering fantastic views of the Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral from its rooftop infinity pool. It has stylish rooms and free high-speed WiFi. The elegantly refurbished hotel is housed in an early 20th-century building and it is a clear example of the Catalan Noucentisme. The air-conditioned rooms at the Grand Hotel Barcelona have a modern design. They are equipped with a 4K high-definition TV´s with Chromecast. Each one has a bathroom with a large, rain-effect shower and luxury toiletries. The Grand Central’s restaurant, Bistro Helena, serves innovative Catalan food. The trendy Sky Bar, on the rooftop, is the perfect place to enjoy a dinner, a cocktail or both overlooking the city lights of Barcelona. The hotel has a fitness centre and massage services are also offered. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, and you can also hire a car or a bicycle. City WiFi devices are also available, allowing internet access outside the hotel. The Born district, full of stylish shops and restaurants, is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Grand Central Hotel.

name: Acevi Villarroel
address: Calle Villarroel 106, 08011 Barcelona
description: Acevi Villarroel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi, a spa and a rooftop pool, open in summer. Located 400 metres from Urgell Metro Station, it is a 15-minute walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. Rooms at the Acevi have elegant décor and hardwood floors. All have a satellite TV. Hotel Acevi Villarroel’s spa is available for an extra charge. It includes a steam bath, sauna, Hammam and gym. Massages are available on request. You can also relax on a lounger on the sun terrace. Acevi Villarroel is within a 10-minute walk of Barcelona University and the lively Raval district. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

name: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa - Adults Only
address: Aribau 33, 08011 Barcelona
description: The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too. Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs. The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows. The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

name: Arai Aparthotel
address: Avinyó, 30, 08002 Barcelona
description: Set in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym with a sauna, and a rooftop terrace with city views. The Arai is set in an 18th-century building and features stunning frescos on the façades, which are part of the architectural Heritage, historical and artistic of Barcelona, which gives it the Speciality Monument status. Rooms feature a stylish, rustic décor with exposed stone walls and large windows. The air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They have a sofa and a small kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Aparthotel Arai features Restaurant Palosanto, a classic tavern offering tapas and Kokka, the first Peruvian bar in Barcelona. Las Ramblas Avenue and Liceu Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 950 metres away. Barcelona’s Port Vell is 10 minutes’ walk from Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior.

name: Kimpton Vividora Hotel
address: Carrer Del Duc 15, 08002 Barcelona
description: Welcome to the first Kimpton Hotels & Restaurants in Spain. Located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter Kimpton Vividora Hotel is a relaxing escape and vibrant hub for locals and travelers alike. The hotel sits right next to Las Ramblas and is within walking distance of the Barceloneta beach. An ideal location with other nearby attractions that include the city’s shopping epicenter and the Gothic Cathedral. Tucked away on a pedestrian street in Barcelona’s city center, our lifestyle design hotel is conveniently 20 minutes away from El Prat airport and 10 minutes from both the cruise port and Sants train station. Enjoy sightseeing plans to Sagrada Familia and La Boqueria but also experience authentic Barcelona by walking the streets of the city. The accommodations accentuate the Mediterranean and contemporary design combined with luxurious comforts, superlative service and standout amenities. Join us at our evening social hour, discover the city with our complimentary bikes and longboards and taste local gastronomy at our Fauna restaurant, Got Coffee & Cocktails or Terraza de Vivi. Don't leave your furry friend at home because we're a pet-friendly hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Ohla Barcelona
address: Via Laietana, 49, 08003 Barcelona
description: Featuring a rootop pool, this boutique hotel is located in Barcelona’s historic centre, close to Palau de la Música Concert Hall, the Cathedral and the Ramblas. Ohla Barcelona features rooms with contemporary décor and large windows. They all include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The modern bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms have views over the historic Gothic Quarter. Romain Fornell is currently the head chef for all the culinary spaces at hotel Ohla Barcelona: Caelis restaurant, Vistro49, and La Plassohla. This last restaurant is specialised in catalan cuisine, offers tapas and small dishes. Guests can also have a cocktail in the famous Ohla rooftop bar. The rooftop swimming pool offers fantastic city views with a chill out terrace. Other facilities at this hotel include a gym and a wellness area with a sauna. The Ohla Barcelona is 300 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square while Urquinaona Metro Station is only 200 metres away. Passeig de Gracia Avenue and Gaudi’s modernist buildings are 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

name: Hotel Concordia Barcelona
address: Avenida Paralelo 115, 08004 Barcelona
description: Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium. The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning. Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities. The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available. Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

name: Nobu Hotel Barcelona
address: Avenida de Roma 2-4, Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel rooms have air conditioning and a safety deposit box. Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from Nobu Hotel Barcelona, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Derby Barcelona
address: Loreto 21-25, 08029 Barcelona
description: Situated 300 metres from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access. The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a minibar. Drinks and light meals are served in the Derby’s coffee shop, The Times. L'Illa Shopping Centre offers a range of restaurants. Located just 10 metres away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 800 metres away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

name: Hotel Arts Barcelona
address: Marina 19-21, 08005 Barcelona
description: Hotel Arts Barcelona is a landmark with perfect credentials as a premier destination within a destination. An urban resort that stands as the tallest hotel on the coast, overlooking the beachfront offering panoramic city and beach views. The hotel effortlessly combines tranquility and genuine luxury with individual and personalized service provided by a well-connected and passionate team. Offering panoramic city and beach views, the guestrooms, suites and luxury, serviced penthouses are light-filled, luxuriously comfortable.Gastronomy is an inherent part of Hotel Arts Barcelona offering five gastronomic restaurants and a cocktail bar. The hotel has a unique collection of open and leisure spaces exceptional in Barcelona. The artfully designed Infinity Pool and family pool overlook the gardens, offering an oasis of calm by day and vibrant hot spot at night. 43 The Spa, located on the 43rd floor, floating high above the city, captures organic luxury and a sense of well-being.Marriott

name: Catalonia Barcelona Plaza
address: Plaza Espana 6-8, 08014 Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi. The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport. All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace. The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail. Do you already know the Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner. The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc. The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology. This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

name: ABaC Restaurant Hotel
address: Avinguda Del Tibidabo, 1, Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Park Güell, ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a garden. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam. La Pedrera is 3.3 km from the hotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
address: Carrer de Deu i Mata 69-99, 08029 Barcelona
description: Created by Pritzker prize-winning architect Rafael Moneo, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza exudes calm elegance. A 15-minute drive from the city center, it is situated in the Les Corts financial district of Barcelona. This is the perfect choice for business travelers, with the Axa Auditorium right next door. Landmarks, such as the FC Barcelona Camp Nou is also close by. NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has 308 rooms, including 7 Junior Suites and 1 Suite. Each has flat-screen TVs, a Nespresso machine and free Wi-Fi. Enjoy contemporary design with polished wood, glass and large windows, along with modern comforts, such as a rain-effect shower and a pillow menu. Breakfast will be the perfect start to your day with a large spread of options, including eggs prepared-to-order and gluten-free dishes. Lunch and dinner can be enjoyed at GoXO Restaurant and accompanied by a cocktail. Enjoy these on a beautiful terrace. For business travelers, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza is the perfect choice, with 11 rooms holding up to 800 guests. To unwind, head to the outdoor 7th floor pool or visit the fitness center and the spa.NH Hoteles

name: Sunotel Central
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes, 570, 08011 Barcelona
description: Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the centre of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities. Universitat Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast. The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

name: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero
address: Plaça de Llevant, 08019 Barcelona
description: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop. There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge. All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods. All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

name: Sallés Hotel Pere IV
address: C/Pallars,128, 08018 Barcelona
description: Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi and 24-hour reception. Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast. Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers. The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

name: Gran Hotel La Florida
address: Ctra. Vallvidrera al Tibidabo, 83-93, 08035 Barcelona
description: Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa. Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony. Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available. The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

name: Catalonia Rigoletto
address: C/ Sabino de Arana 22-24, 08028 Barcelona
description: The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box. A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work. Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona
address: Passeig De Gracia, 38-40, 08007 Barcelona
description: Set on Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gràcia, the luxurious Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona is within 5 minutes’ walk of Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. The hotel features a spa, rooftop pool, indoor pool, fitness centre, wonderful city views, and 24-hour room service. The spacious rooms feature bright, minimalist design. They include a home theatre, a seating area, large flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. Bathrooms have large bathtubs or showers, and include Acqua di Parma free toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers. Additionally, you can dine al fresco in the Mimosa garden, and discover Terrat, the rooftop terrace, where guests can enjoy cocktails and Peruvian food. Banker's bar is also serves cocktails and tapas. Mandarin Oriental spa offers a wide range of treatments. Spa access is free and includes the indoor pool, hot tub, Hammam and 24-hour gym. The spa also features suites for couples. Headphones, towels and chilled drinks are provided for the gym. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

name: H10 Itaca
address: Avenida Roma 22, 08015 Barcelona
description: H10 Itaca is within 10 minutes’ walk of Sants Train Station, the AVE High-Speed Railway, Plaza España and the FIRA Exhibition Centre. It features a stylish 700 m² terrace with a plunge pool. Each bright room at this modern hotel includes free Wi-Fi, a safe, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a desk. They all have a private bathroom including a hairdryer and Textures Collection amenities. Barcelona city centre, including Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro, and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is just 2 stops away. Sants Station runs local and national rail services, including the airport train and the AVE link to central Madrid. Hotel H10 Itaca offers a free welcome glass of cava for all guests. The hotel features a smart restaurant serving signature cuisine and you can enjoy a drink in the chic lobby. The relaxing terrace features sofas and comfortable chairs set under parasols, ideal for enjoying a cocktail. The Itaca also features a fitness room and a sauna. There is a business corner open 24 hours a day. Free national and international newspapers are provided.

name: Vincci Mae
address: Avinguda Diagonal 596, 08021 Barcelona
description: Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain. Vincci Mae boasts an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property. An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday. Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and minibar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries,and a hairdryer. Casa Batlló is 1.6 km from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

name: Vincci Gala
address: Ronda Sant Pere, 32, 08010 Barcelona
description: Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available. The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design. The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar. A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information. Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square. There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

name: Catalonia Barcelona 505
address: C/ Muntaner 505, 08022 Barcelona
description: Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes. The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo. Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available. You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

name: Sercotel Amister Art Hotel
address: Avinguda Roma 93-95, 08029 Barcelona
description: Sercotel Amister Art Hotel is a modern base when in Barcelona and is close to everything the area has to offer. Some of the popular facilities at this elegant 4-star hotel include a rooftop terrace and free Wi-Fi. Sercotel Amister Art Hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Couples on a romantic getaway will delight in the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, an in-room safe and a desk. They are all soundproofed and include heating. Sercotel Amister Art Hotel's on-site restaurant offers Spanish-inspired dishes, which can enjoyed on the outdoor terrace. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Buffet breakfast is served daily. Sercotel Amister Art Hotel is also located near the area's popular restaurants and bars, plus EAE Business School is a 10-minute walk away. It is within a 20-minute walk of Sants Estacio Railway Station and Barcelona Sants Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Catalonia Park Putxet Hotel
address: Putget 68-74, 08023 Barcelona
description: Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout. The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer. You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available. The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

name: Wittmore Hotel - Adults Only
address: Carrer Riudarenes 7, 08002 Barcelona
description: Offering wiews to the vertical garden and the patio, The Wittmore - Adults Only is located in Barcelona in the heart of the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, 400 metres from Picasso Museum. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each comfortable and quiet room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. The rooms come with a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes, slippers, and luxury toiletries. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Also a bar, and a restaurant with a variety of regional dishes and a wide selection of local and international wines and cocktails. There is a rooftop terrace that features a plunge pool, solarium, and terrace bar. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Plaza Reial is 400 metres from The Wittmore - Adults Only, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Olivia Balmes Hotel
address: Carrer De Balmes, 117, 08008 Barcelona
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Olivia Balmes Hotel is set 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, in the elegant Eixample neighbourhood. The modern hotel features stylish air-conditioned rooms and a restaurant. Each bright spacious room includes free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen satellite TV and a laptop safe. The contemporary bathrooms have an open-plan design. The hotel’s restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Olivia Balmes offers a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool and sun loungers. There is also a bar, serving cocktails and snacks, as well as several meeting rooms. Olivia Balmes Hotel has private parking and Barcelona Airport is around 20 minutes’ drive away. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and you can reach Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within a 5-minute walk.

name: Hotel Colón Barcelona
address: Avenida Catedral, 7, Barcelona
description: Located right opposite Barcelona Cathedral, this grand, neoclassic hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It offers free WiFi, and some rooms have excellent views of the cathedral façade. The stylish air-conditioned rooms at the Colón Hotel Barcelona have satellite TV and a minibar. There is a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Superior rooms also have a Nespresso coffee machine. The hotel boasts an outdoor terrace café in the square, facing the cathedral. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Catalan cuisine and international dishes, and room service is available. Guests can also enjoy the roof-top terrace with views of the cathedral There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Casa Camper Barcelona
address: Calle Elisabets, 11, 08001 Barcelona
description: The stylish Casa Camper Barcelona boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, between Las Ramblas and MACBA art gallery. Each room has a separate lounge, and there is a free 24-hour buffet. Casa Camper Barcelona's designer bedrooms overlook either a peaceful vertical garden or city views. The lounges have a flat-screen TV, a sofa and a desk. All rooms have free WiFi. The 24-hour snack area includes free water, soft drinks and coffee, as well as sandwiches, salads, soup, sliced fresh fruit and desserts. Casa Camper Barcelona’s well-known restaurant, Dos Palillos, offers Asian tapas. Casa Camper Hotel Barcelona is located just a 5-minute walk from the famous Boqueria market, the Liceu opera house and the city's famous Gothic Quarter. Plaza Catalunya and the main shopping streets are just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection
address: Rossello 265, 08008 Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona’s modernist district on Passeig de Gràcia, Sir Victor's rooms and suites are inspired by the Catalonian lifestyle of sun, sea, and style. A state-of-the-art spa, two restaurants, a speakeasy-style bar, two meeting rooms, a library, and a sensational rooftop pool and terrace bar overlooking major historic buildings round out offerings that attract locals and travelers alike. The rooms are designed with an emphasis on comfort and nature, while the artwork features local standouts, such as Antoni Muntadas and Alfons Borrell.Marriott

name: W Barcelona
address: Plaça Rosa Dels Vents, 1, 08039 Barcelona
description: Step inside. See for yourself. Designed by world-renowned architect Ricardo Bofill, W Barcelona sets the scene for a spectacular stay. W Barcelona is a luxury hotel offering a combination of luxury and comfort in each of its 473 fabulous guestrooms and suites. This 5-star hotel is located on the beachfront along the famous Barceloneta Boardwalk. Each guest room and suite provide panoramic views over the Mediterranean Sea and the city of Barcelona.Marriott

name: Ikonik Angli
address: Carrer d'Anglí, 60, 08017 Barcelona
description: Situated in the charming residential district of Sarrià, this elegant design hotel offers an outdoor pool and garden area, overlooking Tibidabo Mountain. Free Wi-Fi is available. The Ikonik Anglí’s spacious rooms have a minimalist design and large windows, which provide plenty of natural light. Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV and a modern bathroom with a range of amenities. Guests can enjoy a daily breakfast in the Angli’s stylish breakfast room. The Sarrià district is known for its wonderful cake shops, and there are also many popular bars within a 5-minute walk. The hotel also offers meeting rooms for events. Sarrià FGC Train Station is 600 metres from the Ikonik Anglí, and offers direct services to Barcelona city centre. Plaza Catalunya Square is just a 10-minute train ride away. The nearest airport is Barcelona Airport, 15 minutes drive away from the hotel.

name: Hotel Pinar Plaza
address: 67 Calle de Caleruega, 28033 Madrid
description: Located in Madrid, 2.3 km from Chamartin Railway Station, Hotel Pinar Plaza provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also offer city views. At Hotel Pinar Plaza each room includes bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or gluten-free breakfast. At Hotel Pinar Plaza you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Santiago Bernabéu Stadium is 5.1 km from the hotel, while IFEMA is 6.1 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 9 km from Hotel Pinar Plaza.

name: BLESS Hotel Madrid
address: 62 Velazquez St, 28001 Madrid
description: Located in the Salamanca district, the most emblematic and exclusive neighborhood in the center of the city, BLESS Hotel Madrid stands out for its unique style and timeless design the work of top interior designer Lázaro Rosa Violán, capturing the essence of the capital. The hotel is only steps away from the best attractions, museums, designer shops, and nightlife. Absolute comfort is carefully thought out and reflected in every detail, beginning even before guests arrive. The hotel is distinguished by its sensory architecture, and equipped with the most advanced technology a BLESS Hotel is also dynamic and surprising, promising fabulous experiences and personalized services. Featuring a top terrace pool,3 bars, 2 restaurants a bowling alley and a spa, this property also provides guests with a gym and meeting areas.A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Retiro Park is 1.4 km from Bless Hotel Madrid, while Museo del Prado is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 11 km from the hotel. Velazquez and Serrano Metro Stations are both within 500 metres.

name: Melia Castilla
address: Calle Del Poeta Joan Maragall, 43, Madrid
description: The Meliá Castilla offers comfortable accommodation just metres from the Paseo de la Castellana. The hotel features classic décor and has a seasonal outdoor pool, a fitness, and a Caroli Wellness Centre. The L'Albufera restaurant serves a range of delicious rices and paellas. A buffet breakfast with a large variety of fresh products is offered. Other bars and restaurants are also available on site and in the surroundings. Rooms are spacious and offer a pillow menu and free WiFi. They come with a private bathroom and air conditioning. A wide range of family rooms are available, perfect for a family gateway in Madrid. Some areas of the hotel are dedicated to The Level exclusive rooms and services, featuring private check-in and check-out space, private buffet breakfast, open bar and snacks, daily cocktail in a private area, as well as concierge service and organization of activities around the city. Swimming pool is open only during summer season (please, check opening times and days with the hotel). Cuzco Metro Station is 200 metres away from the hotel. The nearby motorways offer easy access to IFEMA, the Palacio Municipal de Congresos, and Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport. Real Madrid’s Santiago Bernabeu Stadium is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Nuevo Boston
address: Avenida De Aragon 332, 28022 Madrid
description: Hotel Nuevo Boston is a design hotel, 10-minute drive from IFEMA Exhibition Centre and 5-minute drive from Civitas Metropolitano Stadium. It offers free WiFi and a free airport shuttle service to Madrid’s Barajas Airport, 5-minute drive away. Rooms at the Nuevo Boston hotel are air-conditioned. They include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and the marble bathroom comes with a hairdryer. There is also a safety deposit box and a desk. Hotel Nuevo Boston has a restaurant, serving modern Mediterranean food, and a café-bar. The dining area features a glass roof and palm trees. The hotel operates a shuttle service to IFEMA during trade fairs. Nuevo Boston is adapted for guests with reduced mobility. The hotel has a pool and sun terrace available in the summer.

name: Aloft Madrid Gran Via
address: Calle Jacometrezo 4, 28013 Madrid
description: Steps away from the centric Plaza del Callao, Aloft Madrid Gran Vía is located in the buzzing area of the city’s Gran Vía. An area that embraces the upbeat vibe of Madrid, it has the added bonus that it’s not defined by overzealous traffic demands. The 132 urban-inspired guestrooms come with mighty nine-foot ceilings, plush platform beds and trademark Aloft extras like the 49” Chromecast TV, walk-in rainfall shower and DRY BAR® amenities. Re:Fuel by AloftSM is an astute dining concept where fresh, fast and flavorsome dishes are available on a serve-self, buffet basis 24/7. Re:ChargeSM fitness center is open around the clock for guests who need to pump it up or stretch it out.Marriott

name: Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid
address: Calle Imperial, 8, 28002 Madrid
description: Less than 1 km from Mercado San Miguel and a 13-minute walk from Puerta de Toledo, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, spa and free WiFi is available. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. The units at Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid have air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the property. Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid is located in Plaza Mayor, while Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum is 1.1 km from the property. Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 13.8 km away.

name: Hotel Villa Real, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
address: Plaza de Las Cortes 10, 28014 Madrid
description: Set in the cultural heart of Madrid, this luxury hotel has a fine art collection and each elegant room has an LCD TV. Hotel Villa Real is located in the Triangle of Art. The Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum is just 150 metres away. The Puerta del Sol, Plaza Cibeles and the Retiro Park are also nearby. Hotel Villa Real is considered a classic among Madrid’s luxury hotels, decorated with wood and marble. The art collection includes Roman mosaics and Greek ceramics, some from the 3rd Century BC. Rooms at the hotel are soundproofed, and have a laptop safe and a minibar. Some rooms have a sofa or a balcony. The hotel’s East 47 restaurant serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails. The Property is also Dog Friendly.

name: Sercotel Madrid Aeropuerto
address: Calle Del Galeon, 25, 28042 Madrid
description: Providing a shuttle to Madrid-Barajas Airport, as well as complimentary Wi-Fi, the hotel is a convenient base in Madrid. Guests have access to a day spa, a gym and a swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and luggage storage. Corporate amenities include a business centre. For guests' comfort, all rooms at Sercotel Madrid Aeropuerto are both soundproofed and air conditioned. All provide a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Sercotel Madrid Aeropuerto is close to shops, dining and Madrid's nightlife. Museo del Prado is just an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Urban, a member of Design Hotels
address: Carrera San Jeronimo 34, 28014 Madrid
description: This boutique hotel houses a permanent display of art from Papua New Guinea. Hotel Urban has a small rooftop swimming pool and a terrace open in summer, and a cocktail bar. The hotel has beautiful design, and facilities include a gym. The hotel features a gastronomic restaurant: CEBO, with Michelin-starred duet Javier Sanz and Juan Sahuquillo (Oba-) as main chefs. There is also a cocktail-bar on the roof-top terrace "La terraza del Urban", and Cocktail Bar Glass by Sips with barista made cocktails. The décor of the hotel and the rooms includes special lighting, natural wood and stone and Oriental art. All rooms are soundproofed and offer free wired internet, a flat-screen TV and a ChromeCast. The Thyssen-Bornemisza Gallery is 200 metres away. Puerta del Sol, Madrid’s main square, is just 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Princesa Plaza Madrid
address: Princesa 40, 28008 Madrid
description: Princesa Plaza is situated in the west of Madrid, in the Argüelles District. Some of the elegant rooms at the hotel feature a large reproduction of a famous painting from the Museo del Prado. The hotel comes with the Holiday Gym fitness centre, featuring a small indoor pool where aquagym classes are organised. The pool is available for guests over 16. Complimentary fitness classes are offerred, as well as cardiovascular equipment. Rooms at the Princesa are spacious with large windows and come with a seating area. They have satellite TV and air conditioning. Princesa Plaza is close to Plaza España Square, Gran Via Avenue and the Royal Palace. It offers car rental and currency exchange services. The tour desk can provide useful information on the surrounding area. The hotel also gives information about a company that organizes shuttle service at an extra cost.

name: CoolRooms Palacio de Atocha
address: Calle de Atocha 34, 28012 Madrid
description: Situated in Madrid, 800 metres from Puerta del Sol, CoolRooms Palacio de Atocha features accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a garden. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel rooms come with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests at CoolRooms Palacio de Atocha can enjoy an à la carte breakfast prepared upon request. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Mercado San Miguel, Prado Museum and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from CoolRooms Palacio de Atocha.

name: Barceló Torre De Madrid
address: Plaza de España, 18, 28008 Madrid
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The new hotel Barcelo Torre de Madrid designed by Jaime Hayon is the ideal place to discover Madrid in the most comfortable way because of its excellent location in the Plaza de Espana just steps from the Gran Via with all its offer Theatres accommodation tapas bar shopping centers or live the nightlife combined with the best design taste and service exclusive.A 10-minute walk to Palacio Real and 15 minutes to Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor. Plaza de Espana metro station is located just opposite to the hotel and you can easily connect with other areas of the city in just a few minutes. Airport Madrid-Barajas Adolfo Suarez is 21 km of distance.All rooms follow the quality standard Barcelo have free Wi-Fi access King size bed or 2 beds of 1.05 cm rain shower TV 42 individual air conditioning minibar free safe and sophisticated decoration.We also offer 24 hour room service valet Guest Experience Manager Meeting rooms A la Carte Restaurant Buffet Restaurant Lobby Bar and our gym and Spa located on the 8th floor with sublime views of the city.Barcelo.com

name: Emperador
address: Gran Via 53, 28013 Madrid
description: Located in the heart of Madrid, Emperador is set next to Madrid’s Gran Vía. This elegant hotel offers a seasonal rooftop swimming pool and terrace with fantastic city views. The elegant and stylish rooms offer accommodation with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with marble floors. Emperador is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Royal Palace and Puerta del Sol, Madrid’s main square. Santo Domingo, Plaza de España and Callao Metro Stations are within a 3-minute walk, connecting you with the famous Art Triangle in just 15 minutes. Open from May to September, the Emperador offers a seasonal swimming pool and solarium with sun loungers. The cocktail-bar located at the terrace boasts with views of the Royal Palace, Almudena Cathedral and Gran Vía Avenue. The hotel has a lobby bar with a permanent art-gallery offering temporary exhibitions. There is a variety of restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the Emperador. Other useful facilities at the hotel include a hairdressing salon and a 24-hour reception.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Madrid Prado
address: Calle De Moratin, 52, 28014 Madrid
description: This boutique hotel is in the heart of the Art Triangle, opposite the Prado Museum and 500 metres from Atocha high-speed Train Station. There is free Wi-Fi. All rooms at this design hotel have a flat-screen TV and Nespresso coffee machine. They are designed by famous interior decorators Sandra Tarruella and Isabel López. Rooms at the Radisson Blu Madrid Prado are fully air conditioned and soundproofed. The en suite bathrooms all include slippers and a bathrobe. The restaurant is a typical Spanish food & Tapas restaurant, it is located on a little public square at the entrance of the hotel not in a patio. The hotel has a superb location just minutes from the Thyssen and Reina Sofia galleries. It is by the Caixa Forum cultural centre.

name: NH Collection Madrid Colón
address: Calle Marqués de Zurgena, 4, 28001 Madrid
description: NH Collection Madrid Colón, formerly known as NH Madrid Sanvy, is situated in Salamanca, one of Madrid’s exclusive neighborhoods. Nearby, you can shop at luxury brands: Gucci, Rolex, Loewe and Armani. If you wish to taste Spain’s gastronomy, head to the Platea gourmet food hall, managed by the city’s Michelin-starred chefs. Madrid’s museums and Retiro Park are close by and Recoletos station is reachable on foot providing links to the rest of the city. NH Collection Madrid Colón has quiet and spacious rooms equipped with free Wi-Fi. Some have a beautiful view of Plaza Colón and every room has a pillow menu. Our Guest Relations team can organize tickets and reservations during your stay. If you prefer to relax at the hotel, sunbathe on the 4th floor terrace, take a dip in the open-air pool and unwind with a drink at the poolside bar. NH Collection Madrid Colón offers an excellent daily breakfast. For lunch and dinner choose between our restaurant or bar – the Bar Colón or Sushi Bar 99 which offers fine Japanese cuisine. Accompany your meal with the perfect wine from our cellar or opt for a delightful cocktail. There are a gym and meeting rooms on-site.NH Hoteles

name: Ilunion Atrium
address: Emilio Vargas, 3 y 5, 28043 Madrid
description: Ilunion Atrium is 10 minutes’ drive from Barajas Airport and the IFEMA Convention Centre. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, gym and free WiFi zone. Air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and minibar. Located within the Arturo Soria District, the modern and stylish Atrium Hotel is built around an impressive glass atrium. Madrid city centre is 15 minutes away by bus, and there is a stop 50 metres from the hotel. This cosy rooms have a safe and a work desk. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Some rooms come with a terrace, bathrobe and slippers. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. Seasonal cuisine is offered in the hotel’s modern restaurant, which has a summer terrace. There is a café-bar and room service is available. You can hire a car from the 24-hour reception and tour desk. On-site parking can be reserved for an extra charge. The hotel is beside the M30 Motorway, has easy access to the Paseo de la Castellana Avenue.

name: Vp Plaza España Design
address: Plaza de España, 5, 28008 Madrid
description: Located in Gran Via, in Madrid city centre, VP Plaza España Design offers 5-star accommodation with parking, a wellness centre. All rooms in this stylish hotel offer an exclusive décor and are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, free WiFi, and a desk with a coffee machine, and a private bathroom with shower and bath tub, including free high-end toiletries and bathrobe. Some rooms include a terrace. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast, or have a meal at Botania, the Mediterranean restaurant located on-site. Guests can also relax after work at the Ginkgo Sky Bar, enjoying the stunning view of Madrid City. VP Plaza España Design offers 1400 square metres of meeting and conference-rooms, as well as green areas and parking. Shops, bars, and public transport can be found within 2-minute walking distance. Metro station Plaza de España is 1-minute walk away, while the Royal Palace or the Almudena Cathedral are 700 metres away from the property. Train Station Principe Pío is 700 metres from the VP Plaza España, while Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 14 km away. Biloba Spa of the hotel: SPA access is reserved for adults and children 13 years old and above. Children must be accompanied by and adult. The cost per entry is 10 EUR, with exceptions for Junior Suite and Presidential Suite guests. Seasonal Pool is temporarily closed.

name: Hotel Montera Madrid, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Calle Montera 47, Madrid
description: No description found

name: Nyx Hotel Madrid By Leonardo Hotels
address: Aviador Zorita 34, 28020 Madrid
description: Situated a 10-minute walk from Real Madrid’s Bernabeu Stadium, NYX Hotel Madrid by Leonardo Hotels offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Trains to Madrid Airport stop 500 metres away at Nuevos Ministerios Station. The hotel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi throughout, and 100% cover for 3G mobile phones. Each room at the NYX Hotel Madrid by Leonardo Hotels has a stylish décor and a work desk. All rooms include a safe, minibar and trouser press, while bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The hotel has a bar, and serves a daily buffet breakfast. You can also find various restaurants in the Moda and Orense Shopping Centres, both 10 minutes’ walk away. NYX Hotel Madrid by Leonardo Hotels is only 450 metres from Alvarado Metro Station, which offers direct connections to the historic centre of Madrid. Madrid Complutense University and San Pablo University are within 2.5 km.

name: Catalonia Goya
address: Goya 49, 28001 Madrid
description: Catalonia Goya is set in a 19th-century building, next to Velázquez Metro Station, in Madrid’s exclusive shopping district. It offers free Wi-Fi, and is 5 minutes’ walk from Retiro Park. The soundproofed rooms have air conditioning and feature wooden floors and elegant dark furniture. All rooms feature double-glazed Climalit windows. Each has flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, and there is a minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel features a café-bar, which is open until 23:00. There is a 24-hour front desk and room service until 23:00h. Guests can enjoy a small fitness center and the new plunge pool in the patio next to the bar. It is open during summer months. We can arrange airport shuttle service with companies external to Catalonia Hotels (external service), available for a supplement. Public parking can be found near the hotel, at an extra cost. The Wizink Center is 5 minutes' walk from the property.

name: Hotel Maydrit Airport
address: Piragua 1, 28042 Madrid
description: Set 200 metres from Madrid’s El Capricho Metro Station, Hotel Maydrit Airport offers a free transfer service to Barajas Airport. Air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and minibar. The Maydrit’s à la carte restaurant serves creative international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy snacks and tapas in the café-bar. The Hotel Maydrit Airport is 500 metres from Madrid’s Juan Carlos I Park. Madrid city centre is less than 30 minutes away by Metro, and there is good access to the A2 and M40 Motorways.

name: H10 Puerta de Alcalá
address: Alcala, 66, 28009 Madrid
description: Situated amongst well-known tourist attractions, shops and eateries, H10 Puerta de Alcala is ideal for guests wishing to discover Madrid and its surroundings. It also offers a coffee bar, 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. For trendy travellers a cocktail bar provides a happy setting for an after-meal drink. H10 Puerta de Alcala features 138 air conditioned rooms. A mini bar, an in-room safe and a private bathroom are also provided. H10 Puerta de Alcala houses La Galeria, which serves breakfast and presents guests with everything they need for an enjoyable night within the hotel. Lunch, afternoon tea and dinner are served daily at Lobby Bar El Mirador. Madrid's attractions, such as the National Archaeological Museum of Spain, the Monument to Alfonso XII and the Puerta de Alcala, are easily accessible on foot from H10 Puerta de Alcala. Principe de Vergara Metro Station is only a two-minute stroll, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Thompson Madrid
address: Plaza del Carmen, 28013 Madrid
description: With a stay at Thompson Madrid, you'll be centrally located in Madrid, within a 5-minute walk of Puerta del Sol and Gran Via Street. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).Hotels.com

name: Hotel Indigo Madrid - Gran Via
address: Calle Silva 6, 28013 Madrid
description: Hotel Indigo® Madrid Gran Via, on the quiet, pretty Calle de Silva, is just steps from the Gran Via, in the heart of the city, cosmopolitan life in Madrid. Our boutique hotel’s design and decor is influenced by the neighborhood’s leading role in Spanish innovation in film and screen as well as architecture and fashion. Each of our stylish guest rooms provides a spa-inspired bathroom experience with a rainfall shower, quality toiletries and complimentary Wi-Fi. With one of the best Sky-gardens of Madrid. Where you can enjoy the hotel's infinity swimming pool and amazing views of the city and the most stunning sunset. Royal palace and the Plaza Mayor are only a stone throw away.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only
address: Atocha 49, 28012 Madrid
description: Set in Madrid city centre, Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only offers accommodation only 15 minutes’ walk away from Chueca, known by its LGBT atmosphere and welcoming entertainment offer, the hotel is hetero-friendly too. Every stylish room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a TV. The rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries, bathrobes and a hairdryer. Axel Hotel Madrid offers a restaurant where you can enjoy a modern approach to the local food. There is a roof-top terrace with its sky bar and a pool with stunning city view. A Cocktail bar can be found at this property as well. Plaza Mayor is 600 metres from Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only, while Atocha train station is 15 minutes’ walk away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only.

name: Ibis Styles Madrid City Las Ventas
address: Albacete 1, 28027 Madrid
description: Our Ibis Styles is located next to the main artery of Madrid; the design of the hotel is modern with a relaxed atmosphere. The rooms are designed for your absolute comfort. It has 96 rooms, fully renovated, free Wi-Fi, 24h reception, summer pool, restaurant, bar and parking. An innovative hotel with easy access to airport, Ifema, conference center and the best museums in Madrid.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Madrid Center
address: O'Donnell 53, 28009 Madrid
description: Novotel Madrid Center is in Madrid's Salamanca district, close to Metro stops and 219 yards from the bus line to Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas Airport. Just 8 minutes' walk from Retiro Park, this elegant hotel has free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are modern and the conference rooms offer state-of-the-art technology and different adaption and capacity options designed for all kinds of events.accorhotels.com

name: Canopy by Hilton Madrid Castellana
address: Plaza Carlos Trias Beltran 4, 28020 Madrid
description: We’re in the heart of Azca financial district surrounded by restaurants and shops and just a five-minute walk from Real Madrid Santiago Bernabeu Stadium and Paseo de la Castellana. Experience urban gastronomy at Canopy Central or the vibrant Food Truck on our outdoor terrace. A rooftop pool, fully equipped gym and evening tastings complete your stay.Hilton

name: Ocean Drive Madrid
address: Isabel Ii, 7, 28013 Madrid
description: Situated in Madrid, 700 metres from Gran Via, Ocean Drive Madrid features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Gran Via Metro Station. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ocean Drive Madrid rooms include bed linen and towels. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Ocean Drive Madrid include Plaza de España Metro Station, Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum and Temple of Debod. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Exe Madrid Norte
address: Calle Martina Diaz, 4, 28050 Madrid
description: Located 15 minutes’ drive from Madrid and with easy access to the M30 and M40 motorways, Exe Madrid Norte offers free Wi-Fi. Set in gardens, it features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Queen-size beds are on offer in each of the stylish rooms at the Exe Madrid Norte. All rooms have tea and coffee-making facilities and a 26” LCD TV. The property's Gourmet Bar serves local and international, simple and authentic cuisine in a relaxed atmosphere. A variety of cocktails are also served. The IFEMA Exhibition Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel and Madrid Barajas Airport is less than 5 km away. The number 173, 174 and 176 buses stop close to the Exe Madrid Norte.

name: Hilton Madrid Airport
address: Avenida Hispanidad 2-4, 28042 Madrid
description: The Hilton Madrid Airport hotel is just minutes from Madrid Barajas International Airport, the IFEMA exhibition center and the vibrant city center. Take advantage of the complimentary shuttle bus service to and from all airport terminals, running daily from 05:30am to 01:00am. This Madrid Airport hotel offers modern hotel accommodation and facilities. Swim in the hydrotherapeutic pool or savor fine dining at Reserva Grill specializing in grilled meats and fish or dine on tapas at Ferrum Bar. Marvel at masterpieces in the Prado museum or soak up in the atmosphere of Madrid's colorful cafes. We´re located in an iconic building designed to be a great hotel, inspired in the four elements of nature coming to life through the hand carved walls, water features, and the wonderful natural light that embraces every space and meeting room in the hotel. Plan your function or event in one of 13 meeting rooms, a stylish boardroom or the elegant Ballroom with space for up to 450 delegates.Hilton

name: The Madrid Edition
address: Plaza de Celenque 2, 28013 Madrid
description: The hotel showcases 200 beautifully appointed guest rooms and suites, some with terraces and five unique food and beverage outlets including a signature restaurant, cocktail bar, Pool Bar and rooftop terrace, together with an outdoor pool, state-of-the-art gym and spa. Flexible studios with over 350 sqm of dedicated space host creative meetings and events for large or small groups. Set in a tranquil square surrounded by historic buildings, The Madrid EDITION is near Puerta del Sol in the heart of the Spanish capital, one of the city’s most famous sites, and within walking distance to The Golden Triangle of Art – three of most important art museums in Madrid. The hotel manifests the people and the culture of the city and is synonymous to a stunning microcosm of one-of-a-kind food, beverage and entertainment offerings, innovative design, and luxury service. The Madrid EDITION is the second EDITION Hotel in Spain, following the successful opening of The Barcelona EDITION in 2018.Marriott

name: The Level At Melia Castilla
address: Calle Del Poeta Joan Maragall, 43, 28020 Madrid
description: Set in a prime location of Madrid, The Level at Melia Castilla puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Facilities like 24-hour check-in are readily available for you to enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make The Level at Melia Castilla the perfect choice for your stay in Madrid.Agoda

name: Melia Madrid Princesa
address: Princesa 27, Madrid
description: With views of the Royal Palace, Meliá Princesa is a hotel located in Madrid, 8 minutes’ walk from Plaza España and Gran Via. It offers a gym. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Free access to heated indoor pool for guests. The elegant rooms at the Meliá Madrid Princesa include a safe and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The upper floors of the hotel are dedicated to The Level exclusive rooms, with panoramic views over the city or the mountains as well as specific superior services and facilities such as a wellness area. Guests can enjoy elegant and spacious rooms with pillow menu, private check-in and check-out space, Nespresso space with biodegradable coffee capsules, concierge service, a private area with drinks and snacks, private show cooking, and press in the lounge, among others. Mosaico à la carte restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine using traditional cooking recipes and seasonal products. Guests can also enjoy a hearty buffet breakfast. Complimentary coffee is offered in the early morning from 05:00 to 07:00. There is also a bar integrated in the reception and a 24-hour room service. Oeste Park and the beautiful Debod Temple are 7 minutes’ walk from the Meliá Princesa. Ventura Rodríguez Metro Station, located next to the hotel, provides links to the centre of town in around 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Santo Domingo
address: San Bernardo 1, 28013 Madrid
description: Unique hotel in the heart of Madrid, located in San Bernardo Street, between Gran Va and Callao square. Excellent location, with 200 rooms. Amongst the charms of the Hotel, we highlight the Themed Rooms, the distinctive Lobby, crowned by our porcelain and gold leaf vault, or the Parking, decorated with evocative scenes. We also count with more than 1200m of meeting rooms with natural light, and an outdoor swimming-pool on the roof-terrace, from where the guests can enjoy Madrids best views.iHotelier/iStay

name: Umusic Hotel Madrid
address: Calle de la Paz 11, 28012 Madrid
description: Check in Time: 15:00 Check out Time: 12:00 UMusic Hotel Madrid is UMusic Hotels' first property in Europe, located in the heart of the Spanish capital, on Calle de La Paz, in the central neighborhood of Sol, with additional access from Calle Carretas, just steps away from the city's main cultural, historical, and culinary attractions, and 30 minutes from the Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas airport. The 5-star hotel features 130 guestrooms and suites and is located within a complex alongside the historic Albéniz Theater, perfectly situated to provide unique and immersive musical and entertainment experiences, as well as a lounge to host concerts, shows, and orporate events. This hotel manifests the city's beautiful culture and people, captured in its tunning design, combining historic architecture with modern touches, along with one-of-a-kind restaurants and bars. Built in the 1940s and with a façade of colonial architecture,the hotel is located in the Albéniz Theater, a historical building with a heritage of immense architectural and cultural value. Its exceptional location in the center of the capital and its historic character, make this new hotel a unique platform in the international entertainment and hospitality scene.The new UMusic Hotel Madrid is located in the heart of the Spanish capital, at La Paz street, 11, 28012, in the central neighborhood of Sol, with additional access from Carretas street and within walking distance of the city's main cultural, historical and gastronomic attractions. It is 30 minutes from the Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas airport, located 18 km from the city center. Built in the 1940s with a facade of colonial architecture, the hotel is located in the former Albéniz Theater, a historic building with a heritage of enormous architectural and cultural value. Its exceptional location in the center of the capital and its historic character make this new hotel a unique platform in the international hospitality and entertainment scene.Ticket Package

name: NH Madrid Ribera del Manzanares
address: Paseo De La Virgen Del Puerto, 57, 28005 Madrid
description: The NH Madrid Ribera del Manzanares hotel is set in a peaceful area of Madrid and overlooks the green and luscious Manzanares River gardens. You will find the Royal Palace and the Almudena Cathedral nearby. For business travelers, the Casa de Campo fairgrounds are also close to the hotel, and the M30 highway provides easy access by car. There are 224 rooms at NH Madrid Ribera del Manzanares, each with a flat screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Your sleep won’t be disturbed thanks to the soundproof windows and comfy mattresses, while the warm neutral colors and hardwood floors will help you relax. Some of the rooms offer lovely views of the river and the Royal Palace. Enjoy our daily fresh breakfast, with cold cuts, cheeses, eggs cooked-to-order, and fresh pastries. Mediterranean and Spanish dishes are available at the La Ribera restaurant and can be enjoyed on our sunny terrace, along with drinks and snacks. There is also a bar at the hotel. Get the most out of your relaxing stay by heading to the gym, outdorr pool in the summer months,  or making use of our massage services. For transportation, we have parking, e-bikes for rent and electric car chargers.NH Hoteles

name: Mandarin Oriental Ritz, Madrid
address: Plaza de la Lealtad 5, 28014 Madrid
description: No description found

name: Hotel Exe Moncloa
address: Arcipreste De Hita 10, 28015 Madrid
description: Situated next to Intercambiador de Moncloa Station, Hotel Exe Moncloa offers a small outdoor pool, a gym with sauna and a roof terrace with panoramic views. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Each stylish room at the Exe Moncloa features bright, modern décor and smart wooden floors. All rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Hotel Exe Moncloa is located just off the A-6 Motorway, a 5-minute drive from Casa de Campo Park and the central Plaza España Square. Madrid Barajas Airport is around a 20-minute drive away.

name: Melia Madrid Serrano
address: Calle De Claudio Coello, 139, Madrid
description: Set in a privileged location in Madrid’s Salamanca district, set next to the well known Calle Serrano Street and 2 km from the Bernabeu Stadium. Its comfortable, air-conditioned rooms at the Melia Madrid Serrano feature modern décor and include flat-screen satellite TV, pillow menu and WiFi, along with en-suite bathroom and premium toiletries. The hotel also dedicates some of its areas to The Level exclusive rooms and services, where The Level guests have private access to The Level Lounge with a private terrace on the 7th floor. Guests can enjoy premium drinks, snacks and tapas in an elegant and relaxed atmosphere. There is also a private lounge and a working area with internet access. Other services for The Level guests include private check-in and check-out service, private buffet breakfast, pillow menu, Nespresso space and superior bathroom amenities and toiletries.
