Room service is available. The Vincci’s reception can arrange car rental and currency exchange. Staff can also provide information about the region and help to book excursions, including tours of the impressive Mount Teide National Park.

name: Meliá Jardines del Teide
address: Urbanizacion Mirador del Duque, 38670 La Caleta (Tenerife)
description: Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only is built around a pool complex and 12,000m² of tropical gardens. It has views of the coast and mountains, including Mount Teide. All rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and satellite TV. Each room has a balcony or terrace, with views of the pool, sea or mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Level services are available in some rooms, including a private lounge with free coffee and tea, private check-in area and daily cocktail hour, as well as private pool and rooms with, pillow menu, coffee maker with a selection of coffees and designer toiletries. Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only offers 2 swimming pools, one being exclusive for The Level guests. Dining options includes a buffet restaurant, there are 2 a-la-carte restaurants, one has a bar and there is also a lobby bar with large terrace and panoramic ocean views. The hotel is set just 5 minutes’ walk from Playa del Duque beach, in southern Tenerife. Costa Adeje Golf Club is 1.5 km away. There is also a free shuttle service to a nearby shopping centre. There are also several shops on site.

name: Hotel Medium Valencia
address: Avda. d'Amado Granell Mesado, 48, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: Situated 700 metres from Valencia's impressive City of Arts and Sciences, this design hotel offers a gym and seasonal outdoor pool. The spacious rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. Each air-conditioned room at the Medium Valencia has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Each one has a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some have views of the spectacular City of Arts and Sciences. Mediterranean cuisine served in Hotel Medium Valencia’s on-site restaurant. The hotel also has a lounge bar in the lobby. The Medium Valencia is around 2.5 km from the historic centre of Valencia, and 4 km from the city’s beaches. The hotel offers private on-site parking, and frequent bus services stop nearby.

name: Hotel Valencia Oceanic Affiliated by Meliá
address: C/ Pintor Maella, 35, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Overlooking Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences, Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International offers a gym, an outdoor pool and a sun terrace. Each bright, air-conditioned room includes satellite TV and a laptop safe. Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International's soundproofed rooms are simply decorated in warm tones. They all have a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel offers a varied buffet breakfast, and Mediterranean dishes are served in the à la carte restaurant. Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International also has a lobby bar and a poolside snack bar. El Corte Inglés Department Store can be found right next to the hotel, and the City of Arts and Sciences is a 5-minute walk away. The beach is a 10-minute bus ride away, and city’s historic centre is within 3 km.

name: Catalonia Excelsior Hotel
address: Carrer de la Barcelonina, 5, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Catalonia Excelsior is located in Valencia’s Old Town, just a few metres from Plaza del ayuntamiento Square. This elegant hotel features a café, free Wi-Fi access, rooms with satellite TVs. The Excelsior’s rooms are bright and air conditioned. Each has air conditioning, a small fridge and a well-equipped bathroom. Guests can enjoy a daily, buffet breakfast in the Catalonia’s café. There is a range of cafés, bars and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. Valencia Cathedral is a 5-minute walk from the Excelsior whilst the Plaza de Toros Bullring is less than one kilometre away. The nearest Metro Station, Colón can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot.

name: Sh Valencia Palace
address: Avenida Paseo De La Alameda 32, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in front of the Palau de la Música in Valencia, this elegant hotel features a rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. It offers spacious rooms with a classic design and free Wi-Fi. SH Valencia is 10 minutes’ drive from the impressive City of Arts and Sciences. Malvarrosa Beach is just 3 km away while the airport is 25 km away. There is also a snack bar and a lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

name: Melia Valencia
address: Avenida Cortes Valencianas 52, Valencia, Valencia
description: This modern Melia hotel is next to Valencia’s Palacio de Congresos Congress Centre and 5 km from the AVE Train Station. Beniferri Metro Station is just 400 metres away. The spacious rooms feature contemporary design and offer spectacular views and a 49' flat-screen satellite TV. All are air conditioned and have free WiFi and modern bathrooms. The hotel has a play area for children. Meeting rooms are available. Some areas of the hotel are dedicated to The Level rooms and exclusive services, such as a private check-in and check-out area, exclusive buffet breakfast, daily snacks and drinks in a private area, as well as concierge service and organization of activities in the hotel. city. Manises International Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive from the Melia Valencia. The hotel's Socarrat restaurant specializes in Valencian paellas, as well as Mediterranean and international cuisine. The Oval Bar has a small snack and drink menu for every hour of the day.

name: NH Valencia Las Artes
address: Avenida Instituto Obrero, 28, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: The NH Valencia Las Artes hotel is ideally situated close to the Joaquín Sorolla Station and is a 13km bus or car ride from Valencia Airport. It is conveniently located near several attractions including the City of Arts and Sciences, the aquarium and an IMAX cinema. The Palau de les Arts Reina Sofia, the Valencia Cathedral, and Malvarrosa Beach are also all within a 1km to 7km distance and are easily accessible by foot or bus. Both the Central Market and the El Saler Centro Comercial shopping centers are also close by. Each of our 174 comfortable guest rooms have contemporary amenities including room service, free Wi-Fi, and comfortable mattresses. The junior suite has a coffee and tea maker, a sitting area, and sofa for guests who require additional space, not to mention the fantastic view of the opera house. A breakfast buffet is available daily and made-to-order hot dishes are cooked upon request. The elegant NH Valencia Las Artes Restaurant opens for lunch and dinner with its cuisine focused on local Mediterranean fare. A gym with a sauna, a children’s play area, a year-round heated swimming pool, wake up service, and three terraces are additional features for our guests enjoy.NH Hoteles

name: L&H Gran Via Valencia
address: 63 Gran Via de Ferran el Catòlic, 46008 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring a restaurant, bar and views of city, L&H Gran Vía Valencia is located in Valencia, less than 1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. All units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at L&H Gran Vía Valencia have a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and French, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near L&H Gran Vía Valencia include Norte Train Station, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Palacio Santa Clara, Autograph Collection
address: Calle Pascual y Genis 22, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Valencia is unique for many reasons, in its streets, history and avant-garde coexist perfectly knowing how to complement the city and so it is our new Autograph Collection, Hotel Palacio Santa Clara. Located close to the famous and commercial street of Valencia, Carrer Colón, it is the perfect example of the modernista spirit. Designed by the renowned architect Francisco Javier Görlich in 1916, this initial essence is preserved in our hotel. The delicious aesthetic design with different textures, curved lines, vegetables motifs. brings you a sense of harmony that perfectly combines with our best services and facilities. Explore our hotel in Valencia, find out our bar, drink a selected cocktail and evoke old times, unwind in one of our guest rooms totally equipped with everything you need plus small design touches that will lift your experience and after taking a dip in our pool, refresh yourself in our Dome Bar in the terrace. Live the real modernista experience. Discover Hotel Palacio Santa Clara.Marriott

name: Vincci Mercat
address: C/ de la Llanterna, 31, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring a restaurant and bar on site, Vincci Mercat is located in Valencia, less than 100 metres from the city’s Central Market. This hotel offers free Wi-Fi throughout and a rooftop terrace with a mini swimming pool and views of the old city. Each air-conditioned room in this hotel has a flat-screen TV, wardrobe, safe, minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, free toiletries, and a hairdryer. You can find several restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of Vincci Mercat. Valencia Cathedral is 600 metres from the property, and the City of Arts and Sciences is 3 km away.

name: Caro Hotel
address: Carrer de l'Almirall, 14, 46003 Valencia, Valencia
description: The unique Caro Hotel is housed in a 19th-century palace in central Valencia, just 200 metres from Valencia Cathedral. Combining historical features with modern design, it has an outdoor pool open all year round. Designed by Francesc Rifé, each of the elegant rooms in the Caro is totally individual, with exquisite touches of minimalist design. All have a flat-screen satellite TV, air-conditioning and a free minibar. The bathrooms include Bvlgari toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers. The cuisine of restaurant Alma del Temple offers a relaxed service that based on traditional ingredients and gives a protagonism to the kitchen. Architecturally unique, parts of Caro Hotel date from up to 2000 years ago. Original features include a 2nd-century Roman mosaic, part of the 13th-century Arabic city walls and Gothic arches. The façade dates from the 19th century. Plaza de la Virgen and Valencia's basilica are within 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel. La Lonja de la Seda, the medieval market and a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Neptuno
address: Paseo Neptuno 2, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: This design beachfront hotel overlooks Valencia harbour and has a small spa and a gym The modern, air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, free WiFi and sea or marina views. Marina Real Juan Carlos I tram stop can be found just outside the hotel, and offers a link with central Valencia. There is also direct access to the beach. Attractively located in the Poblats Maritims district, this hotel provides a popular beachside bar and a restaurant. The restaurant offers a range of traditional rice dishes and fresh seafood for dinner. Oceanografic is 2.4 km from the hotel, while City of Arts & Sciences is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Sercotel Sorolla Palace
address: Avda. de Las Cortes Valencianas, 58, 46015 Valencia, Valencia
description: The elegant Sorolla Palace is 50 meters from Valencia's Congress Centre, offering a beautiful terrace with an outdoor pool,It also features a hot tub, gym and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Sercotel have bright, attractive décor and include air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The upper floors of the Sorolla Palace enjoy impressive views of the city, and the outdoor pool contains a retractable roof that covers it in winter, spring and autumn. In the cafeteria L'Estany, which prepares tapas and a wide variety of cocktails, Mediterranean and international dishes are served. The Sercotel Sorolla Palace is located a 5-minute walk from the Beniferri metro station, which connects in 9 stops with the City of Arts and Sciences. Beniferri Park is just 100 meters from the hotel.

name: AZZ Valencia Táctica
address: C/ Botiguers, 1, 46980 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located just 10 minutes’ drive from Valencia’s Congress Centre, Hotel Táctica provides air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. The rooms at the Táctica feature parquet floors. Each one has satellite TV and a private bathroom. The hotel’s cafeteria serves drinks and snacks. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The hotel offers a charging station for electric vehicles, available for an extra charge. The Recinto Ferial de Valencia Exhibition Centre and Heron City Shopping Centre are within 2 km of the property. The hotel is 7 minutes’ drive from Valencia Airport and 15 minutes from central Valencia.

name: Port Feria Valencia
address: C/ Cullera 67, 46035 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located next to the Feria de Valencia and very close to the city center, Port Feria Valencia is the best option to discover and get to know Valencia, thanks to its excellent communications to and from any point of the city, its complete facilities and quality of their services. Modern hotel with excellent communications with the historic center, the Plaza del Ayuntamiento, the City of Arts and Sciences and the Airport. The Port Feria Valencia has, among its excellent and complete services, an à la carte restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and Valencian specialties, an outdoor swimming pool and solarium, a gym, a restaurant and a cafeteria. Our clientele will be able to enjoy free Internet connection throughout the hotel (Wi-Fi) and parking and airport transfer service (both for an additional fee). In addition, Port Feria Valencia has magnificent rooms equipped with all the necessary amenities to have an unbeatable stay and three meeting rooms with a maximum capacity of up to 78 people, among other services and facilities. Benimàmet Metro Station is 400 metres away, and the hotel has good access to main roads. Valencia Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: The Westin Valencia
address: Amadeo De Saboya 16, 46010 Valencia, Valencia
description: The Westin Valencia is ideally located in the city centre close to the historic center, the commercial area and the City of Arts and Science of Valencia. Our 135 elegant Art Deco style rooms and suites have a warm, relaxing atmosphere with plenty of natural light and some of them even feature private terraces with a Jacuzzi. Come relish in our rooms, relax at our spa, enjoy our exquisite dining and let our lovely staff take care of you on your next vacation.Marriott

name: Las Arenas Balneario Resort
address: Eugenia Vines 22-24, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: This 5-star resort has a superb seafront location with direct access to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach. The Las Arenas Balneario Resort features 2 seasonal outdoor pools surrounded by loungers, and a luxurious spa. All rooms at this design hotel are elegantly decorated with neutral colours. They include free Wi-Fi and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. The Sorolla restaurant serves traditional but creative cuisine. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light refreshments are available from the pool bar. The spa at Las Arenas Balneario Resort Valencia includes a heated indoor pool with views to the gardens. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym. The Palacio de la Música and the America’s Cup Port are a short walk from the hotel. There are 2 metro stations and many bus stops nearby the Hotel Las Arenas Balneario Resort.

name: AZZ Valencia Congress
address: Calle Botiguers 49, 46980 Paterna, Valencia
description: Valencia Congress Hotel&Spa is situated in Parque Empresarial Táctica in Paterna, 7 km from Valencia. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar, the spa as well as the restaurant and the gardens. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms include a seating area where you can relax. The rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can benefit from massages, health and aesthetics treatments in private cabins in the hotel's spa for a surcharge. Meeting rooms for events and congress that host over 1400 attendees is also available. Metro station is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Hospes Palau de La Mar
address: Avenida de Navarro Reverter, 14, 46004 Valencia, Valencia
description: Set in a 19th-century building, Hospes Palau de La Mar features a striking lobby, a spa and restaurant. Located in Valencia's Eixample Noble district, it is a 15-minute walk from the city's AVE Railway Station. The Hospes Palau de la Mar has elegant, modern rooms with queen-size beds and marble bathrooms. Wi-Fi is available in rooms and public areas. These include an interior patio. Traditional recipes using local produce and fresh fish are available at the gourmet restaurant. The Palau de la Mar’s Spa has 3 massage and treatment rooms. A hot tub, a sauna and a Turkish bath are also included. There is also a small gym. Valencia’s cathedral and surrounding old town are within 10 minutes' walk of the Hospes Palau, while the City of Arts and Sciences is 2 km away. There is also easy access to the Lonja, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Primus Valencia
address: Calle Menorca 22, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: This ultra-modern hotel is just 600 metres from Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences. It has a spa, gym, an all-year round outdoor swimming pool and its elegant rooms feature plasma satellite TV and free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms at the Valencia Primus have attractive wooden flooring and bright, modern décor. Each one is soundproofed and has a work desk and laptop safe. For a surcharge, guests have access to the hotel’s extensive spa, which features a dynamic swimming pool, cold pool, hot tub, sauna and hammam. A range of massage and beauty treatments are available for a surcharge. There is also a fitness centre. The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves traditional Mediterranean food with a modern twist. It has an outdoor terrace, and there is also a café-bar overlooking the charming decked garden. Aqua Multiespacio Shopping Centre is just opposite the Primus Valencia. There is a bus stop 75 metres away, connecting you with the city centre and beaches.

name: Barcelo Valencia
address: Avenida Francia 11, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. A hotel that coexists with the City of Arts and Sciences.The Barcelo Valencia hotel oozes urbanism and modernity in the City of Arts and Sciences offering a unique experience in this city by the Turia river. Well-connected with the airport it is ideal for business or leisure visits.This 4-star hotel boasts 187 light spacious rooms 10 of them Junior Suites and 2 Suites giving you easy access to all the leisure and business possibilities in Valencia. In addition to the excellent gastronomy the hotel offers a magnificent terrace with views of the city and bar service and our new swimming pool. The hotel also benefits from a fantastic U-Wellness centre spread over 500 m2 and located on the 10th floor with spectacular views of the City of Arts and Sciences. This health and beauty centre offers 2 treatment rooms a fitness studio and a full water circuit with a Finnish sauna an ice room a footbath hydromassage beds pressure jets an activation shower an aromatic central shower a Turkish bath and a variety of health and beauty treatments. The Barcelo Valencia hotel offers design and comfort with cutting-edge facilities giving guests the chance to combine work with fun.Barcelo.com

name: Port Azafata Valencia
address: Cuesta Aeropuerto 15, 46940 Manises, Valencia
description: Port Azafata Valencia is located just 500 meters from Valencia Airport and offers free transportation to the airport, an outdoor pool, gym, sauna and restaurant services. Rooms at Port Azafata Hotel features wooden floors and modern design. Each air-conditioned room includes an LCD TV, safe and a bathroom with hairdryer. In addition, it has 7 meeting and convention rooms. An extensive buffet breakfast is served each morning at Port Azafata Hotel. The hotel´s restaurant specialises in rice dishes such as typical local paella. The hotel is situated just 15 minutes by car from the centre of Valencia, and a 5-minute drive from Manises Golf Club. Tickets for the City of Arts and Sciences are available at the Port Azafata’s reception.

name: Hotel Valencia Center
address: Avda. De Francia 33, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Hotel Valencia Center is 400 metres from Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences, 3 km from the city centre. It offers a sauna, gym and outdoor pool, and free Wi-Fi. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Ayora Metro Station, which connects to the city centre and the airport. It takes 5 minutes by bus to the beach or city centre, and there is a bus stop opposite the hotel. All air-conditioned/heated (according season) rooms have a satellite TV, safe and minibar The hotel restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available. There is a 24-hour front desk and you can hire a car at the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Eurostars Rey Don Jaime
address: Avenida Baleares 2, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Eurostars Rey Don Jaime is located opposite the pretty River Túria Gardens and Valencia's Palau de la Música. It features a roof top terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. The impressive 14-floor tower of the Rey Don Jaime offers rooms with air conditioning, heating and satellite TV for an extra cost. All rooms have a large wardrobe. The City of Arts and Sciences can be reached in around 15 minutes, on foot from the hotel. Valencia’s seafront and the closest beach are 3.6 km away. The local bus 19 stops at the corner of Eurostars Rey Don Jaime and connects with the city centre and the beach.

name: Eurostars Gran Valencia
address: El Valle De Ayora, 3, 46015 Valencia, Valencia
description: This modern hotel, next to Valencia’s Congress Centre, offers views over the city centre and free Wi-Fi. The Eurostars has a gym, sauna and rooftop pool. All air-conditioned rooms at the Gran Valencia feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe and a minibar. The hotel has a bar, and the restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine, such as fresh seafood. Room service is also available. A packed breakfast is served in the room. The Eurostars Gran Valencia offers a laundy and dry cleaning service. Valencia's Old Town is 3 km away. There are Metro, train and bus stops nearby.

name: Ilunion Valencia 4
address: Calle Del Valle De Ayora, 1, 46015 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, and free WiFi throughout, Ilunion Valencia 4 is just 800 metres from Valencia’s Palacio de Congresos and a 3-minute walk from Beniferri Metro Stop. Rooms are decorated with warm colors and provide an integrated seating area, air conditioning, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They also include a sofa, a fridge and a safe. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and complimentary toiletries. Some of them provide stunning city views. The Ilunion Valencia 4 serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes. Guests can enjoy relax in the seasonal swimming pool. Private parking is available for an extra cost. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. Guests will find a shopping centre and a range of restaurants within a 15-minute walk of Ilunion Valencia 4. Valencia’s Historic Centre is 3 km from the property, and Malvarrosa Beach is 15 minutes' drive away. Valencia Airport is a 40-minute metro ride away. Supplements per night apply. Guests should contact the hotel to check and confirm availability of room for a reservation with pet. Hotel will check there's availability and that room complies with specifications needed. Pets are only allowed in "Pet Friendly Double room" room type. Pets are not allowed in the other types of rooms. Once in the establishment, guests will receive the access regulations, which they must read and approve.” Parking is reserved upon arrival at the hotel and always subject to availability.

name: Hotel Xon's Valencia
address: Avenida Comarques Del Pais Valencia, Parallel to Highway A-3, Exit 345, 46930 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located just 7 km from Valencia Airport, Hotel Xon's offers free Wi-Fi and modern rooms with satellite TV. It features an outdoor swimming pool and a gym with sauna. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at the Xon's feature parquet floors and smart décor. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. Guests can also enjoy Mediterranean and international specialities for dinner. There is a terrace bar. The Bonaire Shopping Centre is next to the Hotel Xon’s Valencia. Opposite the hotel there is an ice rink, and the Ricardo Tormo de Cheste Race Circuit is 10 minutes' drive away. The hotel can organise car rental for guests as well as excursions. The Manises Golf Club is less than 3 km away.

name: Hotel Albufera
address: Plaza Alqueria de La Culla, 1, 46910 Valencia, Valencia
description: Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and an indoor pool. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a ballroom. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.#Optional fees: The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for buffet breakfast: EUR 8 per person (approximately) Airport shuttle fee: EUR 57 per vehicle (roundtrip) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Policies: Cash transactions at this property cannot exceed EUR 1000, due to national regulations. For further details, please contact the property using information in the booking confirmation. One child 3 years old or younger stays free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available. This property affirms that it follows the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Tourism Certified (Spain). Instructions: Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property Guests booked in Half Board or Full Board rate plans do not receive drinks with their meals. Additional fees apply. Special instructions: This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. Minimum age: 18. Check in from: 4:00 PM. Check in to: midnight. Check out: 12:00 PM. House Rule: Children welcome. House Rule: No pets. House Rule: No smoking.Expedia

name: NH Valencia Center
address: Ricardo Mico, 1, 46009 Valencia, Valencia
description: Situated in the serene city center area of Valencia, the NH Valencia Center hotel is located near a quiet park and is less than a kilometer from Quart Tower. The Joaquin Sorolla and Estacion Norte stations are within two kilometers of the hotel and provide access to local transport. Each of our 192 rooms provides an optimal level of comfort and style. Contemporary amenities include 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. Select rooms have Turia park views. Suites offer the added luxury of coffee machines, bathrobe, and slippers. A fresh breakfast buffet is served each day and guests are welcome to request made-to-order hot dishes or an early bird breakfast. For lunch and dinner, the NH Center Restaurant serves delectable international and Mediterranean cuisine in laid back surroundings. Next to the lobby is our bar-café which serves light refreshments including cocktails and a range of snacks. NH Valencia Center has 8 function rooms which can accommodate up to 400 guests. Allow our special events services team to assist in planning an impeccable menu for everything from a straightforward business meeting to a chic gala. Our friendly staff is on hand to ensure guests have the perfect stay.NH Hoteles

name: Parador de El Saler
address: Avda. De Los Pinares, 151, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: This Parador is located on the famous El Saler golf course, within a coastal nature reserve. Luxurious and contemporary, it has a spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of the Parador Campo de Golf El Saler are modern and spacious. All have heating, air conditioning and TV. Many of them have views of the golf course. In the spa you will find a range of exclusive treatments and massages. It also has saunas and a heated swimming pool. During the summer the hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The Parador has free parking. The restaurant of the El Saler specialises in local rice dishes, above all paella. The El Saler golf course is ranked in the top 10 in Spain. Alternatively, you can explore the Albufera Nature Reserve which is home to a wide range of plant and wildlife. The city of Valencia is just 18 km away.

name: Globales Reina Cristina
address: Paseo De La Conferencia S N, 11207 Algeciras, Andalusia
description: Globales Reina Cristina was originally opened in 1901 and houses ancient ruins, such as parts of an 8th-century Mosque and a Moorish well. It features indoor and outdoor swimming pools. Globales Reina Cristina has welcomed famous visitors, including Winston Churchill and King Juan Carlos I of Spain. It offers elegant rooms with a private balcony, free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV. Surrounded by beautiful gardens, the hotel is situated next to Algeciras Port. The beaches of Tarifa are 20 minutes away by car and free parking is available on site. Facilities at the hotel include 2 tennis courts and a gym. Table tennis are also available. The hotel restaurant serves buffet meals and guests have the option of à la carte dining in the evening, or at lunchtime. There are also 2 bars and a café. Barbecues are organised during the summer months. There is also live music, on occasion. Gibraltar Airport is 35 minutes drive from the property.

name: Hotel Alborán Algeciras
address: C/ Alamo, 11205 Algeciras, Andalusia
description: Hotel Alborán Algeciras is a traditional Andalusian hotel, situated in a quiet residential area of Algeciras. Just 2 minutes’ drive from El Rinconcillo Beach, it offers attractive rooms with free Wi-Fi. The elegant rooms in Alboran Algeciras are arranged around a central patio. All rooms have modern design and include a private bathroom, minibar and safe. The El Claustro Restaurant offers a varied à la carte menu, as well as a good-value daily lunch and dinner set menu. The all-day café offers set menus and baguettes. The hotel is located at the entrance to the city, next to the A7 Motorway. It is just 2 km from Algeciras Port and 3 km from the city centre.

name: Odyssey Rooms
address: 9 Carrer Gravina, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: Situated in Alicante, 200 metres from Postiguet Beach and 400 metres from the centre, Odyssey Rooms Alicante features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a rooftop pool. Private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and a bath or shower. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with city or quiet street views. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available each morning at Odyssey Rooms Alicante. The wellness area at the accommodation is comprised of a public bath, a solarium and an open-air bath. A bicycle rental service is available at Odyssey Rooms Alicante. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Alicante Train Station, Alicante Museum of Contemporary Art and Explanada de España. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández Airport, 17 km from Odyssey Rooms Alicante.

name: Hospes Amerigo
address: Rafael Altamira 7, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: With beautiful views of Alicante Cathedral and Santa Bárbara Castle, Hospes Amerigo’s free rooftop spa features a sauna, pool and gym. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. This elegant design hotel is set in a 19th-century Dominican Convent in Alicante’s old town, 300 metres from Postiguet Beach. Hospes Amerigo is within 50 metres of the cathedral and Alicante Town Hall. Stylish room at Hospes Amerigo have high ceilings and large windows. Some rooms feature abstract silk paintings. In summer, guests can enjoy the views from the rooftop lounge bar, situated next to the open-air pool.

name: Dormirdcine Alicante
address: Calle Gravina, 5, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: Set in the heart of Alicante, it is 50 metres from the C-6 Airport Bus Stop. Postiguet Beach and the marina are under 200 metres away. Each air-conditioned room at Dormirdcine Alicante is equipped with satellite TV, a safe and work desk. A minibar is available for an extra charge. Massage treatments are possible in rooms or at a nearby spa. A varied buffet breakfast is served in the morning. Express check-in/out and 24-hour reception are both available.

name: NH Alicante
address: Calle Mexico, 18, 03008 Alicante, Valencia
description: This modern design hotel is just a 5-minute drive from Alicante’s beach and marina. There is free access to the spa centre, with a hot tub, sauna and gym. All rooms at the NH Alicante are bright, spacious and comfortable. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The NHube restaurant offers varied and original cuisine. It is a multifunctional space, with areas for reading and relaxing. Set on the hotel's roof, guests will find a small, outdoor, seasonal swimming pool. In August, guests can enjoy dinner at the rooftop terrace. The Ciudad de la Luz complex is a short drive away from the NH Alicante. The Puerta de Alicante shopping centre is also nearby. There is easy access to the A-31 Motorway.

name: Casa Alberola Alicante, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Calle Canalejas 1, 03001 Alicante, Valencia
description: Welcome to Casa Alberola Alicante, Curio Collection by Hilton, your coastal retreat in the heart of Alicante. Beautifully set in a historic neo-classical building, our exquisite architecture draws you in and back in time to the elegance of the 1920’s with touches of velvet, intricate moldings and marble. Nestled in the heart of the city, our boutique hotel is surrounded by historical landmarks and mere steps from unique shops, restaurants and vibrant nightlife. Soak up the sun and Mediterranean breeze as you stroll through the famous Esplanade of Spain and Canalejas Park on your way to Postiguet Beach. Santa Barbara Castle is just a 12-minute walk away on top of Benacantil Mountain, showcasing breathtaking panoramic views of Alicante Bay. Cap off your day with a delectable dinner at our onsite restaurant. Unwind with a cocktail at the bar or relax in the comfort of your guest room and let us bring dinner to you. Our stylish guest rooms offer an elegant oasis and thoughtful amenities such as a Nespresso® machine, work desk and balcony with beautiful city or sea views. Upgrade your stay in our magnificent Cupola or one of our circular rooms featuring more space to relax or entertain and panoramic ocean views. Our business center will keep you connected and productive and offsite meeting space is available upon request for corporate or business events for up to 40 delegates.Hilton

name: El Plantio Golf Resort
address: Ctra Antigua Alicante, Elche km3 (A-79), Alicante, Valencia
description: Surrounded by pretty gardens, this luxurious resort features 2 golf courses. Located 10 minutes’ drive from the beach and 3 km from Alicante, it offers 2 outdoor pools, a gym and modern apartments with a balcony. All elegant, air-conditioned apartments at the El Plantío Golf Resort have satellite TV, a modern kitchen equipped with dishwasher and washing machine and a dining room. A daily cleaning service is also provided. The resort’s buffet restaurant serves international food, and there is also a bar. A Carrefour supermarket is 5 minutes’ drive away. Plantío Golf has a golf school, a children’s playground and a large sun terrace. It has a 24-hour reception and Alicante Airport is 3 km away.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Alicante
address: Avenida Elche, 3, 03008 Alicante, Valencia
description: Find out the blend of the Mediterranean life and the modern style of AC hotel AIicante in one of the best destinations of Spain for vacations and business trips alike. Conveniently located near the commercial area, the busy city center, Paseo de la Explanada and the Postiguet Beach, it also include easy access to the Valencia, Murcia and Madrid highway, it is the perfect spot to wind down and take in the scenery. After a business day or an adventure in Alicante, make our hotel your home base and share your feed in social media with our free Wi-Fi: relax in our guest rooms and take advantage of the upgrade rooms benefits, with sleek design and the amenities you need. Drop by our on-site AC Lounge, an open space where inspiration crystallizes into creative at day and in a fun place with a selection of hand crafted cocktails at night. Looking for an experience, book in AC Hotel Alicante!Marriott

name: The Level at Meliá Alicante - Adults Only
address: Plaza Del Puerto, 3, 03001 Alicante, Valencia
description: Set in a prime location of Alicante - Costa Blanca, The Level at Melia Alicante puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. 24-hour check-in are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make The Level at Melia Alicante the perfect choice for your stay in Alicante - Costa Blanca.priceline.com

name: Hotel Port Alicante City & Beach
address: Avenida Cataluña, 20, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Port Alicante City & Beach is located in Alicante, 800 metres from the beach of San Juan and 10 minutes by car from the city center. This hotel has outdoor swimming pools, gym and sauna. All rooms at the Port Alicante City & Beach have air conditioning and full private bathroom with hairdryer. They also have a desk, a kettle water, safe and satellite TV. The hotel offers outdoor paid parking, free WiFi in public areas, It also has a garden with a playground and a children's pool. The restaurant offers a buffet service and serves Mediterranean cuisine, specializing in paella and other rice dishes. There is also a cafe/bar and a poolside bar, open during all year round. A bus and tram stop is 400 metres from this hotel. The field of golf de Alicante is located 600 meters away. Near the hotel there are many bars, restaurants and shops. The nearest airport is Alicante Airport, 25 km from the property. NEW- Opening of the new Sky Bar Boga on the hotel's rooftop. Prior reservation is recommended, before arrival at the hotel, to the email: portalicante@porthotels.es Live a unique experience and enjoy the perfect fusion between exquisite cocktails, high-class cuisine and live music! We will wait for you!

name: Meliá Alicante
address: Plaza Del Puerto, 3, 03001 Alicante, Valencia
description: Set between Alicante Harbour and Postiguet Beach, Meliá Alicante offers an outdoor pool and free WiFi throughout. All rooms feature a terrace, some with sea views. A kid's club is available in high season. All rooms at the Melia Alicante are air conditioned and spacious. They have flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. The modern bathrooms come with toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel’s Trasluz Restaurant specialises in rice dishes and fresh fish. There is also a poolside snack bar and an elegant lounge bar. The hotel also offers The Level personalized service in some of the hotel’s rooms. This adults only service includes a range of superior services and facilities, such as private reception, express check-in and check-out, access to private pool with magnificent sea views, access to the Open Bar with free drinks and snacks, etc. The hotel faces Alicante Casino, and is just 50 metres from the yacht club and marina. Santa Barbara Castle and Archaeology Museum are just 800 metres away.

name: Hotel Spa Porta Maris by Melia
address: Plaza Puerta Del Mar, 3, Alicante, Valencia
description: Hotel Spa Porta Maris by Melia is set between Postiguet Beach and Alicante Marina, offers views of the Mediterranean and free Wi-Fi. It is 100 metres from Alicante’s historic centre. All rooms have a private terrace, flat-screen TV, pillow menu and seasonal air conditioning and heating. Rooms offer views of the marina or Alicante's Bay. The suites also have a lounge. The hotel has a gym and a spa, available at an extra cost. The spa features a heated pool and a thermal circuit. It also offers massages and body and facial treatments. Buffet breakfast is served in the Alborada room, with views of Alicante's bay. The Marabierta Restaurant, offering views of the sea and Alicante's sports dock, serves typical Mediterranean dishes daily. Hotel Spa Porta Maris by Melia is near the Mediterranean Casino and 100 metres from Paseo de Las Palmeras. The airport is a 15-minute drive away. Nearby tram and train connections provide quick access to the Terra Mítica Theme Park.

name: Hotel Alicante Golf
address: C. José Escultor Gutiérrez, 23, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Hotel Alicante Golf is set in beautiful gardens, with an 18-hole golf course designed by Seve Ballesteros. It features a spa and wellness centre as well as an outdoor pool. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Alicante Golf feature bright décor and a terrace. Each one has a TV. The Alicante Golf has padel courts and a children’s play area with special activities and menus. Massage service is available at the hotel for an extra cost. Free WiFi is offered in public areas. The hotel is 800 metres from Playa de San Juan Beach, with exclusive sunbeds and catering. Hotel Alicante Golf is close to a large shopping area. Alicante city centre is 7 km away and Alicante Airport is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. There is an elegant bar where guests can relax with a drink. The El Mirador Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine with views of the golf course.

name: Hotel Suites del Mar by Melia
address: Plaza Del Mar, 3, Alicante, Valencia
description: Suites del Mar by Melia is part of Spa Porta Maris Hotel complex. There is free WiFi, and free use of the Sanarium Circuit and Non-heated outdoor pool on the 1st floor with fantastic views. Its junior suites are elegant and have a furnished terrace with superb views over the Marina or the sea.They have seasonal heating and air conditioning (centralized system). There are 2 Smart TVs with USB input. The modern bathroom comes with free toiletries, a shower, a double washbasin, a magnifying mirror, and a hairdryer. There is also a bathtub near the bed Discover The Socarrat restaurant where you can taste a wide variety of rice dishes as well as tapas and local gourmet dishes. With a privileged location and fantastic sea views, enjoy the finest cocktail options as well as our full breakfast buffet served at “Socarrat” breakfast room, both with fantastic sea views. The junior suites are 300 metres from Alicante’s central Explanada Avenue.The hotel offers therapeutic massage services and a new urban spa at a special price for guests staying. On-site parking is available for a supplement.

name: Melia Villaitana
address: Avda. Alcalde Eduardo Zaplana, 7, Alicante, Valencia
description: Located less than 3 km from Benidorm, Hotel Villaitana offers a luxurious spa area, outdoor swimming pools and an artificial beach. Set on 2 golf courses designed by Jack Nicklaus, it has great views of Gran Bahía Bay. Melia Villaitana was designed in the form of a traditional Mediterranean village. Each of the large, air-conditioned rooms comes with a private balcony or terrace. They also have satellite TV, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Villaitana also dedicates some of its areas to The Level exclusive rooms and services, where The Level guests have private access to The Level Lounge with open bar and private buffet, daily cocktails, press and concierge services and pre-arrival services. Rooms include sound bar, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, coffee machine and turndown service, among other services. The Level rooms also offer some privileged views over the area. The Villaitana’s wellness centre features a gym free of charge, sauna and water circuit with thermal baths. A range of beauty and relaxation treatments is also available. The resort has its own tennis and paddle tennis courts, a seasonal children's playground for children over 5 years and a club. Villaitana Hotel has 6 restaurants and a snack bar. Easily accessible from the AP-7 Motorway, Hotel Villaitana offers easy road access to the Terra Mítica Theme Park and Terra Natura Nature Reserve. Alicante is a 20-minute drive away. Alicante Airport is 50 km away and Valencia Airport is 134 km away.

name: Barceló Raval
address: Rambla Del Raval, 17-21, 08001 Barcelona
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Why choose an urban and cosmopolitan hotel in the heart of BarcelonaThe Barcelo Raval strives to transmit the essence of this cosmopolitan Mediterranean city given that it is on the doorstep of the lively Las Ramblas and very close to landmarks such as Plaza Catalonia the Liceu theatre the famous Boqueria food market and the Cathedral. Its philosophy and cosmopolitan design connect with the city and make it one of the top hotels in Barcelona.How to begin your discovery of the essence of urban Barcelona Wake up in one of the hotels 182 rooms and 4 ultra-comfortable suites with views of the district of Raval all equipped with iPhone docking stations and with free Wi-Fi. When guests ask what makes the Barcelo Raval stand out from other urban hotels in Barcelona once they see the innovative lobby and admire the citys skyline from the marvellous panoramic 360 terrace they know the answer. Among its amazing facilities the hotels B-Lounge offers an amazing range of cuisine including modern and creative tapas coktails and one of the citys most famous brunches served every Sunday.The entire hotel has been designed for you to connect with Barcelona; its gastronomy culture and passion for everything avant-garde. Everything you need to experience a genuinely magical cosmopolitan city. Urban adrenaline runs through the veins of the Barcelo Raval.Barcelo.com

name: Sunotel Club Central
address: Valencia, 157, 08011 Barcelona
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub on its terrace, Sunotel Club Central is set in Barcelona’s elegant Eixample neighbourhood. Each modern air-conditioned room has free, high-speed WiFi, a TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower and hairdryer. Sunotel Club Central features a cosy bar, serving snacks and drinks. There is also room service available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and free bicycles are available upon request and subject to availability. Passeig de Gracia, with its Gaudi monuments and designer shops, is a 10-minute walk from Sunotel Club Central. The famous Las Ramblas Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya are a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away, and you can catch an airport bus in Plaza Catalunya.

name: Barceló Imagine
address: Calle Agustin De Foxa, 32, 28036 Madrid
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Near Chamartin Station5 minutes walking to Paseo de la Castellana and Plaza de Castilla10 minutes by taxi to IFEMA2.5 km to Santiago BernabeuMetro bus and train walking distanceSwimming PoolEasy connection with airport by train 15 minutesBarcelo.com

name: Eurostars Palacio Buenavista
address: Concilios De Toledo, 1, Toledo, Toledo
description: Eurostarts Palacio Buenavista has been beautifully integrated into a 16th century palace. It is located in Buenavista, only a 5-minute drive from the centre of Toledo. There is free Wi-Fi in reception. It is a pleasure to stroll through the elegant gardens around the hotel. The rooms are fully-equipped, the hotel boasts outstanding Spa facilities for an extra cost, and an open-air swimming pool should you wish to sunbathe. There are also 14 modern function rooms for meetings and a wide culinary offering of traditional Spanish cuisine in the restaurant. Visit local vineyards to sample regional flavours. You cannot miss the opportunity to visit this Unesco World Heritage site, an ideal place for relaxation.

name: Villa Jerez
address: Avenida de la Cruz Roja 7, 11407 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: This hotel is set in a traditional noble house in the centre of Jerez, surrounded by 4,000 m² of gardens. Located just off Plaza del Caballo, the Villa Jerez is within walking distance of most of the important monuments of this sunny Andalusian city. Here you can enjoy the steam bath or gym before taking a refreshing dip in the swimming pool. You can also choose to relax with a massage before enjoying a meal in the hotel’s restaurant or cafeteria. In the area surrounding the hotel you will see plenty of evidence of the city’s rich cultural heritage. Jerez is mostly famous for 3 things: horses, flamenco and wine. A visit to one of the local wine cellars is a must.

name: Hospes Palacio de San Esteban
address: Arroyo de Santo Domingo, 3, 37008 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Surrounded by the monuments of historic Salamanca, this stylish, modern hotel is set in a renovated convent full of timeless charm. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. With a superb central location, the Hospes Palacio de San Esteban provides the ideal location for your visit to this prestigious university city. Along with its excellent setting you can relax in the gardens or enjoy a meal in the El Monje, the on-site restaurant. The seasonal pool offers view of the Cathedral and the San Esteban Monastery. Guest can visit the city’s 2 cathedrals and the famous Casa de la Concha in a short walk. As well as the numerous charming sights of this ancient Castilian city, you will also find plenty of entertainment in the surrounding streets.

name: Alma Pamplona
address: Beloso Bajo, 11, 31006 Pamplona
description: Alma Pamplona features a spa with an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and gym. This modern design hotel includes elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi and a large flat-screen TV. Hotel Alma Pamplona Muga De Beloso has a peaceful setting in Navarra, with wonderful mountain views. The hotel is near San Juan de Dios Hospital, just 2km from central Pamplona. This historic city is famous for its San Fermin Festival. The Alma Pamplona has a stylish restaurant and a bar. The 24-hour reception can arrange airport transfers and car rental. There is free private parking on site. Guests can also rent bicycles to explore the countryside. Rooms at the hotel are spacious and bright, with climate control and a minibar. The private bathrooms are decorated in neutral colours and include a selection of toiletries.

name: Barceló Montecastillo Golf
address: Carretera de Arcos km 6, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Completely renovated in March 2013 the Barcelo Montecastillo Golf is a true icon of the Jerez area thanks to its high quality facilities and its characteristic elegant and simple design.The hotel is perfect for guests looking for relaxation and tranquillity on their holidays offered by the hotels complete Spa for golf lovers for companies who wish to hold meetings at the hotel or for tourists who want to discover Jerezs bodegas and equestrian events. This hotel has a total of 162 rooms and a group of villas making it the perfect accommodation for families and groups of friends who want to enjoy a tranquil and relaxing holiday.This resort offer you 3 outdoor swimming pools Wellbeing Club Spa Circuit dry sauna steam sauna and gym. 4 Treatment rooms. Lounges 16 Halls for Events Exhibition gallery Rooms for private banquets Golf course 18 hole golf course designed by Jack Nicklaus. It was the venue for the Volvo Masters for 5 years in a row 1997/2001 Practice course and Putting Green Golf Academy Exclusive use of Private Academy for groups or events. Football and other sports 2 international regulation size football grounds Dressing rooms at the football grounds Jogging track Multisport athletics track Tennis court Barcelo Hotels and Resorts offers you in this hotel the original and new gastronomic concept of Healthy Gourmet which consists in the mixture of great quality products exquisite flavours sublime presentations.The perfect combination between eating well and in a healthy way.Barcelo.com

name: Hesperia Córdoba
address: Avda. Fray Albino, 1, 14009 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Hesperia Córdoba is set on the banks of the Guadalquivir River, with views of La Mezquita and the Alcázar. Facilities include free Wi-Fi and a rooftop, seasonal swimming pool. All of the Hesperia Córdoba’s modern rooms have air conditioning, heating and satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with Modern Nature amenities. The centre of Córdoba, a UNESCO World Heritage site, is just across the Roman Bridge from the hotel. You can walk there in just 7 minutes.

name: Alameda Palace
address: Paseo De La Estación 1, 37004 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: The modern and luxurious Alameda Palace is located just 300 metres from the centre of Salamanca. It offers elegant, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. There is a small seasonal swimming pool, sun terrace, fitness centre and a hot tub, and a free internet terminal in the lobby. Salamanca Railway Station is about 600 metres away, while the Plaza Mayor is about 10 minutes’ walk away. The Alameda Palace’s spacious rooms all have marble bathrooms and antique-style furniture. Some of the rooms have great views of the city. The hotel’s Venecia Restaurant offers a blend of international and traditional Spanish dishes. It also offers an excellent wine cellar.

name: One Shot Palacio Conde De Torrejón 09
address: Calle Conde De Torrejón, 9, 41003 Seville, Andalusia
description: Attractively located in Seville, One Shot Palacio Conde de Torrejón 09 features air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean and Spanish dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box. Popular points of interest near One Shot Palacio Conde de Torrejón 09 include Isla Mágica, Santa María La Blanca Church and Plaza de Armas. The nearest airport is Seville Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Palacio del Carmen, Autograph Collection
address: Oblatas, 15703 Santiago de Compostela, Galicia
description: The Palacio del Carmen Autograph Collection Hotel is located in the historic area of Santiago de Compostela very close to the town center, the Santiago Cathedral, the University and the Plaza Obradoiro. It occupies a building that was once the Oblatas Convent and exudes undeniable elegance. Our Santiago Hotel features tailored services to tend to all your needs, ensuring you have a unique experience. AC Lounge, gardens, outdoor terrace, minibar, and plasma TV. Our Indoor swimming pool, fitness center and contemporary restaurant El Camelio provide multiple options to unwind after a day’s sightseeing. This Santiago de Compostela hotel helps our guests plan the perfect social or business event in one of our fully equipped rooms. Free WiFi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they wantMarriott

name: Hospes Palacio del Bailio
address: Calle Ramirez De Las Casas Deza, 10-12, 14001 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: This 5-star hotel occupies a 16th-Century palace in the heart of the ancient city of Córdoba. It has an outdoor pool set in pretty gardens. The elegant rooms of the Hospes Palacio del Bailio fuse past and present. Some include original wall paintings, and all have flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Rich materials such leather and velvet are used throughout the hotel. The bathrooms are particularly luxurious. The Palacio del Bailio offers plenty of space to relax. You can unwind in the flower garden or on the sun terrace surrounded by orange trees. Alternatively, you can enjoy a range of treatments at the hotel's exclusive Bodyna Spa. The hotel's restaurant, Arbequina, offers a mix of Spanish and Asian cuisine. The hotel is located 1 km from Cordoba Mosque-Cathedral, the third largest Mosque in the world and a World Heritage Site.

name: Eurostars Toledo
address: Paseo San Eugenio, Toledo, Toledo
description: With easy motorway access, Eurostars Toledo is within a 7-minute drive of Toledo’s historic centre. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Each modern room at Hotel Eurostars Toledo features attractive parquet floors and contemporary décor. Some rooms have city views, and all include a minibar, safe and flat-screen satellite TV. Bathrooms come with toiletries and a hairdryer. Overlooking the city, the hotel’s Panoramico restaurant serves typical regional cuisine, including game, Montes de Toledo olive oil and local marzipan. Information about the city is available from Eurostars Toledo’s 24-hour reception. 2 bus stops are located 200 metres away from the hotel, and Toledo Cathedral is around a 20-minute walk away.

name: Dear Hotel Madrid
address: Gran Via 80, 28013 Madrid
description: Located 1 minute's walk from Plaza de España Metro Station on Gran Via, Dear Hotel Madrid offers boutique accommodation in central Madrid. The hotel features a rooftop plunge pool, terrace and restaurant. Featuring free high-speed WiFi, each stylish bright room is air-conditioned and fitted with a 40-inch flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All the spacious rooms are soundproofed and include a safe, a minibar with free mineral water, a speaker for smartphones, and tea and coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms include a rain shower, bathrobe, slippers and exclusive free toiletries. Set on the 14th floor, the Nice to Meet You Restaurant & Lounge offers contemporary and cosmopolitan cuisine in a relaxed atmosphere. Guests can enjoy cocktails and music, with spectacular panoramic views of Madrid. An exclusive buffet breakfast is also offered. Other services available include a room service. You can walk to Royal Palace of Madrid in 10 minutes. Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor are a 15-minute walk. Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas is 21 km away.

name: Eurostars Sitges
address: Av. Cami De Miralpeix, 12, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: Overlooking the Mediterranean sea and the Terramar Golf Club, Eurostars Sitges is 2 km from the beach in Sitges. Free WiFi and free parking are available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a private terrace with views, a flat-screen TV, a laptop safe, a minibar, a tea/coffee maker and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The property provides restaurants, bars, a chill-out lounge and a boutique restaurant. Guests can enjoy à la carte fine wine, dining, snacks and cocktails. Eurostars Sitges offers a wellness centre with a spa, an indoor pool, a hot tub, a sauna and a steam bath for an extra charge. Therapies and beauty treatments are also available. A 24-hour reception and a tour desk services are provided at the property. Guests have free access to the 24-hour fitness room. Sitges centre is 3.5 km away from the property. Guest can reach Eurostars Sitges within 25 minutes by train from Barcelona International Airport and within 50 minutes from Barcelona city centre.

name: Hotel Bardo Recoletos Coco
address: Avenida Agustinos Recoletos, 44, 37005 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Offering an outdoor pool, this hotel is located in Salamanca. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning. Private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. Extras include a desk and a safety deposit box. At Hotel Bardo Recoletos Coco you will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage. The property offers free private parking. The hotel is 1.8 km from Plaza Mayor Salamanca, 2.2 km from Universidad de Salamanca and 2.5 km from Art Deco & Art Nouveau museum. The hotel has a cardio – protective apparatus and trained staff.

name: Catalonia Santa Justa
address: Jose Laguillo 8, 41003 Seville, Andalusia
description: Catalonia Santa Justa is located a short walk from Seville's historic centre, and just 650 metres from Santa Justa AVE Train Station. It offers a sun terrace, rooftop swimming pool, and a hot tub. Rooms at the Santa Justa hotel feature parquet floors and modern décor. They have wooden furniture and satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. Free WiFi is available. The Santa Justa has a bar and an international restaurant with a covered patio. The hotel's 24-hour reception offers currency exchange and car rental. The hotel 1.2 km from the Giralda and Seville Cathedral. The nearby Santa Catalina area has museums, shops and tapas bars.

name: Catalonia Giralda
address: Sierra Nevada, 3, 41003 Seville, Andalusia
description: Catalonia Giralda is located in Seville’s old town, 5 minutes' walk from Casa de Pilatos. The hotel features a heated indoor pool with a waterfall and jets, as well as free WiFi throughout. The bright contemporary rooms at Catalonia Giralda feature wooden floors, air conditioning, minibar and satellite TV. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided in the bathroom. A buffet breakfast is available each morning, including fruit, cereal, eggs, Spanish omelette, cold meats and fresh pastries. The restaurant offers traditional Andalusian cuisine, while tapas and international dishes are available in the snack bar, where you can also enjoy a dip in the indoor pool. Private parking is available on site for an additional cost. Catalonia Giralda is 15 minutes' walk from the cathedral and La Giralda Tower. Santa Justa Train Station is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel and local buses leave from outside the hotel, taking you to the main monuments and FIBES Convention Centre. The charming Santa Cruz neighbourhood is within a 10-minute walk of the hotel, while the Alcazar Palace is 1 km away.

name: Hotel Unuk
address: Calle Ortiz de Zúñiga, 8, 41004 Seville, Andalusia
description: Situated in Seville, less than 1 km from La Giralda and Sevilla Cathedral, Hotel Unuk features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from Santa María La Blanca Church. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Every room includes a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. At Hotel Unuk the rooms have bed linen and towels. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Hotel Unuk include Alcazar Palace, Triana Bridge - Isabel II Bridge and Plaza de Armas. The nearest airport is Seville Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel M.A. Sevilla Congresos
address: Alcalde Luis Uruñuela 2, 41020 Seville, Andalusia
description: Located next to Seville’s Fibes Exhibition Centre, M.A. Hotel Sevilla Congresos features a restaurant and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Sevilla Airport is 4 km away. All air-conditioned rooms in this hotel have satellite TV, safe, and minibar, plus a private bathroom with a bath and shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. The property´s reception is open 24 hours a day, and it offers a concierge service. There is also a business centre and free daily newspapers are available. M.A. Hotel Sevilla Congresos is a 10-minute drive from Santa Justa AVE Railway Station. The historic city centre, where you can find Plaza España Square and Sevilla Cathedral, is 6 km from the property.

name: Hotel Fernando III
address: San Jose 21, 41004 Seville, Andalusia
description: Hotel Fernando III is in Seville’s historic Santa Cruz district. It offers free WiFi, a roof terrace with city views and a seasonal swimming pool, open from June to September. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at the Fernando are comfortable and offer attractive, contemporary design. Some rooms have balconies and offer city views. The hotel’s restaurant serves both Andalusian dishes and European cuisine, in additional to traditional tapas and wines. There is also daily breakfast service. The hotel can also provide tourist information and a ticket service. Additional facilities include function rooms suitable for conferences, banquets and weddings. Hotel Fernando III is a short walk from Seville Cathedral and the Giralda Tower. The Alcazar Gardens are just 2 streets away, while Seville Train Station is also nearby.

name: Catalonia Granada
address: Avenida De Madrid 10, 18012 Granada, Andalusia
description: Located 5 minutes’ walk from AVE Train Station, Catalonia Granada features a swimming pool and a roof-top sun terrace with city views and bar service. There is free WiFi available throughout. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also has a spa with a swimming pool (paid), a fitness area and massages treatment are available on prior request. Each room at Catalonia Granada has a smart TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. There is a restaurant, where a buffet breakfast is served every morning; a hall bar and meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets. Popular points of interest near Catalonia Granada include Alcaiceria, Royal Chapel and Sacromonte. Federico Garcia Lorca Granada-Jaen Airport is 15 km away.

name: Catalonia Plaza Mayor Salamanca
address: C/ Espoz y Mina, 23-25, 37002 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Catalonia Plaza Mayor Salamanca is ideally situated next to the Plaza Mayor, and offers free Wi-Fi. The hotel decorations are modern with an Eastern touch and classic features set in stone of Villamayor. The restaurant offers you an exquisite international cuisine and various conference rooms are available for meetings or cocktails. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

name: Hotel Posada Del Lucero
address: Calle Almirante Apodaca, 7, 41004 Seville, Andalusia
description: Set in a nationally listed monument, dating from the 16th century, Hotel Posada del Lucero is located in Seville’s Old Town. This elegant hotel offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and many original features. Featuring free WiFi, each air-conditioned room opens onto the traditional Andalusian central courtyard, with columns and arches. There is a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries. A varied breakfast buffet is available, and Hotel Posada del Lucero also has a café-bar, open all day. The 24-hour front desk offers car rental and a hairdressing service. The Dueñas Palace and Encarnación Square, where you can find the impressive Metropol Parasol Building, are both within 300 metres of the hotel. Seville Cathedral and the famous Giralda Tower are 850 metres away.

name: Hotel Finca Los Abetos
address: Avenida de San Josa de Calasanz, Km 2.8, 14012 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Set 10 minutes’ drive from central Córdoba, Hotel Finca Los Abetos offers air-conditioned rooms with balconies. It features 2 seasonal outdoor pools, a restaurant, and views of the surrounding Sierra de Córdoba Mountains. The rooms at this hotel include free WiFi, safe, a flat-screen TV and international channels. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and free toiletries. Surrounded by gardens, the Maestre Escuela has a peaceful setting. Outdoors you will also find 2 seven-a-side football pitches. There are 2 seasonal pools. It features a traditional Andalusian interior courtyard and a terrace with mountain views, where you can enjoy a drink or meal. Breakfast is served in the hotel’s café. Reception has tourist information and is open 24 hours. Free parking is available at the property, as well as bike storage and bike repair service.

name: Sant Pere Del Bosc Hotel & Spa
address: Paratge de Sant Pere Del Bosc, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: Set in a restored Modernista building, the luxury Hotel Sant Pere del Bosc Hotel & Spa - Adults Only offers a saltwater outdoor pool. The hotel spa includes a water circuit and massage service. Each air-conditioned suite at the Sant Pere del Bosc Hotel & Spa - Adults Only Hotel features free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. All suites have a small seating area with a sofa and an elegant bathroom with amenities. More than 20 treatments are offered at the hotel spa. These include ayurvedic treatments, yoga and made-to-measure dietary and aesthetic services. Access to the spa carries a surcharge. The Sant Pere’s restaurant serves locally produced organic food. The hotel also has a bar and terrace. Hotel Sant Pere is next to Sant Pere del Bosc Hotel & Spa - Adults Only Shrine, 6 km from Lloret de Mar. Angel de Lloret Golf Club is just 1 km from the hotel. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about the area and arrange airport transfers or car hire. Free parking is available on site.

name: Gran Hotel Nagari Boutique & Spa
address: Plaza de Compostela, 21, 36201 Vigo, Galicia
description: Gran Hotel Nagari Boutique & Spa is located in Vigo, 200 metres from the Vigo Contemporary Art Museum. The nearest beach is 4 km away. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. The chic rooms feature a PlayStation 4, a flat-screen TV, free bottle of water, heating, and air conditioning. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, a hydromassage bath, a chromotherapy shower, and hairdryer. The luxurious Nagari Health and Beauty Spa offers a gym, hot tub and Turkish bath. Beauty treatments are also available using advanced technology and top quality products. Gran Hotel Nagari includes the stylish Alameda XXI restaurant, which serves traditional cuisine and has over 200 wines for guests to try. The Manhattan Wine and Lounge offers cocktails and tapas, and features a large terrace.

name: Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa
address: Tornería, 22, 11403 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and shared lounge in Jerez de la Frontera. With a terrace, the property also features a restaurant, as well as a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Novo Sancti Petri Golf is 45 km from Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa, while Montecastillo Golf Resort is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Jerez Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: San Gil
address: Parras 28, 41002 Seville, Andalusia
description: San Gil offers attractive accommodation in a colourful, traditional Andalusian-style mansion with a garden. Set in central Seville, it features a seasonal rooftop swimming pool and an à la carte restaurant. Each of the San Gil’s spacious, air-conditioned rooms has a minibar and satellite TV. All rooms have fully equipped bathrooms. The hotel features ornate, colourful tiles throughout, as well as original windows and balconies. Free WiFi is available. The San Gil’s La Calesera restaurant offers typical Sevillan cuisine and tapas dishes. During the summer months, meals are served on the pretty terrace set within the hotel’s gardens. On some evenings there is live flamenco music. The San Gil is just 5 minutes’ walk from Basilica de la Macarena Church and the city’s Roman walls. Seville Cathedral and the Giralda bell tower are less than 2 km away.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Girona
address: Carrer Mossen Joan Pons 1, 17001 Girona, Catalonia
description: Enjoy contemporary business and leisure facilities and a warm chocolate chip cookie upon arrival, when you stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Girona. Boasting a fantastic location in the center of Girona, close to the Auditorium and Congress Center, this attractive Girona hotel offers easy access to many attractions including Girona Cathedral, the River Onyar and the Jewish Quarter. A ten minute stroll through a beautiful park area will take guests to downtown Girona and the award-winning restaurant, El Celler de Can Roca is just five minutes’ walk from our contemporary hotel in Girona. All of our eco-friendly, air-conditioned Guest Rooms and Suites have been beautifully decorated and feature a variety of modern amenities including complimentary WiFi, an LCD TV and a stylish bathroom. With a dedicated staff, high-quality A/V equipment and four flexible meeting spaces, this hotel in Girona is the ideal venue for a successful business event, celebration or wedding. A 24-hour business center is also available, offering a range of helpful services. Work out in the complimentary 24-hour Fitness Center or relax with a cocktail by the sparkling waters of the outdoor swimming pool, located on the top floor terrace of the hotel. Also featuring a Rooftop Bar, this attractive, sun-soaked terrace is the perfect place to enjoy a light snack as you gaze out over the city. Dine in style in the sophisticated Restaurant Sargantana, where you can experience the finest, authentic Catalan cuisine, prepared with the freshest, locally sourced ingredients.Hilton

name: Hipotels Sherry Park
address: Avda. Alvaro Domecq, 11, 11405 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Surrounded by lush gardens, the Sherry Park Hotel offers a large outdoor swimming pool and rooms with free WiFi. It is 15 minutes’ walk from the historical centre of Jerez. All rooms are equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms include a balcony. On-site facilities include an indoor pool, gym and sauna. The hotel is 25 minutes’ walk from the Cathedral and the Jerez sherry cellars. The Sherry Park is also just a short walk from the city’s renowned Royal Equestrian School and the bullring. Parking is offered by payment, and subject to availability. "La Vermuteria del Sherry", which replaces the restaurant "El Ábaco". This new gastronomic concept leaves aside the idea of "table and tablecloth" and offers a wide selection of wines exclusively from the Jerez area, thus maintaining the commitment to local gastronomy as a hallmark. The diner can also enjoy a wide selection of vermouth made in the region, accompanied by portions and tapas.

name: Palau de Bellavista Girona by URH
address: Pujada Dels Polvorins, 1, 17004 Girona, Catalonia
description: The Hotel Palau of Bellavista by URH is 10 minutes’ walk from Girona's historical centre, its Fortress, and Cathedral, and offers rooms with minibar and room service. There are impressive views from its roof terrace bar. Offering free private parking, the stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Palau of Bellavista by URH have a CD player and satellite TV.
